HP:0002629.definition: An anomalous configuration of blood vessels that shunts arterial blood directly into veins without passing through the capillaries and that is located in the gastrointestinal tract.
HP:0002629.definition_cn: 胃肠道动静脉畸形（Gastrointestinal Arteriovenous Malformation, GI AVM）

HP:0002630.name: Fat malabsorption
HP:0002630.definition: Abnormality of the absorption of fat from the gastrointestinal tract.

HP:0002634.name: Arteriosclerosis
HP:0002634.definition: Sclerosis (hardening) of the arteries with increased thickness of the wall of arteries as well as increased stiffness and a loss of elasticity.
HP:0002634.definition_cn: 动脉硬化（动脉壁增厚、硬度增加及弹性丧失）。

HP:0002635.name: Type IV atherosclerotic lesion
HP:0002635.definition: In type IV atherosclerotic lesions a dense accumulation of extracellular lipid occupies an extensive but well-defined region of the intima. This type of extracellular lipid accumulation is known as the lipid core. A fibrous tissue increase is not a feature, and complications such as defects of the lesion surface and thrombosis are not present. The type IV lesion is also known as atheroma. Type IV is the first lesion considered advanced in this classification because of the severe intimal disorganization caused by the lipid core. The characteristic core appears to develop from an increase and the consequent confluence of the small isolated pools of extracellular lipid that characterize type III lesions. The increase in lipid is believed to result from continued insudation from the plasma. Type IV lesions, when they first appear in younger people, are found in the same locations as adaptive intimal thickenings of the eccentric type. Thus, atheroma is, at least initially, an eccentric lesion.
HP:0002635.definition_cn: 在IV型动脉粥样硬化病变中，细胞外脂质的密集积聚占据了内膜的一个广泛但界限明确的区域。这种类型的细胞外脂质积聚被称为脂质核心。纤维组织增加并非其特征，且病变表面缺损和血栓形成等并发症不存在。IV型病变也被称为粥样斑块。由于脂质核心导致的内膜严重紊乱，IV型病变在此分类中被认为是首个进展性病变。特征性的核心似乎是由III型病变中特征性的孤立小池细胞外脂质的增加和随之的融合发展而来。脂质的增加被认为是由血浆的持续渗入所致。IV型病变在年轻人中首次出现时，其位置与偏心型适应性内膜增厚相同。因此，粥样斑块至少在最初是一种偏心性病变。

HP:0002636.name: Dilatation of an abdominal artery
HP:0002636.definition: Abnormal outpouching or sac-like dilatation in an artery that originates from the abdominal aorta.
HP:0002636.definition_cn: 腹主动脉起源的动脉异常外凸或囊状扩张。

HP:0002637.name: Cerebral ischemia
HP:0002637.definition: Restriction of arterial blood supply to the brain associated with insufficient oxygenation to support the metabolic requirements of the tissue.
HP:0002637.definition_cn: 脑动脉供血不足伴组织代谢需求氧合不足。

HP:0002638.name: Superficial thrombophlebitis
HP:0002638.definition: Inflammation of a superficial vein associated with venous thrombosis (blood clot formation within the vein).
HP:0002638.definition_cn: 浅表静脉炎伴静脉血栓形成（静脉内血栓形成）。

HP:0002639.name: Budd-Chiari syndrome
HP:0002639.definition: Budd-Chiari syndrome (BCS) is caused by obstruction of hepatic venous outflow at any level from the small hepatic veins to the junction of the inferior vena cava (IVC) with the right atrium, 1 and occurs in 1/100,000 of the general population worldwide. The most common presentation is with ascites, but can range from fulminant hepatic failure (FHF) to asymptomatic forms. Obstruction of hepatic venous outflow is mainly caused by primary intravascular thrombosis, which can occur suddenly or be repeated over time, accompanied by some revascularization, accounting for the variable parenchymal hepatic damage and histologic presentation. Budd-Chiari syndrome is thus a disease, but since it occurs as a manifestation of several other diseases, this term is kept for the present for convenience.
HP:0002639.definition_cn: 布加综合征（Budd-Chiari syndrome, BCS）是由于肝静脉流出道在从小肝静脉至下腔静脉（inferior vena cava, IVC）与右心房连接处的任何水平发生阻塞所致，全球普通人群中的发病率为1/100,000。最常见的临床表现是腹水（ascites），但也可从暴发性肝衰竭（fulminant hepatic failure, FHF）到无症状形式不等。肝静脉流出道阻塞主要由原发性血管内血栓形成（primary intravascular thrombosis）引起，血栓可突然发生或随时间反复形成，并伴有部分血管再通（revascularization），这解释了肝实质损伤和组织学表现的多样性。因此，布加综合征是一种疾病，但由于它是多种其他疾病的表现形式，目前仍保留这一术语以便于使用。

HP:0002640.name: Hypertension associated with pheochromocytoma
HP:0002640.definition: A type of hypertension associated with pheochromocytoma.
HP:0002640.name_cn: 嗜铬细胞瘤相关性高血压
HP:0002640.definition_cn: 一种与嗜铬细胞瘤相关的高血压类型。

HP:0002642.name: Arteriovenous fistulas of celiac and mesenteric vessels
HP:0002642.name_cn: 腹腔和肠系膜血管动静脉瘘

HP:0002644.name: Abnormal pelvic girdle bone morphology
HP:0002644.definition: An abnormality of the bony pelvic girdle, which is a ring of bones connecting the vertebral column to the femurs.
HP:0002644.definition_cn: 骨盆带骨性异常，即连接脊柱与股骨的骨环结构异常。

HP:0002645.name: Wormian bones
HP:0002645.definition: The presence of extra bones within a cranial suture. Wormian bones are irregular isolated bones which appear in addition to the usual centers of ossification of the cranium.
HP:0002645.definition_cn: 颅缝内存在额外骨骼。沃姆骨（Wormian bones）是指在颅骨常规骨化中心之外出现的孤立不规则骨骼。

HP:0002647.name: Aortic dissection
HP:0002647.definition: Aortic dissection refers to a tear in the intimal layer of the aorta causing a separation between the intima and the medial layers of the aorta.
HP:0002647.definition_cn: 主动脉夹层是指主动脉内膜层发生撕裂，导致内膜与中膜层之间分离。

HP:0002650.name: Scoliosis
HP:0002650.definition: The presence of an abnormal lateral curvature of the spine.

HP:0002651.name: Spondyloepimetaphyseal dysplasia
HP:0002651.name_cn: 脊柱骨骺干骺端发育不良

HP:0002652.name: Skeletal dysplasia
HP:0002652.definition: A general term describing features characterized by abnormal development of bones and connective tissues.
HP:0002652.definition_cn: 一种描述以骨骼和结缔组织发育异常为特征的综合性术语。

HP:0002653.name: Bone pain
HP:0002653.definition: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to bone.
HP:0002653.definition_cn: 一种以局限于骨骼的躯体不适感（如刺痛、搏动性疼痛或酸痛）为特征的不适感觉。

HP:0002655.name: Spondyloepiphyseal dysplasia
HP:0002655.definition: A disorder of bone growth affecting the vertebrae and the ends of the long bones (epiphyses).
HP:0002655.definition_cn: 一种影响椎骨和长骨末端（骨骺）的骨生长障碍。

HP:0002659.name: Increased susceptibility to fractures
HP:0002659.definition: An abnormally increased tendency to fractures of bones caused by an abnormal reduction in bone strength that is generally associated with an increased risk of fracture.
HP:0002659.definition_cn: 病理性骨折倾向增加，由骨强度异常降低引起，通常与骨折风险增加相关。

HP:0002661.name: Painless fractures due to injury
HP:0002661.definition: An increased tendency to fractures following trauma, with fractures occurring without pain.
HP:0002661.definition_cn: 创伤后骨折倾向增加，骨折发生时无痛感。

HP:0002664.name: Neoplasm
HP:0002664.definition: An organ or organ-system abnormality that consists of uncontrolled autonomous cell-proliferation which can occur in any part of the body as a benign or malignant neoplasm (tumor).
HP:0002664.definition_cn: 一种器官或器官系统异常，其特征为不受控制的自主细胞增殖，可发生于身体的任何部位，表现为良性或恶性肿瘤（肿瘤）。

HP:0002665.name: Lymphoma
HP:0002665.definition: A cancer originating in lymphocytes and presenting as a solid tumor of lymhpoid cells.
HP:0002665.definition_cn: 一种起源于淋巴细胞并以淋巴样细胞实体瘤形式呈现的癌症。

HP:0002666.name: Pheochromocytoma
HP:0002666.definition: Pheochromocytomas (also known as chromaffin tumors) produce, store, and secrete catecholamines. Pheochromocytomas usually originate from the adrenal medulla but may also develop from chromaffin cells in or about sympathetic ganglia. A common symptom of pheochromocytoma is hypertension owing to release of catecholamines.
HP:0002666.definition_cn: 嗜铬细胞瘤（也称为嗜铬细胞肿瘤）产生、储存并分泌儿茶酚胺。嗜铬细胞瘤通常起源于肾上腺髓质，但也可能由交感神经节内或周围的嗜铬细胞发展而来。嗜铬细胞瘤的常见症状是由于儿茶酚胺释放引起的高血压。

HP:0002667.name: Nephroblastoma
HP:0002667.definition: The presence of a nephroblastoma, which is a neoplasm of the kidney that primarily affects children.
HP:0002667.definition_cn: 肾母细胞瘤的存在，这是一种主要影响儿童的肾脏肿瘤。

HP:0002668.name: Paraganglioma
HP:0002668.definition: A carotid body tumor (also called paraganglionoma or chemodectoma) is a tumor found in the upper neck at the branching of the carotid artery. They arise from the chemoreceptor organ (paraganglion) located in the adventitia of the carotid artery bifurcation.
HP:0002668.definition_cn: 颈动脉体瘤（也称为副神经节瘤或化学感受器瘤）是一种位于颈部分叉处颈动脉上方的肿瘤。它们起源于位于颈动脉分叉外膜中的化学感受器器官（副神经节）。

HP:0002669.name: Osteosarcoma
HP:0002669.definition: A malignant bone tumor that usually develops during adolescence and usually affects the long bones including the tibia, femur, and humerus. The typical symptoms of osteosarcoma comprise bone pain, fracture, limitation of motion, and tenderness or swelling at the site of the tumor.
HP:0002669.definition_cn: 一种恶性骨肿瘤，通常发生于青春期，常累及长骨，包括胫骨、股骨和肱骨。骨肉瘤的典型症状包括骨痛、骨折、活动受限以及肿瘤部位的压痛或肿胀。

HP:0002671.name: Basal cell carcinoma
HP:0002671.definition: The presence of a basal cell carcinoma of the skin.
HP:0002671.definition_cn: 皮肤基底细胞癌的存在。

HP:0002673.name: Coxa valga
HP:0002673.definition: Coxa valga is a deformity of the hip in which the angle between the femoral shaft and the femoral neck is increased compared to age-adjusted values (about 150 degrees in newborns gradually reducing to 120-130 degrees in adults).
HP:0002673.definition_cn: 髋外翻是一种髋关节畸形，表现为股骨干与股骨颈之间的角度相较于年龄调整值增大（新生儿约为150度，逐渐减少至成人的120-130度）。

HP:0002676.name: Cloverleaf skull
HP:0002676.definition: Trilobar skull configuration when viewed from the front or behind.
HP:0002676.definition_cn: 从正面或背面观察时，颅骨呈三叶状构型。

HP:0002677.name: Small foramen magnum
HP:0002677.definition: An abnormal narrowing of the foramen magnum.

HP:0002679.name: Abnormal sella turcica morphology
HP:0002679.definition: Abnormality of the sella turcica, a saddle-shaped depression in the sphenoid bone at the base of the human skull.
HP:0002679.definition_cn: 蝶鞍异常，即位于人类颅底蝶骨中的鞍状凹陷结构异常。

HP:0002680.name: J-shaped sella turcica
HP:0002680.definition: A deformity of the sella turcica whereby the sella extends further anterior than normal such that the anterior clinoid process appears to overhang it, giving the appearance of the letter J on imaging of the skull.
HP:0002680.definition_cn: 蝶鞍畸形，表现为蝶鞍向前延伸超出正常范围，导致前床突似乎悬垂其上，在颅骨影像学检查中呈现字母“J”的外观。

HP:0002683.name: Abnormal calvaria morphology
HP:0002683.definition: Abnormality of the morphology (structure) of the calvaria (skullcap), that is, of that part of the skull that is made up of the superior portions of the frontal bone, occipital bone, and parietal bones and covers the cranial cavity that contains the brain.
HP:0002683.definition_cn: 颅盖骨形态（结构）异常，即由额骨、枕骨和顶骨的上部组成并覆盖包含大脑的颅腔的颅骨部分异常。

HP:0002684.name: Thickened calvaria
HP:0002684.definition: The presence of an abnormally thick calvaria.

HP:0002686.name: Pregnancy history
HP:0002686.definition: Medical history of maternal diseases, exposures, or other relevant findings during the pregnancy of which the index person was the product.
HP:0002686.definition_cn: 母体疾病史、妊娠期暴露史或其他与索引个体作为妊娠产物相关的相关发现。

HP:0002687.name: Abnormality of frontal sinus
HP:0002687.definition: An abnormality of the frontal sinus, one of the mucosa-lined, normally air-filled paranasal sinuses of the bones of the skull. The frontal sinus is located within the frontal bone.
HP:0002687.definition_cn: 额窦异常，额窦为颅骨中黏膜衬里、正常情况下充满空气的鼻旁窦之一，位于额骨内。

HP:0002690.name: Large sella turcica
HP:0002690.definition: An abnormal enlargement of the sella turcica.

HP:0002691.name: Platybasia
HP:0002691.definition: A developmental malformation of the occipital bone and upper end of the cervical spine, in which the latter appears to have pushed the floor of the occipital bone upward such that there is an abnormal flattening of the skull base.
HP:0002691.definition_cn: 枕骨和颈椎上端的发育畸形，其中颈椎似乎将枕骨底部向上推挤，导致颅底出现异常扁平化。

HP:0002693.name: Abnormal skull base morphology
HP:0002693.definition: An abnormality of the base of the skull, which forms the floor of the cranial cavity and separates the brain from other facial structures. The skull base is made up of five bones: the ethmoid, sphenoid, occipital, paired frontal, and paired parietal bones, and is subdivided into 3 regions: the anterior, middle, and posterior cranial fossae. The petro-occipital fissure subdivides the middle cranial fossa into 1 central component and 2 lateral components.
HP:0002693.definition_cn: 颅底异常，颅底构成颅腔底部并将大脑与其他面部结构分隔。颅底由五块骨骼组成：筛骨、蝶骨、枕骨、成对的额骨和成对的顶骨，并分为三个区域：前颅窝、中颅窝和后颅窝。岩枕裂将中颅窝分为一个中央部分和两个外侧部分。

HP:0002694.name: Sclerosis of skull base
HP:0002694.definition: Increased bone density of the skull base without significant changes in bony contour.
HP:0002694.definition_cn: 颅底骨密度增高，未见明显骨轮廓改变。

HP:0002695.name: obsolete Symmetrical, oval parietal bone defects
HP:0002695.name_cn: 陈旧性对称性卵圆形顶骨缺损

HP:0002696.name: Abnormal parietal bone morphology
HP:0002696.definition: Any abnormality of the parietal bone of the skull.

HP:0002697.name: Parietal foramina
HP:0002697.definition: The presence of symmetrical and circular openings (foramina) in the parietal bone ranging in size from a few millimeters to several centimeters wide.
HP:0002697.definition_cn: 顶骨存在对称性圆形孔洞（骨孔），其直径范围从数毫米至数厘米不等。

HP:0002699.name: Abnormal foramen magnum morphology
HP:0002699.definition: Any abnormality of the foramen magnum.

HP:0002700.name: Large foramen magnum
HP:0002700.definition: An abnormal increase in the size of the foramen magnum.

HP:0002703.name: Abnormality of skull ossification
HP:0002703.definition: An abnormality of the process of ossification of the skull.

HP:0002705.name: High, narrow palate
HP:0002705.definition: The presence of a high and narrow palate.

HP:0002707.name: Palate telangiectasia
HP:0002707.definition: The presence of small (ca. 0.5-1.0 mm) dilated blood vessels near the surface of the mucous membranes of the palate.
HP:0002707.definition_cn: 腭部黏膜表面附近存在直径约0.5-1.0毫米的扩张血管。

HP:0002708.name: Prominent median palatal raphe
HP:0002708.definition: Unusual prominence of the median palatal raphe, which is the ridge formed by the fusion of the two plates of the skull that form the hard palate.
HP:0002708.definition_cn: 腭中缝异常突出，即由构成硬腭的两块颅骨板融合形成的嵴。

HP:0002710.name: Commissural lip pit
HP:0002710.definition: A depression located at an oral commissure.

HP:0002711.name: Exaggerated median tongue furrow
HP:0002711.definition: Increased depth of the median tongue furrow.

HP:0002714.name: Downturned corners of mouth
HP:0002714.definition: A morphological abnormality of the mouth in which the angle of the mouth is downturned. The oral commissures are positioned inferior to the midline labial fissure.
HP:0002714.definition_cn: 口角下垂的口部形态学异常，表现为口角位置低于中线唇裂。

HP:0002715.name: Abnormality of the immune system
HP:0002715.definition: An abnormality of the immune system.

HP:0002716.name: Lymphadenopathy
HP:0002716.definition_cn: 淋巴结肿大（淋巴腺肿胀）。

HP:0002718.name: Recurrent bacterial infections
HP:0002718.definition: Increased susceptibility to bacterial infections, as manifested by recurrent episodes of bacterial infection.
HP:0002718.definition_cn: 细菌感染易感性增加，表现为反复发作的细菌感染。

HP:0002721.name: Immunodeficiency
HP:0002721.definition: Failure of the immune system to protect the body adequately from infection, due to the absence or insufficiency of some component process or substance.
HP:0002721.definition_cn: 免疫系统因某些组成过程或物质的缺失或不足而无法充分保护机体免受感染。

HP:0002722.name: Recurrent abscess formation
HP:0002722.definition: An increased susceptibility to abscess formation, as manifested by a medical history of recurrent abscesses.
HP:0002722.definition_cn: 脓肿形成易感性增加，表现为复发性脓肿的病史。

HP:0002723.name: Absence of bactericidal oxidative respiratory burst in phagocytes
HP:0002723.definition: An absence of the phase of elevated metabolic activity, during which oxygen consumption increases, that occurs in neutrophils, monocytes, and macrophages shortly after phagocytosing material. An enhanced uptake of oxygen leads to the production, by an NADH dependent system, of hydrogen peroxide (H2O2), superoxide anions and hydroxyl radicals, which play a part in microbiocidal activity.
HP:0002723.name_cn: 吞噬细胞中杀菌性氧化呼吸爆发缺失
HP:0002723.definition_cn: 在吞噬物质后不久，中性粒细胞、单核细胞和巨噬细胞中未出现代谢活动增强阶段，该阶段伴随氧耗增加。氧摄取增强通过NADH依赖系统产生过氧化氢（H2O2）、超氧阴离子和羟基自由基，这些物质在杀菌活性中发挥作用。

HP:0002724.name: Recurrent Aspergillus infections
HP:0002724.definition: An increased susceptibility to Aspergillus infections, as manifested by a history of recurrent episodes of Aspergillus infections.
HP:0002724.definition_cn: 对曲霉菌感染的易感性增加，表现为反复发作的曲霉菌感染病史。

HP:0002725.name: Systemic lupus erythematosus
HP:0002725.definition: A chronic, relapsing, inflammatory, and often febrile multisystemic disorder of connective tissue, characterized principally by involvement of the skin, joints, kidneys, and serosal membranes.
HP:0002725.definition_cn: 一种慢性、复发性、炎症性且常伴有发热的多系统结缔组织疾病，主要特征为皮肤、关节、肾脏和浆膜的受累。

HP:0002726.name: Recurrent Staphylococcus aureus infections
HP:0002726.definition: Increased susceptibility to Staphylococcus aureus infections, as manifested by recurrent episodes of Staphylococcus aureus infection.
HP:0002726.name_cn: 复发性金黄色葡萄球菌感染
HP:0002726.definition_cn: 金黄色葡萄球菌感染易感性增加，表现为反复发作的金黄色葡萄球菌感染。

HP:0002728.name: Chronic mucocutaneous candidiasis
HP:0002728.definition: Recurrent or persistent superficial Candida infections of the skin, mucous membranes, and nails.
HP:0002728.name_cn: 慢性皮肤黏膜念珠菌病
HP:0002728.definition_cn: 复发性或持续性皮肤、黏膜及甲表的浅表性念珠菌感染。

HP:0002729.name: Follicular hyperplasia
HP:0002729.definition: Lymphadenopathy (enlargement of lymph nodes) owing to hyperplasia of follicular (germinal) centers.
HP:0002729.definition_cn: 由于滤泡（生发）中心增生导致的淋巴结病（淋巴结肿大）。

HP:0002730.name: Chronic noninfectious lymphadenopathy
HP:0002730.definition: A chronic form of lymphadenopathy that is not related to infection.
HP:0002730.name_cn: 慢性非感染性淋巴结病
HP:0002730.definition_cn: 慢性非感染性淋巴结病。

HP:0002731.name: Decreased lymphocyte apoptosis
HP:0002731.definition: A reduction in the rate of apoptosis in lymphocytes.

HP:0002740.name: Recurrent E. coli infections
HP:0002740.definition: Increased susceptibility to infections with Escherichia coli, as manifested by recurrent episodes of infection with this agent.
HP:0002740.definition_cn: 对大肠埃希菌感染的易感性增加，表现为该病原体反复感染发作。

HP:0002741.name: Recurrent Serratia marcescens infections
HP:0002741.definition: Increased susceptibility to Serratia marcescens infections, as manifested by recurrent episodes of Serratia marcescens infection.
HP:0002741.name_cn: 复发性粘质沙雷氏菌感染
HP:0002741.definition_cn: 对粘质沙雷氏菌感染的易感性增加，表现为反复发作的粘质沙雷氏菌感染。

HP:0002742.name: Recurrent Klebsiella infections
HP:0002742.definition: Increased susceptibility to Klebsiella infections, as manifested by recurrent episodes of Klebsiella infection.
HP:0002742.definition_cn: 对克雷伯菌感染的易感性增加，表现为反复发作的克雷伯菌感染。

HP:0002743.name: Recurrent enteroviral infections
HP:0002743.definition: Increased susceptibility to enteroviral infections, as manifested by recurrent episodes of enteroviral infection.
HP:0002743.definition_cn: 对肠道病毒感染的易感性增加，表现为反复发作的肠道病毒感染。

HP:0002744.name: obsolete Bilateral cleft lip and palate

HP:0002745.name: Oral leukoplakia
HP:0002745.definition: A thickened white patch on the oral mucosa that cannot be rubbed off.
HP:0002745.definition_cn: 口腔黏膜上无法擦除的增厚白色斑块。

HP:0002747.name: Respiratory insufficiency due to muscle weakness
HP:0002747.name_cn: 由于肌无力导致的呼吸功能不全

HP:0002748.name: Rickets
HP:0002748.definition: Rickets is divided into two major categories including calcipenic and phosphopenic. Hypophosphatemia is described as a common manifestation of both categories. Hypophosphatemic rickets is the most common type of rickets that is characterized by low levels of serum phosphate, resistance to ultraviolet radiation or vitamin D intake. There are several issues involved in hypophosphatemic rickets such as calcium, vitamin D, phosphorus deficiencies. Moreover, other disorder can be associated with its occurrence such as absorption defects due to pancreatic, intestinal, gastric, and renal disorders and hepatobiliary disease. Symptoms are usually seen in childhood and can be varied in severity. Severe forms may be linked to bowing of the legs, poor bone growth, and short stature as well as joint and bone pain. Hypophosphatemic rickets are associated with renal excretion of phosphate, hypophosphatemia, and mineral defects in bones. The familial type of the disease is the most common type of rickets.
HP:0002748.definition_cn: 佝偻病分为两大类，包括钙缺乏性和磷缺乏性。低磷血症被描述为这两类佝偻病的常见表现。低磷性佝偻病是最常见的佝偻病类型，其特征为血清磷酸盐水平降低、对紫外线辐射或维生素D摄入的抵抗性。低磷性佝偻病涉及多个问题，如钙、维生素D、磷的缺乏。此外，其他疾病也可能与其发生相关，如由于胰腺、肠道、胃和肾脏疾病以及肝胆疾病引起的吸收缺陷。症状通常在儿童期出现，严重程度各异。严重病例可能与腿部弯曲、骨生长不良、身材矮小以及关节和骨痛有关。低磷性佝偻病与肾脏磷酸盐排泄、低磷血症和骨骼矿物质缺陷相关。家族性类型是该病最常见的佝偻病类型。

HP:0002749.name: Osteomalacia
HP:0002749.definition: Osteomalacia is a general term for bone weakness owing to a defect in mineralization of the protein framework known as osteoid. This defective mineralization is mainly caused by lack in vitamin D. Osteomalacia in children is known as rickets.
HP:0002749.definition_cn: 骨软化症是由于骨基质（即类骨质）矿化缺陷导致的骨强度减弱的统称。这种矿化缺陷主要由维生素D缺乏引起。儿童期的骨软化症被称为佝偻病。

HP:0002750.name: Delayed skeletal maturation
HP:0002750.definition: A decreased rate of skeletal maturation. Delayed skeletal maturation can be diagnosed on the basis of an estimation of the bone age from radiographs of specific bones in the human body.
HP:0002750.definition_cn: 骨骼成熟速率降低。延迟的骨骼成熟可通过基于人体特定骨骼的X光片评估骨龄来进行诊断。

HP:0002751.name: Kyphoscoliosis
HP:0002751.definition: An abnormal curvature of the spine in both a coronal (lateral) and sagittal (back-to-front) plane.
HP:0002751.definition_cn: 脊柱在冠状面（侧向）和矢状面（前后）上的异常弯曲。

HP:0002753.name: Thin bony cortex
HP:0002753.definition: Abnormal thinning of the cortical region of bones.

HP:0002754.name: Osteomyelitis
HP:0002754.definition: Osteomyelitis is an inflammatory process accompanied by bone destruction and caused by an infecting microorganism.
HP:0002754.definition_cn: 骨髓炎是一种伴随骨质破坏的炎症过程，由感染性微生物引起。

HP:0002755.name: obsolete Osteomyelitis due to immunodeficiency
HP:0002755.name_cn: 免疫缺陷导致的陈旧性骨髓炎

HP:0002756.name: Pathologic fracture
HP:0002756.definition: A pathologic fracture occurs when a bone breaks in an area that is weakened secondarily to another disease process such as tumor, infection, and certain inherited bone disorders. A pathologic fracture can occur without a degree of trauma required to cause fracture in healthy bone.
HP:0002756.definition_cn: 病理性骨折是指由于肿瘤、感染或某些遗传性骨病等继发性疾病过程导致骨骼局部结构弱化而发生的骨折。病理性骨折可在无明显外伤的情况下发生，而健康骨骼在相同程度的外力作用下通常不会发生骨折。

HP:0002757.name: Recurrent fractures
HP:0002757.definition: The repeated occurrence of bone fractures (implying an abnormally increased tendency for fracture).
HP:0002757.definition_cn: 病理性骨折（指骨折倾向异常增加）。

HP:0002758.name: Osteoarthritis
HP:0002758.definition: Degeneration (wear and tear) of articular cartilage, i.e., of the joint surface. Joint degeneration may be accompanied by osteophytes (bone overgrowth), narrowing of the joint space, regions of sclerosis at the joint surface, or joint deformity.
HP:0002758.definition_cn: 关节软骨退行性变（磨损），即关节表面的退行性变。关节退行性变可能伴随骨赘（骨质增生）、关节间隙狭窄、关节表面硬化区域或关节畸形。

HP:0002761.name: Generalized joint hypermobility
HP:0002761.definition: Joint hypermobility (ability of a joint to move beyond its normal range of motion) affecting many or all joints of the body. In individuals with Joint hypermobility at multiple sites (usually five or more), the term generalized joint hypermobility is preferred.
HP:0002761.name_cn: 全身性关节过度活动症
HP:0002761.definition_cn: 多关节过度活动（关节活动范围超出正常范围）累及身体多个或全部关节。对于多个部位（通常为五个或以上）存在关节过度活动的个体，更倾向于使用“广泛性关节过度活动”这一术语。

HP:0002762.name: Multiple exostoses
HP:0002762.definition: Presence of more than one exostosis. An exostosis is a benign growth the projects outward from the bone surface. It is capped by cartilage, and arises from a bone that develops from cartilage.
HP:0002762.definition_cn: 多发性外生骨疣。外生骨疣是一种从骨表面向外突出的良性生长物。其表面覆盖有软骨，并起源于由软骨发育而来的骨骼。

HP:0002764.name: Stippled chondral calcification
HP:0002764.definition: Punctate (speckled, dot-like) deposition of calcium of calcium salts in the articular cartilage (cartilage located in joints).
HP:0002764.definition_cn: 关节软骨（位于关节内的软骨）中钙盐的点状（斑点状、点样）沉积。

HP:0002778.name: Abnormal tracheal morphology
HP:0002778.definition: A structural anomaly of the trachea.

HP:0002780.name: Bronchomalacia
HP:0002780.definition: Weakness or softness of the cartilage in the walls of the bronchial tubes.

HP:0002781.name: Upper airway obstruction
HP:0002781.definition: Increased resistance to the passage of air in the upper airway.

HP:0002783.name: Recurrent lower respiratory tract infections
HP:0002783.definition: An increased susceptibility to lower respiratory tract infections as manifested by a history of recurrent lower respiratory tract infections.
HP:0002783.definition_cn: 下呼吸道感染易感性增加，表现为反复下呼吸道感染病史。

HP:0002786.name: Tracheobronchomalacia
HP:0002786.definition: Weakness of the cartilage in the trachea and the bronchi, resulting in a floppy (non-rigid) airway. Affected persons may have difficulties to maintain patency of the airways.
HP:0002786.definition_cn: 气管和支气管软骨软弱，导致气道松弛（非刚性）。受影响个体可能难以维持气道通畅。

HP:0002787.name: Tracheal calcification
HP:0002787.definition: Calcification (abnormal deposits of calcium) in the tracheal tissues.
HP:0002787.definition_cn: 气管组织钙化（异常钙质沉积）。

HP:0002788.name: Recurrent upper respiratory tract infections
HP:0002788.definition: An increased susceptibility to upper respiratory tract infections as manifested by a history of recurrent upper respiratory tract infections (running ears - otitis, sinusitis, pharyngitis, tonsillitis).
HP:0002788.definition_cn: 上呼吸道感染易感性增加，表现为反复上呼吸道感染病史（耳漏-中耳炎、鼻窦炎、咽炎、扁桃体炎）。

HP:0002791.name: Hypoventilation
HP:0002791.definition: A reduction in the amount of air transported into the pulmonary alveoli by breathing, leading to hypercapnia (increase in the partial pressure of carbon dioxide).
HP:0002791.definition_cn: 呼吸过程中输送到肺泡的气体量减少，导致高碳酸血症（二氧化碳分压升高）。

HP:0002792.name: Reduced vital capacity
HP:0002792.definition: An abnormal reduction on the vital capacity, which is defined as the total lung capacity (volume of air in the lungs at maximal inflation) less the residual volume (i.e., volume of air in the lungs following maximal exhalation) of the lung.
HP:0002792.definition_cn: 肺活量异常降低，定义为肺总量（肺在最大充气时的气体容积）减去残气量（即肺在最大呼气后的气体容积）。

HP:0002793.name: Abnormal pattern of respiration
HP:0002793.definition: An anomaly of the rhythm or depth of breathing.

HP:0002795.name: Abnormal respiratory system physiology
HP:0002795.definition: Abnormal function of the respiratory system.
HP:0002795.name_cn: 呼吸系统生理功能异常

HP:0002797.name: Osteolysis
HP:0002797.definition: Osteolysis refers to the destruction of bone through bone resorption with removal or loss of calcium.
HP:0002797.definition_cn: 骨溶解是指通过骨吸收作用导致钙质移除或丢失而引发的骨质破坏。

HP:0002803.name: Congenital contracture
HP:0002803.definition: One or more flexion contractures (a bent joint that cannot be straightened actively or passively) that are present at birth.
HP:0002803.definition_cn: 一种或多种屈曲挛缩（出生时即存在的无法主动或被动伸展的关节弯曲）。

HP:0002804.name: Arthrogryposis multiplex congenita
HP:0002804.definition: Multiple congenital contractures in different body areas.
HP:0002804.name_cn: 先天性多发性关节挛缩症

HP:0002808.name: Kyphosis
HP:0002808.definition: Exaggerated anterior convexity of the thoracic vertebral column.

HP:0002812.name: Coxa vara
HP:0002812.definition: Coxa vara includes all forms of decrease of the femoral neck shaft angle (the angle between the neck and the shaft of the femur) to less than 120 degrees.
HP:0002812.definition_cn: 髋内翻包括所有形式的股骨颈干角（股骨颈与股骨干之间的角度）减少至小于120度的情况。

HP:0002813.name: Abnormal limb bone morphology
HP:0002813.definition: Any abnormality of bones of the arms or legs.
HP:0002813.definition_cn: 上肢或下肢骨骼的任何异常。

HP:0002815.name: Abnormality of the knee
HP:0002815.definition: An abnormality of the knee joint or surrounding structures.
HP:0002815.definition_cn: 膝关节或周围结构异常。

HP:0002816.name: Genu recurvatum
HP:0002816.definition: An abnormally increased extension of the knee joint, so that the knee can bend backwards.
HP:0002816.definition_cn: 膝关节过伸，导致膝关节可向后弯曲。

HP:0002823.name: Abnormal femur morphology
HP:0002823.definition: Any anomaly of the structure of the femur.

HP:0002825.name: Caudal appendage
HP:0002825.definition: The presence of a tail-like skin appendage located adjacent to the sacrum.
HP:0002825.definition_cn: 骶骨旁存在尾状皮肤附属物。

HP:0002826.name: Halberd-shaped pelvis
HP:0002826.definition: An anomalous radiographic appearance of the developing pelvis, in which the greater ischiadic noth (incisura ischiadica major) is shallow and the pelvis takes on the appearance said to resemble a halberd (a weapon especially of the 15th and 16th centuries consisting typically of a battle-ax and pike mounted on a handle).
HP:0002826.definition_cn: 发育中骨盆的异常放射影像学表现，其中坐骨大切迹（incisura ischiadica major）较浅，骨盆呈现出类似戟（一种15至16世纪的武器，通常由战斧和长矛安装在手柄上）的外观。

HP:0002827.name: Hip dislocation
HP:0002827.definition: Displacement of the femur from its normal location in the hip joint.
HP:0002827.definition_cn: 股骨头从髋关节正常位置脱位。

HP:0002832.name: Calcific stippling
HP:0002832.definition: An abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) pattern of calcifications in soft tissues within or surrounding bones (as observed on radiographs).
HP:0002832.definition_cn: 软组织内或骨骼周围异常点状（斑点状、点状）钙化模式（如X线片所示）。

HP:0002833.name: Cystic angiomatosis of bone
HP:0002833.definition: Disseminated multifocal hemangiomatous or lymphangiomatous lesions of the skeleton. The lesions are lytic, well-defined, round or oval lesions within the medullary cavity, and they have an intact cortex, and manifest variable peripheral sclerosis and may exhibit endosteal scalloping.
HP:0002833.definition_cn: 骨骼的播散性多灶性血管瘤性或淋巴管瘤性病变。病变为溶骨性、边界清晰的圆形或椭圆形病变，位于髓腔内，皮质完整，表现为不同程度的外周硬化，并可能呈现内扇贝样改变。

HP:0002835.name: Aspiration
HP:0002835.definition: Inspiration of a foreign object into the airway.

HP:0002836.name: Bladder exstrophy
HP:0002836.definition: Eversion of the posterior bladder wall through the congenitally absent lower anterior abdominal wall and anterior bladder wall.
HP:0002836.definition_cn: 先天性下腹前壁及膀胱前壁缺失导致膀胱后壁外翻。

HP:0002837.name: Recurrent bronchitis
HP:0002837.definition: An increased susceptibility to bronchitis as manifested by a history of recurrent bronchitis.
HP:0002837.definition_cn: 支气管炎易感性增加，表现为复发性支气管炎病史。

HP:0002839.name: Urinary bladder sphincter dysfunction
HP:0002839.definition: Abnormal function of a sphincter of the urinary bladder.

HP:0002841.name: Recurrent fungal infections
HP:0002841.definition: Increased susceptibility to fungal infections, as manifested by multiple episodes of fungal infection.
HP:0002841.definition_cn: 真菌感染易感性增加，表现为多次真菌感染发作。

HP:0002842.name: Recurrent Burkholderia cepacia infections
HP:0002842.definition: Increased susceptibility to infections with Burkholderia cepacia, as manifested by recurrent episodes of infection with this agent.
HP:0002842.name_cn: 复发性洋葱伯克霍尔德菌感染
HP:0002842.definition_cn: 对洋葱伯克霍尔德菌感染的易感性增加，表现为该病原体反复感染发作。

HP:0002845.name: obsolete Increased proportion of peripheral CD3+ T cells
HP:0002845.name_cn: 外周血CD3+ T细胞比例增加

HP:0002846.name: Abnormal B cell morphology
HP:0002846.definition: A structural abnormality of B cells.

HP:0002847.name: Impaired memory B cell generation
HP:0002847.definition: Impaired production of memory cells, the B cells that persist for years or an entire lifetime and which confer rapid and enhanced response to secondary challenge.
HP:0002847.definition_cn: 记忆细胞生成受损，即B细胞持续存在数年或终生，并在二次挑战时提供快速且增强的免疫应答。

HP:0002848.name: Decreased specific anti-polysaccharide antibody level
HP:0002848.definition: The presence of normal overall immunoglobulin levels with deficiency of specific immunoglobulins directed against bacterial polysaccharides.
HP:0002848.name_cn: 特异性抗多糖抗体水平降低
HP:0002848.definition_cn: 总体免疫球蛋白水平正常，但针对细菌多糖的特异性免疫球蛋白缺乏。

HP:0002849.name: Absence of lymph node germinal center
HP:0002849.definition: Absence of germinal centers in lymph nodes. Germinal centers are the parts of lymph nodes in which B lymphocytes proliferate, differentiate, mutate through somatic hypermutation and class switch during antibody responses.
HP:0002849.definition_cn: 淋巴结中缺乏生发中心。生发中心是淋巴结中B淋巴细胞在抗体应答过程中增殖、分化、通过体细胞超突变和类别转换发生突变的部位。

HP:0002850.name: Decreased circulating total IgM
HP:0002850.definition: An abnormally decreased level of immunoglobulin M (IgM) in blood.
HP:0002850.name_cn: 循环总免疫球蛋白M（IgM）水平降低
HP:0002850.definition_cn: 血液中免疫球蛋白M（IgM）水平异常降低。

HP:0002851.name: Elevated proportion of CD4-negative, CD8-negative, alpha-beta regulatory T cells
HP:0002851.definition: An abnormally increased proportion of CD4-negative, CD8-negative (double negative or DN) alpha-beta regulatory T cells (Tregs) as compared to total number of T cells.
HP:0002851.name_cn: CD4阴性、CD8阴性、αβ调节性T细胞比例升高
HP:0002851.definition_cn: 与总T细胞数量相比，CD4阴性、CD8阴性（双阴性或DN）α-β调节性T细胞（Tregs）比例异常增高。

HP:0002853.name: Increased proportion of HLA DR+ T cells
HP:0002853.definition: An elevated proportion of T cells that express human leukocyte antigen (HLA)-DR. HLA-DR is an MHC class II cell surface receptor that presents antigens (peptides of at least 9 amino acids), thereby constituting a ligand for the T-cell receptor. HLA-DR can be upregulated in response to immune stimulation.
HP:0002853.name_cn: HLA DR+ T细胞比例增加
HP:0002853.definition_cn: 表达人类白细胞抗原（HLA）-DR的T细胞比例升高。HLA-DR是一种主要组织相容性复合体（MHC）II类细胞表面受体，负责呈递抗原（至少9个氨基酸的肽段），从而构成T细胞受体的配体。HLA-DR可在免疫刺激作用下上调表达。

HP:0002857.name: Genu valgum
HP:0002857.definition: The legs angle inward, such that the knees are close together and the ankles far apart.
HP:0002857.definition_cn: 下肢呈内翻角，表现为膝关节靠拢而踝关节分离。

HP:0002858.name: Meningioma
HP:0002858.definition: The presence of a meningioma, i.e., a benign tumor originating from the dura mater or arachnoid mater.
HP:0002858.definition_cn: 脑膜瘤的存在，即一种起源于硬脑膜或蛛网膜的良性肿瘤。

HP:0002860.name: Squamous cell carcinoma
HP:0002860.definition: The presence of squamous cell carcinoma of the skin.
HP:0002860.definition_cn: 皮肤鳞状细胞癌的存在。

HP:0002861.name: Melanoma
HP:0002861.definition: The presence of a melanoma, a malignant cancer originating from pigment producing melanocytes. Melanoma can originate from the skin or the pigmented layers of the eye (the uvea).
HP:0002861.definition_cn: 黑色素瘤的存在，这是一种源自产生色素的黑色素细胞的恶性肿瘤。黑色素瘤可起源于皮肤或眼球的色素层（葡萄膜）。

HP:0002862.name: Bladder carcinoma
HP:0002862.definition: The presence of a carcinoma of the urinary bladder.

HP:0002863.name: Myelodysplasia
HP:0002863.definition: Clonal hematopoietic stem cell disorders characterized by dysplasia (ineffective production) in one or more hematopoietic cell lineages, leading to anemia and cytopenia.
HP:0002863.definition_cn: 克隆性造血干细胞疾病，其特征为一种或多种造血细胞系发育不良（无效生成），导致贫血和血细胞减少症。

HP:0002865.name: Medullary thyroid carcinoma
HP:0002865.definition: The presence of a medullary carcinoma of the thyroid gland.

HP:0002867.name: Abnormal ilium morphology
HP:0002867.definition: An abnormality of the ilium, the largest and uppermost bone of the pelvis.
HP:0002867.definition_cn: 髂骨异常，髂骨为骨盆最大且最上方的骨骼。

HP:0002868.name: Narrow iliac wing
HP:0002868.definition: Decreased width of the wing (or ala) of the ilium (which is the large expanded portion which bounds the greater pelvis laterally).
HP:0002868.definition_cn: 髂骨翼（即构成大骨盆外侧边界的大扩展部分）宽度减小。

HP:0002869.name: Flared iliac wing
HP:0002869.definition: Widening of the ilium ala, that is of the wing of the ilium, combined with external rotation, leading to a flared appearance of the iliac wing.
HP:0002869.definition_cn: 髂骨翼增宽，即髂骨翼的扩大，伴随外旋，导致髂骨翼呈现外翻外观。

HP:0002870.name: Obstructive sleep apnea
HP:0002870.definition: Obstructive Sleep Apnea is a condition characterized by the obstruction of the airway and pauses in breathing during sleep, which occur multiple times throughout the night. It is related to the relaxation of muscle tone that typically happens during sleep, leading to a partial collapse of the soft tissues in the airway and causing airflow obstruction.
HP:0002870.definition_cn: 阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停（Obstructive Sleep Apnea, OSA）是一种以睡眠期间上气道阻塞和呼吸暂停为特征的疾病，夜间多次发生。该病症与睡眠期间肌肉张力松弛相关，导致上气道软组织部分塌陷，从而引起气流阻塞。

HP:0002871.name: Central apnea
HP:0002871.definition: Apnea resulting from depression of the respiratory centers in the medulla oblongata. There is a lack of respiratory effort rather than obstruction of airflow.
HP:0002871.definition_cn: 由于延髓呼吸中枢抑制导致的呼吸暂停。表现为呼吸努力缺乏而非气流阻塞。

HP:0002872.name: Apneic episodes precipitated by illness, fatigue, stress
HP:0002872.definition: Recurrent episodes of apnea that are precipitated by factors such as illness, fatigue, or stress.
HP:0002872.name_cn: 由疾病、疲劳、压力引发的呼吸暂停发作
HP:0002872.definition_cn: 由疾病、疲劳或压力等因素引发的反复发作性呼吸暂停。

HP:0002875.name: Exertional dyspnea
HP:0002875.definition: Perceived difficulty to breathe that occurs with exercise or exertion and improves with rest.
HP:0002875.definition_cn: 运动或体力活动时出现的自觉呼吸困难，休息后缓解。

HP:0002877.name: Nocturnal hypoventilation
HP:0002877.definition: An abnormal reduction in alveolar ventilation occurring during sleep. This is characterized by a rise in arterial carbon dioxide.
HP:0002877.definition_cn: 睡眠期间发生的肺泡通气异常减少，其特征为动脉二氧化碳分压升高。

HP:0002878.name: Respiratory failure
HP:0002878.definition: A severe form of respiratory insufficiency characterized by inadequate gas exchange such that the levels of oxygen or carbon dioxide cannot be maintained within normal limits.
HP:0002878.definition_cn: 一种严重的呼吸功能不全，其特征为气体交换不足，导致氧气或二氧化碳水平无法维持在正常范围内。

HP:0002879.name: Anisospondyly
HP:0002879.definition: Abnormally increased variability of the size of the vertebral bodies.
HP:0002879.definition_cn: 椎体大小异常增加变异性。

HP:0002882.name: Sudden episodic apnea
HP:0002882.definition: Recurrent bouts of sudden, severe apnea that may be life-threatening.
HP:0002882.name_cn: 突发性阵发性呼吸暂停
HP:0002882.definition_cn: 反复发作的突发性严重呼吸暂停，可能危及生命。

HP:0002883.name: Hyperventilation
HP:0002883.definition: Hyperventilation refers to an increased pulmonary ventilation rate that is faster than necessary for the exchange of gases. Hyperventilation can result from increased frequency of breathing, an increased tidal volume, or both, and leads to an excess intake of oxygen and the blowing off of carbon dioxide.
HP:0002883.definition_cn: 过度通气是指肺通气速率增加，超过气体交换所需的速度。过度通气可由呼吸频率增加、潮气量增加或两者共同引起，导致氧气摄入过多和二氧化碳排出过多。

HP:0002884.name: Hepatoblastoma
HP:0002884.definition: A kind of neoplasm of the liver that originates from immature liver precursor cells and macroscopically is composed of tissue resembling fetal or mature liver cells or bile ducts.
HP:0002884.definition_cn: 一种肝脏肿瘤，起源于未成熟的肝脏前体细胞，宏观上由类似胎儿或成熟肝细胞或胆管的组织构成。

HP:0002885.name: Medulloblastoma
HP:0002885.definition: A rapidly growing embryonic tumor arising in the posterior part of the cerebellar vermis and neuroepithelial roof of the fourth ventricle in children. More rarely, medulloblastoma arises in the cerebellum in adults.
HP:0002885.definition_cn: 一种快速生长的胚胎性肿瘤，起源于儿童小脑蚓部后部及第四脑室神经上皮顶。在成人中，髓母细胞瘤较少见地发生于小脑。

HP:0002886.name: Vagal paraganglioma
HP:0002886.definition: A tumor that develops in the retrostyloid compartment of the parapharyngeal space, arising from an island of paraganglion tissue derived from the neural crest that is located on the vagus nerve.
HP:0002886.definition_cn: 发生于咽旁间隙茎突后区的肿瘤，源自位于迷走神经上的神经嵴衍生的副神经节组织岛。

HP:0002888.name: Ependymoma
HP:0002888.definition: The presence of an ependymoma of the central nervous system.
HP:0002888.definition_cn: 中枢神经系统室管膜瘤的存在。

HP:0002890.name: Thyroid carcinoma
HP:0002890.definition: The presence of a carcinoma of the thyroid gland.

HP:0002891.name: Uterine leiomyosarcoma
HP:0002891.definition: The presence of a leiomyosarcoma of the uterus.
HP:0002891.definition_cn: 子宫平滑肌肉瘤的存在。

HP:0002893.name: Pituitary adenoma
HP:0002893.definition: A benign epithelial tumor derived from intrinsic cells of the adenohypophysis (anterior pituitary).
HP:0002893.definition_cn: 一种源自腺垂体（前叶）固有细胞的良性上皮性肿瘤。

HP:0002894.name: Neoplasm of the pancreas
HP:0002894.definition: A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the pancreas.
HP:0002894.definition_cn: 胰腺肿瘤（组织异常增生）

HP:0002895.name: Papillary thyroid carcinoma
HP:0002895.definition: The presence of a papillary adenocarcinoma of the thyroid gland.
HP:0002895.definition_cn: 甲状腺乳头状腺癌的存在。

HP:0002896.name: Neoplasm of the liver
HP:0002896.definition: A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the liver.
HP:0002896.definition_cn: 肝肿瘤（肝脏组织异常增生）

HP:0002897.name: Parathyroid adenoma
HP:0002897.definition: A benign tumor of the parathyroid gland that can cause hyperparathyroidism.
HP:0002897.definition_cn: 甲状旁腺良性肿瘤，可导致甲状旁腺功能亢进症。

HP:0002900.name: Hypokalemia
HP:0002900.definition: An abnormally decreased potassium concentration in the blood.

HP:0002901.name: Hypocalcemia
HP:0002901.definition: An abnormally decreased calcium concentration in the blood.

HP:0002902.name: Hyponatremia
HP:0002902.definition: An abnormally decreased sodium concentration in the blood.

HP:0002904.name: Hyperbilirubinemia
HP:0002904.definition: An increased amount of bilirubin in the blood.

HP:0002905.name: Hyperphosphatemia
HP:0002905.definition: An abnormally increased phosphate concentration in the blood.

HP:0002907.name: Microscopic hematuria
HP:0002907.definition: Microscopic hematuria detected by dipstick or microscopic examination of the urine.
HP:0002907.definition_cn: 通过试纸法或尿液显微镜检查发现的镜下血尿。

HP:0002909.name: Generalized aminoaciduria
HP:0002909.definition: An increased concentration of all types of amino acid in the urine.
HP:0002909.definition_cn: 尿液中所有类型氨基酸浓度升高。

HP:0002910.name: Elevated circulating hepatic transaminase concentration
HP:0002910.definition: Elevations of the levels of SGOT and SGPT in the serum. SGOT (serum glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase) and SGPT (serum glutamic pyruvic transaminase) are transaminases primarily found in the liver and heart and are released into the bloodstream as the result of liver or heart damage. SGOT and SGPT are used clinically mainly as markers of liver damage.
HP:0002910.name_cn: 循环肝转氨酶浓度升高
HP:0002910.definition_cn: 血清中谷草转氨酶（SGOT）和谷丙转氨酶（SGPT）水平升高。谷草转氨酶（血清谷氨酸草酰乙酸转氨酶）和谷丙转氨酶（血清谷氨酸丙酮酸转氨酶）是主要存在于肝脏和心脏中的转氨酶，由于肝脏或心脏损伤而释放入血液。临床上，SGOT和SGPT主要用作肝损伤的标志物。

HP:0002912.name: Methylmalonic acidemia
HP:0002912.definition: Increased concentration of methylmalonic acid in the blood.
HP:0002912.definition_cn: 血液中甲基丙二酸浓度升高。

HP:0002913.name: Myoglobinuria
HP:0002913.definition: Presence of myoglobin in the urine.
HP:0002913.definition_cn: 尿液中肌红蛋白的存在。

HP:0002914.name: Hyperchloriduria
HP:0002914.definition: An increased concentration of chloride in the urine.
HP:0002914.definition_cn: 尿液中氯化物浓度升高。

HP:0002917.name: Hypomagnesemia
HP:0002917.definition: An abnormally decreased magnesium concentration in the blood.

HP:0002918.name: Hypermagnesemia
HP:0002918.definition: An abnormally increased magnesium concentration in the blood.

HP:0002919.name: Ketonuria
HP:0002919.definition: High levels of ketone bodies (acetoacetic acid, beta-hydroxybutyric acid, and acetone) in the urine. Ketone bodies are insignificant in the blood and urine of normal individuals in the postprandial or overnight-fasted state.
HP:0002919.definition_cn: 尿液中酮体（乙酰乙酸、β-羟基丁酸和丙酮）水平升高。在餐后或夜间空腹状态下，正常个体的血液和尿液中酮体含量极低。

HP:0002920.name: Decreased circulating ACTH concentration
HP:0002920.definition: The concentration of corticotropin, also known as adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH), is below the lower limit of normal in the blood circulation.
HP:0002920.name_cn: 循环中促肾上腺皮质激素浓度降低
HP:0002920.definition_cn: 循环血液中促肾上腺皮质激素（Adrenocorticotropic Hormone, ACTH）浓度低于正常值下限。

HP:0002921.name: Abnormal cerebrospinal fluid morphology
HP:0002921.definition: An abnormality of the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).

HP:0002922.name: Increased CSF protein concentration
HP:0002922.definition: Increased concentration of protein in the cerebrospinal fluid.
HP:0002922.definition_cn: 脑脊液蛋白质浓度升高。

HP:0002923.name: Rheumatoid factor positive
HP:0002923.definition: The presence in the serum of an autoantibody directed against the Fc portion of IgG.
HP:0002923.definition_cn: 血清中存在针对IgG Fc段的自身抗体。

HP:0002924.name: obsolete Decreased circulating aldosterone level
HP:0002924.name_cn: 过时的 循环醛固酮水平降低

HP:0002925.name: Elevated circulating thyroid-stimulating hormone concentration
HP:0002925.definition: Increased concentration of thyroid-stimulating hormone (TSH) in the blood circulation.
HP:0002925.name_cn: 循环甲状腺刺激激素浓度升高
HP:0002925.definition_cn: 血清中促甲状腺激素（TSH）浓度升高。

HP:0002926.name: Abnormality of thyroid physiology
HP:0002926.definition: An abnormal functionality of the thyroid gland.

HP:0002927.name: Histidinuria
HP:0002927.definition: An increased concentration of histidine in the urine.
HP:0002927.definition_cn: 尿液中组氨酸浓度升高。

HP:0002928.name: Decreased activity of the pyruvate dehydrogenase complex
HP:0002928.name_cn: 丙酮酸脱氢酶复合体活性降低

HP:0002929.name: Leydig cell insensitivity to gonadotropin
HP:0002929.name_cn: 莱迪格细胞对促性腺激素不敏感

HP:0002930.name: Impaired sensitivity to thyroid hormone
HP:0002930.definition: Reduced sensitivity of end organs to thyroid hormone characterized by elevated serum levels of free thyroid hormone with nonsuppressed thyroid stimulating hormone.
HP:0002930.name_cn: 甲状腺激素敏感性受损
HP:0002930.definition_cn: 终末器官对甲状腺激素敏感性降低，其特征为血清游离甲状腺激素水平升高且甲状腺刺激激素未被抑制。

HP:0002932.name: Aldehyde oxidase deficiency
HP:0002932.definition: A reduction in aldehyde oxidase level.

HP:0002933.name: Ventral hernia
HP:0002933.definition: Ventral hernia refers to a condition in which abdominal contents protrude through a weakened portion of the abdominal wall.
HP:0002933.definition_cn: 腹疝是指腹腔内容物通过腹壁薄弱部分突出的病理状态。

HP:0002936.name: Distal sensory impairment
HP:0002936.definition: An abnormal reduction in sensation in the distal portions of the extremities.
HP:0002936.definition_cn: 远端肢体感觉异常减退

HP:0002937.name: Hemivertebrae
HP:0002937.definition: Absence of one half of the vertebral body.

HP:0002938.name: Lumbar hyperlordosis
HP:0002938.definition: An abnormal accentuation of the inward curvature of the spine in the lumbar region.

HP:0002942.name: Thoracic kyphosis
HP:0002942.definition: Over curvature of the thoracic region, leading to a round back or if sever to a hump.
HP:0002942.definition_cn: 胸椎区域过度弯曲，导致圆背或严重时形成驼背。

HP:0002945.name: Intervertebral space narrowing
HP:0002945.definition: Decreased height of the intervertebral disk.

HP:0002947.name: Cervical kyphosis
HP:0002947.definition: Exaggerated convexity of the cervical vertebral column, causing the cervical spine to bow outwards and take on a rounded appearance.
HP:0002947.definition_cn: 颈椎过度前凸，导致颈椎向外弯曲并呈现圆形外观。

HP:0002948.name: Vertebral fusion
HP:0002948.definition: A developmental defect leading to the union of two adjacent vertebrae.

HP:0002949.name: Fused cervical vertebrae
HP:0002949.definition: A congenital anomaly characterized by a joining (fusion) of two or more cervical vertebral bodies with one another.
HP:0002949.definition_cn: 一种先天性异常，其特征为两个或更多颈椎椎体相互融合。

HP:0002951.name: Partial absence of cerebellar vermis
HP:0002951.definition: Congenital absence of a part of the vermis of cerebellum.
HP:0002951.definition_cn: 小脑蚓部部分先天性缺失。

HP:0002955.name: Granulomatosis
HP:0002955.definition: A granulomatous inflammation leading to multiple granuloma formation, which is a specific type of inflammation. A granuloma is a focal compact collection of inflammatory cells, mononuclear cells predominating, usually as a result of the persistence of a non-degradable product and of active cell mediated hypersensitivity.
HP:0002955.definition_cn: 肉芽肿性炎症导致多发性肉芽肿形成，这是一种特定类型的炎症。肉芽肿是由炎症细胞（以单核细胞为主）形成的局灶性致密聚集，通常是由于不可降解产物的持续存在以及活跃的细胞介导的超敏反应所致。

HP:0002958.name: Immune dysregulation
HP:0002958.definition: Altered immune function characterized by lymphoid proliferation, immune activation, and excessive autoreactivity often leading to autoimmune/inflammatory complications.
HP:0002958.definition_cn: 以淋巴组织增生、免疫激活和过度自身反应为特征的免疫功能改变，常导致自身免疫性/炎症性并发症。

HP:0002959.name: Impaired Ig class switch recombination
HP:0002959.definition: An impairment of the class-switch recombination process that normally leads B lymphocytes to produce IgG, IgA, or IgE.
HP:0002959.name_cn: 免疫球蛋白类别转换重组障碍
HP:0002959.definition_cn: 一种类别转换重组过程的损伤，该过程通常促使B淋巴细胞产生IgG、IgA或IgE。

HP:0002960.name: Autoimmunity
HP:0002960.definition: The occurrence of an immune reaction against the organism's own cells or tissues.

HP:0002961.name: Dysgammaglobulinemia
HP:0002961.definition: Selective deficiency of one or more, but not all, classes of immunoglobulins.
HP:0002961.definition_cn: 选择性免疫球蛋白缺乏症（Selective Immunoglobulin Deficiency）。

HP:0002963.name: Abnormal delayed hypersensitivity skin test
HP:0002963.definition: Delay in cutaneous immune reaction to specific antigens mediated not by antibodies but by cells. The delayed hypersensitivity test is an immune function test measuring the presence of activated T cells that recognize a specific antigen and is performed by injecting a small amount of the antigen into the skin. The area of the injection is examined 48-72 hours thereafter.
HP:0002963.name_cn: 异常迟发型超敏反应皮肤试验
HP:0002963.definition_cn: 由细胞而非抗体介导的对特定抗原的皮肤免疫反应延迟。迟发型超敏反应试验是一种免疫功能检测，用于测量识别特定抗原的活化T细胞的存在，通过将少量抗原注射到皮肤中进行。注射区域在48-72小时后进行检查。

HP:0002965.name: Cutaneous anergy
HP:0002965.definition: Inability to react to a delayed hypersensitivity skin test.
HP:0002965.definition_cn: 迟发型超敏反应皮肤试验无反应性。

HP:0002967.name: Cubitus valgus
HP:0002967.definition: Abnormal positioning in which the elbows are turned out.

HP:0002970.name: Genu varum
HP:0002970.definition: A positional abnormality marked by outward bowing of the legs in which the knees stay wide apart when a person stands with the feet and ankles together.
HP:0002970.definition_cn: 一种体位异常，表现为下肢外翻，当患者双足并拢站立时，双膝间距明显增宽。

HP:0002971.name: Absent microvilli on the surface of peripheral blood lymphocytes
HP:0002971.definition: Absence of the fingerlike protrusive, actin-dependent structures found on the surface of peripheral blood lymphocytes.
HP:0002971.name_cn: 外周血淋巴细胞表面微绒毛缺失
HP:0002971.definition_cn: 外周血淋巴细胞表面缺乏指状突起、肌动蛋白依赖性结构。

HP:0002972.name: Reduced delayed hypersensitivity
HP:0002972.definition: Decreased ability to react to a delayed hypersensitivity skin test.
HP:0002972.definition_cn: 迟发型超敏反应皮肤试验反应能力降低。

HP:0002973.name: Abnormal forearm morphology
HP:0002973.definition: An abnormality of the lower arm.

HP:0002974.name: Radioulnar synostosis
HP:0002974.definition: An abnormal osseous union (fusion) between the radius and the ulna.
HP:0002974.definition_cn: 桡骨与尺骨之间的异常骨性连接（融合）。

HP:0002977.name: Aplasia/Hypoplasia involving the central nervous system
HP:0002977.definition: Absence or underdevelopment of tissue in the central nervous system.
HP:0002977.name_cn: 中枢神经系统发育不全/发育不良
HP:0002977.definition_cn: 中枢神经系统组织缺失或发育不全。

HP:0002979.name: Bowing of the legs
HP:0002979.definition: A bending or abnormal curvature affecting a long bone of the leg.
HP:0002979.definition_cn: 胫骨或股骨弯曲畸形（Bowing deformity of the tibia or femur）

HP:0002981.name: Abnormality of the calf
HP:0002981.definition: An abnormality of the calf, i.e. of the posterior part of the lower leg.
HP:0002981.definition_cn: 小腿后部异常，即下肢后部异常。

HP:0002982.name: Tibial bowing
HP:0002982.definition: A bending or abnormal curvature of the tibia.

HP:0002983.name: Micromelia
HP:0002983.definition: The presence of abnormally small extremities.

HP:0002986.name: Radial bowing
HP:0002986.definition: A bending or abnormal curvature of the radius.

HP:0002987.name: Elbow flexion contracture
HP:0002987.definition: An elbow contracture that limits the ability of the elbow joint to be extended (straightened), meaning that the elbow is fixed in an flexed (bent) position.
HP:0002987.definition_cn: 肘关节挛缩限制了肘关节的伸展能力（伸直），意味着肘关节固定在屈曲（弯曲）位置。

HP:0002991.name: Abnormal fibula morphology
HP:0002991.definition: An anomaly of the calf bone (fibula), one of the two bones of the calf.
HP:0002991.definition_cn: 小腿骨（腓骨）异常，小腿两根骨骼之一。

HP:0002999.name: Patellar dislocation
HP:0002999.definition: The kneecap normally is located within the groove termed trochlea on the distal femur and can slide up and down in it. Patellar dislocation occurs if the patella fully dislocates out of the groove.
HP:0002999.definition_cn: 髌骨通常位于股骨远端称为滑车沟的凹槽内，并可在其中上下滑动。如果髌骨完全脱出滑车沟，则发生髌骨脱位。

HP:0003002.name: Breast carcinoma
HP:0003002.definition: The presence of a carcinoma of the breast.

HP:0003005.name: Ganglioneuroma
HP:0003005.definition: A benign neoplasm that usually arises from the sympathetic trunk in the mediastinum, representing a tumor of the sympathetic nerve fibers arising from neural crest cells.
HP:0003005.definition_cn: 一种良性肿瘤，通常起源于纵隔中的交感神经干，代表由神经嵴细胞产生的交感神经纤维肿瘤。

HP:0003006.name: Neuroblastoma
HP:0003006.definition: Neuroblastoma is a solid tumor that originate in neural crest cells of the sympathetic nervous system. Most neuroblastomas originate in the abdomen, and most abdominal neuroblastomas originate in the adrenal gland. Neuroblastomas can also originate in the thorax, usually in the posterior mediastinum.
HP:0003006.definition_cn: 神经母细胞瘤是一种起源于交感神经系统神经嵴细胞的实体肿瘤。大多数神经母细胞瘤起源于腹部，而大多数腹部神经母细胞瘤则起源于肾上腺。神经母细胞瘤亦可起源于胸腔，通常位于后纵隔。

HP:0003009.name: Enhanced neurotoxicity of vincristine
HP:0003009.name_cn: 长春新碱的神经毒性增强

HP:0003010.name: Prolonged bleeding time
HP:0003010.definition: Prolongation of the time taken for a standardized skin cut of fixed depth and length to stop bleeding.
HP:0003010.definition_cn: 固定深度和长度的标准化皮肤切口止血时间延长。

HP:0003011.name: Abnormality of the musculature
HP:0003011.definition: Abnormality originating in one or more muscles, i.e., of the set of muscles of body.
HP:0003011.definition_cn: 起源于一块或多块肌肉的异常，即身体肌肉群的异常。

HP:0003013.name: Bulging epiphyses
HP:0003013.definition: A morphological abnormality of epiphyses whereby they are abnormally outwardly curving (protuberant).
HP:0003013.definition_cn: 骨骺形态异常，表现为异常向外弯曲（突出）。

HP:0003015.name: Flared metaphysis
HP:0003015.definition: The presence of a splayed (i.e.,flared) metaphyseal segment of one or more long bones.
HP:0003015.definition_cn: 存在一个或多个长骨的干骺端节段呈扇形（即外展）形态。

HP:0003016.name: Metaphyseal widening
HP:0003016.definition: Abnormal widening of the metaphyseal regions of long bones.
HP:0003016.definition_cn: 长骨干骺端区域异常增宽。

HP:0003019.name: Abnormality of the wrist
HP:0003019.definition: Abnormality of the wrist, the structure connecting the hand and the forearm.
HP:0003019.definition_cn: 腕关节异常，即连接手部与前臂的结构异常。

HP:0003021.name: Metaphyseal cupping
HP:0003021.definition: Metaphyseal cupping refers to an inward bulging of the metaphyseal profile giving the metaphysis a cup-like appearance.
HP:0003021.definition_cn: 干骺端杯状凹陷是指干骺端轮廓向内凸起，使干骺端呈现杯状外观。

HP:0003023.name: Bowing of limbs due to multiple fractures
HP:0003023.definition: Curvature of the shafts of the long bones due to multiple fractures.
HP:0003023.name_cn: 多发性骨折导致的肢体弯曲
HP:0003023.definition_cn: 长骨骨干因多次骨折导致的弯曲畸形。

HP:0003025.name: Metaphyseal irregularity
HP:0003025.definition: Irregularity of the normally smooth surface of the metaphyses.
HP:0003025.definition_cn: 干骺端正常光滑表面不规则。

HP:0003026.name: Short long bone
HP:0003026.definition: One or more abnormally short long bone.
HP:0003026.definition_cn: 单发或多发性长骨异常短缩。

HP:0003027.name: Mesomelia
HP:0003027.definition: Shortening of the middle parts of the limbs (forearm and lower leg) in relation to the upper and terminal segments.
HP:0003027.definition_cn: 中段肢体（前臂和小腿）相对于近端和远端节段的缩短。

HP:0003028.name: Abnormality of the ankle
HP:0003028.definition: An anomaly of the joint that connects the foot with the leg.

HP:0003031.name: Ulnar bowing
HP:0003031.definition: Bending of the diaphysis (shaft) of the ulna.

HP:0003034.name: Diaphyseal sclerosis
HP:0003034.definition: An elevation in bone density in one or more diaphyses. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.
HP:0003034.definition_cn: 一处或多处骨干骨密度增高。硬化通常在X线片上表现为局部密度增高区域。

HP:0003037.name: Enlarged joints
HP:0003037.definition: Increase in size of one or more joints.
HP:0003037.definition_cn: 单关节或多关节体积增大。

HP:0003041.name: Humeroradial synostosis
HP:0003041.definition: An abnormal osseous union (fusion) between the radius and the humerus.
HP:0003041.definition_cn: 桡骨与肱骨之间的异常骨性连接（融合）。

HP:0003042.name: Elbow dislocation
HP:0003042.definition: Dislocation of the distal humerus out of the elbow joint, where the radius, ulna, and humerus meet.
HP:0003042.definition_cn: 肱骨远端脱位，发生于肘关节处，即桡骨、尺骨与肱骨交汇处。

HP:0003043.name: Abnormal shoulder morphology
HP:0003043.definition: An abnormality of the shoulder, which is defined as the structures surrounding the shoulder joint where the humerus attaches to the scapula.
HP:0003043.definition_cn: 肩关节异常，定义为肱骨与肩胛骨连接的肩关节周围结构异常。

HP:0003044.name: Shoulder flexion contracture
HP:0003044.definition: Chronic reduction in active and passive mobility of the shoulder joint due to structural changes in muscle, tendons, ligaments, or skin that prevents normal movement.
HP:0003044.definition_cn: 由于肌肉、肌腱、韧带或皮肤的结构性改变导致的肩关节主动和被动活动度慢性受限，从而阻碍正常运动。

HP:0003048.name: Radial head subluxation
HP:0003048.definition: Partial dislocation of the head of the radius.

HP:0003051.name: Enlarged metaphyses
HP:0003051.definition: Abnormal increase in size of one or more metaphyses.
HP:0003051.definition_cn: 一个或多个干骺端异常增大。

HP:0003066.name: Limited knee extension
HP:0003066.definition: Reduced ability to extend (straighten) the knee joint.
HP:0003066.definition_cn: 膝关节伸展（伸直）功能减退。

HP:0003067.name: Madelung deformity
HP:0003067.definition: An anomaly related to partial closure, or failure of development of the ulnar side of the distal radial growth plate, which results in an arrest of epiphyseal growth of the medial and volar portions of the distal radius. This leads to shortening of the radius and relative overgrowth of the ulna.
HP:0003067.definition_cn: 一种与远端桡骨生长板尺侧部分闭合或发育不全相关的异常，导致远端桡骨内侧和掌侧骨骺生长停滞。这导致桡骨缩短和尺骨相对过度生长。

HP:0003071.name: Flattened epiphysis
HP:0003071.definition_cn: 骨骺异常扁平（高度降低）。

HP:0003072.name: Hypercalcemia
HP:0003072.definition: An abnormally increased calcium concentration in the blood.

HP:0003073.name: Hypoalbuminemia
HP:0003073.definition: Reduction in the concentration of albumin in the blood.

HP:0003074.name: Hyperglycemia
HP:0003074.definition: An increased concentration of glucose in the blood.

HP:0003075.name: Hypoproteinemia
HP:0003075.definition: A decreased concentration of protein in the blood.

HP:0003076.name: Glycosuria
HP:0003076.definition: An increased concentration of glucose in the urine.

HP:0003077.name: Hyperlipidemia
HP:0003077.definition: An elevated lipid concentration in the blood.

HP:0003079.name: Defective DNA repair after ultraviolet radiation damage
HP:0003079.name_cn: 紫外线辐射损伤后DNA修复缺陷

HP:0003080.name: Hydroxyprolinuria
HP:0003080.definition: An increased concentration of 4-hydroxy-L-proline in the urine.
HP:0003080.definition_cn: 尿液中4-羟基-L-脯氨酸浓度升高。

HP:0003081.name: Increased urinary potassium
HP:0003081.definition: An increased concentration of potassium(1+) in the urine.
HP:0003081.definition_cn: 尿液中钾离子（K⁺）浓度升高。

HP:0003083.name: Dislocated radial head
HP:0003083.definition: A dislocation of the head of the radius from its socket in the elbow joint.
HP:0003083.definition_cn: 桡骨头从肘关节窝中脱位。

HP:0003084.name: Recurrent long bone fractures
HP:0003084.definition: An increased tendency to fractures of the long bones (Mainly, the femur, tibia, fibula, humerus, radius, and ulna).
HP:0003084.definition_cn: 长骨骨折倾向增加（主要为股骨、胫骨、腓骨、肱骨、桡骨和尺骨）。

HP:0003090.name: Hypoplasia of the capital femoral epiphysis
HP:0003090.definition: Underdevelopment of the proximal epiphysis of the femur.
HP:0003090.definition_cn: 股骨近端骨骺发育不全。

HP:0003091.name: Trophic limb changes
HP:0003091.definition: Trophic changes occurring in a limb.

HP:0003093.name: Limited hip extension
HP:0003093.definition: Limitation of the extension of the hip, i.e., decreased ability to straighten the hip joint and thereby increase the angle between torso and thigh; moving the thigh or top of the pelvis backward.
HP:0003093.definition_cn: 髋关节伸展受限，即髋关节伸直能力下降，从而导致躯干与大腿之间的角度增大；大腿或骨盆顶部向后移动的能力受限。

HP:0003097.name: Short femur
HP:0003097.definition: An abnormal shortening of the femur.

HP:0003099.name: Fibular overgrowth
HP:0003099.definition: Relatively increased growth of the fibula compared to that of the tibia.
HP:0003099.definition_cn: 腓骨相对于胫骨的相对增长增加。

HP:0003100.name: Slender long bone
HP:0003100.definition: Reduced diameter of a long bone.

HP:0003102.name: Increased carrying angle
HP:0003102.definition: An abnormal increase in the carrying angle, which is the angle he long axis of the extended forearm as it lies lateral to the long axis of the arm.
HP:0003102.definition_cn: 携带角异常增大，即伸展前臂长轴与上臂长轴外侧之间的角度异常增加。

HP:0003103.name: Abnormal cortical bone morphology
HP:0003103.definition: An abnormality of compact bone (also known as cortical bone), which forms the dense surface of bones.
HP:0003103.definition_cn: 致密骨（也称为皮质骨）异常，该结构构成骨骼的致密表面。

HP:0003105.name: Protuberances at ends of long bones
HP:0003105.definition: The presence of multiple protuberances (bulges, or knobs) at the ends of the long bones.
HP:0003105.definition_cn: 长骨末端存在多个突起（隆起或结节）。

HP:0003106.name: Subperiosteal bone resorption
HP:0003106.definition: Loss of bone mass occurring beneath the periosteum (the periosteum is the connective-tissue membrane that surrounds all bones except at the articular surfaces). This process may create a serrated and lace-like appearance in periosteal cortical bone.
HP:0003106.definition_cn: 骨膜下骨质丢失（骨膜是覆盖所有骨骼的结缔组织膜，关节面除外）。此过程可能导致骨膜皮质骨呈现锯齿状和花边样外观。

HP:0003107.name: Abnormal circulating cholesterol concentration
HP:0003107.definition: Any deviation from the normal concentration of cholesterol in the blood circulation.
HP:0003107.definition_cn: 任何偏离血液循环中正常胆固醇浓度的异常情况。

HP:0003108.name: Hyperglycinuria
HP:0003108.definition: An increased concentration of glycine in the urine.
HP:0003108.definition_cn: 尿液中甘氨酸浓度升高。

HP:0003109.name: Hyperphosphaturia
HP:0003109.definition: An increased excretion of phosphates in the urine.

HP:0003110.name: Abnormality of urine homeostasis
HP:0003110.definition: An abnormality of the composition of urine or the levels of its components.
HP:0003110.definition_cn: 尿液成分或成分水平的异常。

HP:0003111.name: Abnormal blood ion concentration
HP:0003111.definition: Abnormality of the homeostasis (concentration) of a monoatomic ion.
HP:0003111.definition_cn: 单原子离子稳态（浓度）异常。

HP:0003112.name: Abnormal circulating amino acid concentration
HP:0003112.definition: The presence of an abnormal decrease or increase of one or more amino acids in the blood circulation.
HP:0003112.definition_cn: 血液循环中一种或多种氨基酸的异常减少或增加。

HP:0003113.name: Hypochloremia
HP:0003113.definition: An abnormally decreased chloride concentration in the blood.

HP:0003114.name: obsolete Abnormal cardiological findings
HP:0003114.name_cn: 过时的心脏病学异常发现

HP:0003116.name: obsolete Abnormal echocardiogram
HP:0003116.name_cn: 过时的异常超声心动图

HP:0003117.name: Abnormal circulating hormone concentration
HP:0003117.definition: Concentration of a hormone in the blood circulation outside of normal limits.
HP:0003117.definition_cn: 血液循环中激素浓度超出正常范围。

HP:0003118.name: Increased circulating cortisol level
HP:0003118.definition: Overproduction of the hormone of cortisol by the adrenal cortex, resulting in a characteristic combination of clinical symptoms termed Cushing syndrome, with truncal obesity, a round, full face, striae atrophicae and acne, muscle weakness, and other features.
HP:0003118.definition_cn: 肾上腺皮质过度分泌皮质醇激素，导致一系列特征性临床症状，称为库欣综合征，表现为躯干性肥胖、满月脸、萎缩性条纹和痤疮、肌无力及其他特征。

HP:0003119.name: Abnormal circulating lipid concentration
HP:0003119.definition: Any deviation from the normal concentration of a lipid in the blood circulation.

HP:0003121.name: Limb joint contracture
HP:0003121.definition: A contracture (chronic loss of joint motion due to structural changes in muscle, tendons, ligaments, or skin) that prevent normal movement of one or more joints of the limbs.
HP:0003121.definition_cn: 挛缩（由于肌肉、肌腱、韧带或皮肤的结构性改变导致的关节运动慢性丧失），阻碍四肢一个或多个关节的正常运动。

HP:0003124.name: Hypercholesterolemia
HP:0003124.definition: An increased concentration of cholesterol in the blood.

HP:0003125.name: Reduced factor VIII activity
HP:0003125.definition: Reduced activity of coagulation factor VIII. Factor VIII (fVIII) is a cofactor in the intrinsic clotting cascade that is activated to fVIIIa in the presence of minute quantities of thrombin. fVIIIa acts as a receptor, for factors IXa and X.
HP:0003125.definition_cn: 凝血因子VIII活性降低。凝血因子VIII（fVIII）是内源性凝血级联反应中的一种辅因子，在微量凝血酶存在下被激活为fVIIIa。fVIIIa作为因子IXa和X的受体发挥作用。

HP:0003126.name: Low-molecular-weight proteinuria
HP:0003126.definition: Excretion in urine of proteins of a size smaller than albumin (molecular weight 69 kD).
HP:0003126.definition_cn: 尿液中分子量小于白蛋白（分子量69 kD）的蛋白质排泄。

HP:0003127.name: Hypocalciuria
HP:0003127.definition: An abnormally decreased calcium concentration in the urine.

HP:0003128.name: Lactic acidosis
HP:0003128.definition: An abnormal buildup of lactic acid in the body, leading to acidification of the blood and other bodily fluids.
HP:0003128.definition_cn: 体内乳酸异常积聚，导致血液及其他体液酸化。

HP:0003130.name: Abnormal peripheral myelination
HP:0003130.definition: An abnormality of the myelination of motor and sensory peripheral nerves. These are axons for motor nerves and dendrites for sensory nerves in the strict anatomic sense.
HP:0003130.name_cn: 周围神经髓鞘形成异常
HP:0003130.definition_cn: 运动及感觉周围神经髓鞘形成异常。严格解剖学意义上，这些是运动神经的轴突和感觉神经的树突。

HP:0003131.name: Cystinuria
HP:0003131.definition: An increased concentration of cystine in the urine.
HP:0003131.definition_cn: 尿液中胱氨酸浓度升高。

HP:0003133.name: Abnormality of the spinocerebellar tracts
HP:0003133.definition: An abnormality of the spinocerebellar tracts, a set of axonal fibers originating in the spinal cord and terminating in the ipsilateral cerebellum. The spinocerebellar tract convey information to the cerebellum about limb and joint position (proprioception). They comprise the ventral spinocerebellar tract, the anterior spinocerebellar tract, and the posterior spinocerebellar tract.
HP:0003133.definition_cn: 脊髓小脑束异常，该束为起源于脊髓并终止于同侧小脑的一组轴突纤维。脊髓小脑束向小脑传递关于肢体和关节位置（本体感觉）的信息。其包括腹侧脊髓小脑束、前脊髓小脑束和后脊髓小脑束。

HP:0003134.name: Abnormality of peripheral nerve conduction
HP:0003134.definition: An abnormality of the conduction of electrical impulses by peripheral (motor or sensory) nerves. This finding is elicited by a nerve conduction study (NCS).
HP:0003134.definition_cn: 周围神经（运动或感觉）电冲动传导异常。该发现通过神经传导研究（NCS）引出。

HP:0003137.name: Prolinuria
HP:0003137.definition: Level of proline in the urine anove the upper limit of normal.
HP:0003137.definition_cn: 尿液中脯氨酸水平高于正常值上限。

HP:0003138.name: Increased blood urea nitrogen
HP:0003138.definition: An increased amount of nitrogen in the form of urea in the blood.
HP:0003138.definition_cn: 血液中尿素形式的氮含量升高。

HP:0003139.name: Panhypogammaglobulinemia
HP:0003139.definition: A reduction in the circulating levels of all the major classes of immunoglobulin. is characterized by profound decreases in all classes of immunoglobulin with an absence of circulating B lymphocytes.
HP:0003139.definition_cn: 所有主要免疫球蛋白类别的循环水平降低，其特征是所有类别的免疫球蛋白显著减少，且循环中缺乏B淋巴细胞。

HP:0003140.name: T-wave inversion in the right precordial leads

HP:0003141.name: Increased LDL cholesterol concentration
HP:0003141.definition: An elevated concentration of low-density lipoprotein cholesterol in the blood.
HP:0003141.name_cn: 低密度脂蛋白胆固醇浓度升高
HP:0003141.definition_cn: 血液中低密度脂蛋白胆固醇浓度升高。

HP:0003144.name: Increased serum serotonin
HP:0003144.definition: A increased concentration of serotonin in the blood.
HP:0003144.definition_cn: 血液中血清素浓度升高。

HP:0003145.name: Decreased circulating adenosylcobalamin concentration
HP:0003145.definition: The concentration of adenosylcobalam in the blood circulation is below the lower limit of normal. Adenosylcobalamin is one of the active forms of vitamin B12.
HP:0003145.name_cn: 循环腺苷钴胺浓度降低
HP:0003145.definition_cn: 血液循环中腺苷钴胺浓度低于正常值下限。腺苷钴胺是维生素B12的活性形式之一。

HP:0003146.name: Hypocholesterolemia
HP:0003146.definition: An decreased concentration of cholesterol in the blood.

HP:0003149.name: Hyperuricosuria
HP:0003149.definition: An abnormally high level of uric acid in the urine.

HP:0003150.name: Glutaric aciduria
HP:0003150.definition: The concentration of glutaric acid in the urine, normalized for urine concentration, is above the upper limit of normal.
HP:0003150.definition_cn: 尿液中戊二酸浓度经尿液浓度校正后高于正常上限值。

HP:0003152.name: obsolete Increased serum 1,25-dihydroxyvitamin D3
HP:0003152.name_cn: 血清1,25-二羟基维生素D3水平升高

HP:0003153.name: Cystathioninuria
HP:0003153.definition: An elevated urinary concentration of cystathionine.

HP:0003154.name: Increased circulating ACTH level
HP:0003154.definition: An abnormal increased in the concentration of corticotropin, also known as adrenocorticotropic hormone (ACTH), in the blood.
HP:0003154.name_cn: 循环中促肾上腺皮质激素水平升高
HP:0003154.definition_cn: 血液中促肾上腺皮质激素（ACTH）浓度异常升高。

HP:0003155.name: Elevated circulating alkaline phosphatase concentration
HP:0003155.definition: Abnormally increased serum levels of alkaline phosphatase activity.
HP:0003155.name_cn: 循环碱性磷酸酶浓度升高
HP:0003155.definition_cn: 血清碱性磷酸酶活性异常升高。

HP:0003158.name: Hyposthenuria
HP:0003158.definition: An abnormally low urinary specific gravity, i.e., reduced concentration of solutes in the urine.
HP:0003158.definition_cn: 尿比重异常降低，即尿液中溶质浓度减少。

HP:0003159.name: Hyperoxaluria
HP:0003159.definition: Increased excretion of oxalates in the urine.
HP:0003159.definition_cn: 尿液中草酸盐排泄增加。

HP:0003160.name: Abnormal isoelectric focusing of serum transferrin
HP:0003160.definition: Glycosylated transferrin concentrations can be measured in serum as a marker of N-linked glycosylation fidelity. In the traditional nomenclature for congenital disorders of glycosylation, absence of entire glycans was designated type I, and loss of one or more monosaccharides as type II. These terms are retained for historical reasons but for new annotations the precise glycosylation defect should be recorded.
HP:0003160.name_cn: 血清转铁蛋白异常等电聚焦
HP:0003160.definition_cn: 糖基化转铁蛋白浓度可在血清中测量，作为N-连接糖基化保真度的标志物。在先天性糖基化障碍的传统命名法中，整个聚糖的缺失被指定为I型，而一个或多个单糖的缺失被指定为II型。出于历史原因，这些术语得以保留，但对于新的注释，应记录确切的糖基化缺陷。

HP:0003161.name: 4-Hydroxyphenylpyruvic aciduria
HP:0003161.definition: Increased relative concentration of 4-hydroxyphenylpyruvic acid in the urine.
HP:0003161.definition_cn: 尿液中4-羟基苯丙酮酸相对浓度升高。

HP:0003163.name: Elevated urinary delta-aminolevulinic acid
HP:0003163.definition: An increased concentration of 5-aminolevulinic acid (CHEBI:17549) in the urine.
HP:0003163.name_cn: 尿中δ-氨基乙酰丙酸升高
HP:0003163.definition_cn: 尿液中5-氨基乙酰丙酸（CHEBI:17549）浓度升高。

HP:0003164.name: Hypothalamic gonadotropin-releasing hormone deficiency
HP:0003164.name_cn: 下丘脑促性腺激素释放激素缺乏症

HP:0003165.name: Elevated circulating parathyroid hormone level
HP:0003165.definition: An abnormal increased concentration of parathyroid hormone.
HP:0003165.name_cn: 循环中甲状旁腺激素水平升高
HP:0003165.definition_cn: 甲状旁腺激素异常增高浓度。

HP:0003166.name: Increased urinary taurine
HP:0003166.definition: Increased concentration of taurine in the urine.
HP:0003166.definition_cn: 尿液中牛磺酸浓度升高。

HP:0003167.name: Carnosinuria
HP:0003167.definition: An increased concentration of carnosine in the urine.

HP:0003168.name: Dibasicaminoaciduria
HP:0003168.definition: An increased level of a dibasic amino acid in the urine. Dibasic amino acids are usually referred to simply as basic aminoacids because they contain basic side chains at neutral pH. These are arginine (Arg), lysine (Lys), and histidine (His).
HP:0003168.definition_cn: 尿液中二碱基氨基酸水平升高。二碱基氨基酸通常简称为碱性氨基酸，因为它们在生理pH值下含有碱性侧链。这些氨基酸包括精氨酸（Arg）、赖氨酸（Lys）和组氨酸（His）。

HP:0003170.name: Abnormal acetabulum morphology
HP:0003170.definition: An abnormality of the acetabulum, i.e., the Acetabular part of hip bone, which together with the head of the femur forms the hip joint.
HP:0003170.definition_cn: 髋臼异常，即髋骨的髋臼部分，与股骨头共同构成髋关节。

HP:0003172.name: Abnormal pubic bone morphology
HP:0003172.definition: An anomaly of the the pubic bone, i.e., of the ventral and anterior of the three principal components (pubis, ilium, ischium) of the hip bone.
HP:0003172.definition_cn: 耻骨异常，即髋骨三个主要组成部分（耻骨、髂骨、坐骨）中腹侧和前侧部分的异常。

HP:0003173.name: Hypoplastic pubic bone
HP:0003173.definition: Underdevelopment of the pubis, which together with the ilium and the ischium, is one of the three bones that make up the hip bone.
HP:0003173.definition_cn: 耻骨发育不全，耻骨与髂骨和坐骨共同构成髋骨的三个组成部分之一。

HP:0003174.name: Abnormal ischium morphology
HP:0003174.definition: An anomaly of the ischium, which forms the lower and back part of the hip bone.
HP:0003174.definition_cn: 坐骨异常，坐骨构成髋骨的下部和后部。

HP:0003175.name: Hypoplastic ischia
HP:0003175.definition: Underdevelopment of the ischium, which forms the lower and back part of the hip bone.
HP:0003175.definition_cn: 坐骨发育不全，坐骨构成髋骨的下部和后部。

HP:0003177.name: Squared iliac bones
HP:0003177.definition: A shift from the normally round (convex) appearance of the iliac wing towards a square-like appearance.
HP:0003177.definition_cn: 髂骨翼从正常的圆形（凸面）外观向方形外观转变。

HP:0003179.name: Protrusio acetabuli
HP:0003179.definition: Intrapelvic bulging of the medial acetabular wall.
HP:0003179.definition_cn: 髋臼内侧壁骨盆内膨出。

HP:0003180.name: Flat acetabular roof
HP:0003180.definition: Flattening of the superior part of the acetabulum, which is a cup-shaped cavity at the base of the hipbone into which the ball-shaped head of the femur fits. The acetabular roof thereby appears horizontal rather than arched, as it normally does.
HP:0003180.definition_cn: 髋臼上部扁平化，髋臼为位于髋骨基底的杯状腔，股骨头球状端嵌入其中。髋臼顶因此呈现水平状而非正常的拱形。

HP:0003183.name: Wide pubic symphysis
HP:0003183.definition: Abnormally increased width of the pubic symphysis is the midline cartilaginous joint uniting the superior rami of the left and right pubic bones.
HP:0003183.definition_cn: 耻骨联合异常增宽是指连接左右耻骨上支的中线软骨关节的宽度异常增加。

HP:0003184.name: Decreased hip abduction
HP:0003184.definition: Reduced ability to move the femur outward to the side.

HP:0003185.name: Short greater sciatic notch
HP:0003185.definition: The sacroiliac joint in the bony pelvis connects the sacrum and the ilium of the pelvis, which are joined by strong ligaments. The notch is located directly superior to the joint. This term refers to a reduction in the height of the notch.
HP:0003185.definition_cn: 骶髂关节位于骨盆骨性结构中，连接骶骨与髂骨，并由强韧的韧带固定。切迹位于该关节的正上方。此术语指切迹高度的降低。

HP:0003186.name: Inverted nipples
HP:0003186.definition: The presence of nipples that instead of pointing outward are retracted inwards.

HP:0003187.name: Breast hypoplasia
HP:0003187.definition_cn: 乳房发育不全（Hypoplasia of the breast）。

HP:0003189.name: Long nose
HP:0003189.definition: Distance from nasion to subnasale more than two standard deviations above the mean, or alternatively, an apparently increased length from the nasal root to the nasal base.
HP:0003189.name_cn: 鼻延长术（Rhinoplasty with nasal lengthening）
HP:0003189.definition_cn: 鼻根点到鼻下点的距离超过平均值两个标准差以上，或从鼻根到鼻基底的长度明显增加。

HP:0003191.name: Cleft ala nasi
HP:0003191.definition: The presence of a notch in the margin of the ala nasi.

HP:0003193.name: Allergic rhinitis
HP:0003193.definition: It is characterized by one or more symptoms including sneezing, itching, nasal congestion, and rhinorrhea.
HP:0003193.definition_cn: 其特征表现为一种或多种症状，包括打喷嚏、瘙痒、鼻塞和鼻漏。

HP:0003194.name: Short nasal bridge
HP:0003194.definition: Decreased superior-inferior length of the nasal bridge, which is the saddle-shaped area that includes the nasal root and the lateral aspects of the nose.
HP:0003194.definition_cn: 鼻梁上下长度缩短，鼻梁为鞍形区域，包括鼻根及鼻外侧部分。

HP:0003196.name: Short nose
HP:0003196.definition: Distance from nasion to subnasale more than two standard deviations below the mean, or alternatively, an apparently decreased length from the nasal root to the nasal tip.
HP:0003196.definition_cn: 鼻根点至鼻下点的距离低于平均值两个标准差以上，或表现为从鼻根至鼻尖的长度明显缩短。

HP:0003198.name: Myopathy
HP:0003198.definition: A disorder of muscle unrelated to impairment of innervation or neuromuscular junction.

HP:0003200.name: Ragged-red muscle fibers
HP:0003200.definition: An abnormal appearance of muscle fibers observed on muscle biopsy. Ragged red fibers can be visualized with Gomori trichrome staining as irregular and intensely red subsarcolemmal zones, whereas the normal myofibrils are green. The margins of affect fibers appear red and ragged. The ragged-red is due to the accumulation of abnormal mitochondria below the plasma membrane of the muscle fiber, leading to the appearance of a red rim and speckled sarcoplasm.
HP:0003200.definition_cn: 在肌肉活检中观察到的肌纤维异常表现。使用Gomori三色染色法可观察到蓬毛样红纤维（Ragged red fibers），表现为不规则且强烈染红的肌膜下区域，而正常的肌原纤维呈绿色。受累纤维的边缘呈现红色且不规则。这种蓬毛样红纤维是由于肌纤维质膜下异常线粒体的积聚所致，导致红色边缘和斑点状肌浆的出现。

HP:0003201.name: Rhabdomyolysis
HP:0003201.definition: Breakdown of muscle fibers that leads to the release of muscle fiber contents (myoglobin) into the bloodstream.
HP:0003201.definition_cn: 横纹肌溶解症，导致肌纤维内容物（肌红蛋白）释放进入血液循环。

HP:0003202.name: Skeletal muscle atrophy
HP:0003202.definition: The presence of skeletal muscular atrophy (which is also known as amyotrophy).
HP:0003202.definition_cn: 骨骼肌萎缩（亦称肌萎缩）的存在。

HP:0003203.name: Impaired oxidative burst
HP:0003203.definition: In the NBT test, neutrophils change the colorless compound NBT into a compound with a deep blue color. If this test is negative (i.e., no blue color is produced), then this indicates a defect in superoxide-generating NADPH oxidase activity with inability to efficiently kill phagocytized bacteria.
HP:0003203.definition_cn: 在中性粒细胞硝基蓝四氮唑（NBT）试验中，中性粒细胞将无色的硝基蓝四氮唑（NBT）化合物转化为深蓝色的化合物。若该试验结果为阴性（即未产生蓝色），则表明超氧化物生成所需的NADPH氧化酶活性存在缺陷，导致无法有效杀灭被吞噬的细菌。

HP:0003204.name: Intracellular accumulation of autofluorescent lipopigment storage material
HP:0003204.definition: The intracellular accumulation of autofluorescent storage material.
HP:0003204.name_cn: 细胞内自体荧光脂色素储存物质的积聚
HP:0003204.definition_cn: 细胞内自体荧光储存物质的积聚。

HP:0003205.name: Curvilinear intracellular accumulation of autofluorescent lipopigment storage material
HP:0003205.definition: An intracellular accumulation of autofluorescent lipopigment storage material in a curved pattern.
HP:0003205.name_cn: 细胞内曲线状自体荧光脂褐素沉积物质积聚
HP:0003205.definition_cn: 细胞内呈弯曲模式的自发荧光脂褐素储存物质的积聚。

HP:0003207.name: Arterial calcification
HP:0003207.definition: Pathological deposition of calcium salts in one or more arteries.

HP:0003208.name: Fingerprint intracellular accumulation of autofluorescent lipopigment storage material
HP:0003208.definition: An intracellular accumulation of autofluorescent lipopigment storage material in a trabecular or fingerprint-like pattern.
HP:0003208.name_cn: 指纹状细胞内自荧光脂褐素储存物质积聚
HP:0003208.definition_cn: 细胞内以网状或指纹样模式积聚的自发荧光脂褐素储存物质。

HP:0003209.name: Decreased pyruvate carboxylase activity
HP:0003209.definition: A decreased rate of pyruvate carboxylase activity.
HP:0003209.name_cn: 丙酮酸羧化酶活性降低
HP:0003209.definition_cn: 丙酮酸羧化酶活性降低。

HP:0003210.name: Decreased methylmalonyl-CoA mutase activity
HP:0003210.definition: An abnormality of Krebs cycle metabolism that is characterized by a decreased rate of methylmalonyl-CoA mutase activity.
HP:0003210.name_cn: 甲基丙二酰辅酶A变位酶活性降低
HP:0003210.definition_cn: 三羧酸循环代谢异常，其特征为甲基丙二酰辅酶A变位酶活性降低。

HP:0003212.name: Increased circulating IgE concentration
HP:0003212.definition: An abnormally increased overall level of immunoglobulin E in blood.
HP:0003212.definition_cn: 血清免疫球蛋白E水平异常升高。

HP:0003213.name: Deficient excision of UV-induced pyrimidine dimers in DNA
HP:0003213.name_cn: 紫外线诱导的DNA嘧啶二聚体切除缺陷

HP:0003214.name: Prolonged G2 phase of cell cycle

HP:0003215.name: Dicarboxylic aciduria
HP:0003215.definition: An increased concentration of dicarboxylic acid in the urine.
HP:0003215.definition_cn: 尿液中二羧酸浓度升高。

HP:0003216.name: Generalized amyloid deposition
HP:0003216.name_cn: 全身性淀粉样物质沉积

HP:0003217.name: Hyperglutaminemia
HP:0003217.definition: An increased concentration of glutamine in the blood.

HP:0003218.name: Oroticaciduria
HP:0003218.definition: An increased concentration of orotic acid in the urine.
HP:0003218.definition_cn: 尿液中乳清酸浓度升高。

HP:0003219.name: Ethylmalonic aciduria
HP:0003219.definition: The concentration of ethylmalonic acid in the urine, normalized for urine concentration, is above the upper limit of normal.
HP:0003219.definition_cn: 尿液中乙基丙二酸浓度经尿液浓度校正后高于正常上限。

HP:0003220.name: Abnormality of chromosome stability
