HP:0003220.definition: A type of chromosomal aberration characterized by reduced resistance of chromosomes to change or deterioration.
HP:0003220.definition_cn: 一种染色体畸变类型，其特征为染色体对改变或退化的抵抗力降低。

HP:0003221.name: Chromosomal breakage induced by crosslinking agents
HP:0003221.definition: Increased amount of chromosomal breaks in cultured blood lymphocytes or other cells induced by treatment with DNA cross-linking agents such as diepoxybutane and mitomycin C.
HP:0003221.name_cn: 交联剂诱导的染色体断裂
HP:0003221.definition_cn: 经DNA交联剂（如二环氧丁烷和丝裂霉素C）处理后，培养的血液淋巴细胞或其他细胞中染色体断裂数量增加。

HP:0003223.name: Decreased circulating methylcobalamin concentration
HP:0003223.definition: The concentration of methylcobalamin in the blood circulation is below the lower limit of normal. Methylcobalamin is a form of vitamin B12.
HP:0003223.name_cn: 循环甲基钴胺浓度降低
HP:0003223.definition_cn: 血液中甲基钴胺素的浓度低于正常值下限。甲基钴胺素是维生素B12的一种形式。

HP:0003224.name: Increased cellular sensitivity to UV light
HP:0003224.name_cn: 细胞对紫外线的敏感性增加

HP:0003225.name: Reduced coagulation factor V activity
HP:0003225.definition: Decreased activity of coagulation factor V.

HP:0003226.name: Rectilinear intracellular accumulation of autofluorescent lipopigment storage material
HP:0003226.definition: An intracellular accumulation of autofluorescent lipopigment storage material in a straight or rectilinear pattern.
HP:0003226.name_cn: 直线性细胞内自体荧光脂色素储存物质积聚
HP:0003226.definition_cn: 细胞内以直线或线性模式积累的自发荧光脂褐素储存物质。

HP:0003228.name: Hypernatremia
HP:0003228.definition: An abnormally increased sodium concentration in the blood.

HP:0003231.name: Hypertyrosinemia
HP:0003231.definition: An increased concentration of tyrosine in the blood.

HP:0003232.name: Mitochondrial malic enzyme reduced
HP:0003232.name_cn: 线粒体苹果酸酶活性降低

HP:0003233.name: Decreased HDL cholesterol concentration
HP:0003233.definition: An decreased concentration of high-density lipoprotein cholesterol in the blood.
HP:0003233.name_cn: 高密度脂蛋白胆固醇浓度降低
HP:0003233.definition_cn: 血液中高密度脂蛋白胆固醇浓度降低。

HP:0003234.name: Decreased circulating carnitine concentration
HP:0003234.definition: Concentration of carnitine in the blood circulation below the lower limit of normal.
HP:0003234.definition_cn: 血液循环中肉碱浓度低于正常值下限。

HP:0003235.name: Hypermethioninemia
HP:0003235.definition: An increased concentration of methionine in the blood.
HP:0003235.definition_cn: 血液中甲硫氨酸浓度升高。

HP:0003236.name: Elevated circulating creatine kinase concentration
HP:0003236.definition: An elevation of the level of the enzyme creatine kinase (also known as creatine phosphokinase (CK; EC 2.7.3.2) in the blood. CK levels can be elevated in a number of clinical disorders such as myocardial infarction, rhabdomyolysis, and muscular dystrophy.
HP:0003236.name_cn: 循环肌酸激酶浓度升高
HP:0003236.definition_cn: 血清中肌酸激酶（Creatine Kinase，亦称肌酸磷酸激酶，CK；EC 2.7.3.2）水平升高。肌酸激酶水平可在多种临床疾病中升高，如心肌梗死、横纹肌溶解症和肌营养不良症。

HP:0003237.name: Increased circulating IgG concentration
HP:0003237.definition: An abnormally increased level of immunoglobulin G in blood.
HP:0003237.definition_cn: 血清免疫球蛋白G水平异常升高

HP:0003239.name: Phosphoethanolaminuria
HP:0003239.definition: An increased level of phosphoethanolamine (synonym: O-phosphoethanolamine) in the urine.
HP:0003239.definition_cn: 尿液中磷酸乙醇胺（同义词：O-磷酸乙醇胺）水平升高。

HP:0003240.name: Increased phosphoribosylpyrophosphate synthetase level
HP:0003240.definition: Abnormally elevated level of the enzyme phosphoribosyl pyrophosphatesynthetase, which catalyzes the synthesis of PP-ribose-P from ATP and ribose-5-phosphate.
HP:0003240.name_cn: 磷酸核糖焦磷酸合成酶水平升高
HP:0003240.definition_cn: 磷酸核糖焦磷酸合成酶（Phosphoribosyl Pyrophosphate Synthetase）水平异常升高，该酶催化从三磷酸腺苷（ATP）和5-磷酸核糖（Ribose-5-Phosphate）合成磷酸核糖焦磷酸（PP-Ribose-P）的反应。

HP:0003241.name: External genital hypoplasia
HP:0003241.definition: Underdevelopment of part or all of the external reproductive organs.
HP:0003241.definition_cn: 外生殖器部分或全部发育不全。

HP:0003244.name: Penile hypospadias
HP:0003244.definition: Location of the urethral opening on the inferior aspect of the penis.

HP:0003246.name: Prominent scrotal raphe
HP:0003246.definition: Increased size of the ridge of tissue that extends along the midline of the scrotum.
HP:0003246.definition_cn: 阴囊中线延伸的组织嵴增大。

HP:0003248.name: Gonadal tissue inappropriate for external genitalia or chromosomal sex
HP:0003248.name_cn: 生殖腺组织与外部生殖器或染色体性别不符

HP:0003254.name: Abnormality of DNA repair
HP:0003254.definition: An abnormality of the process of DNA repair, that is, of the process of restoring DNA after damage.
HP:0003254.definition_cn: DNA修复过程异常，即DNA损伤后恢复过程的异常。

HP:0003256.name: Abnormality of the coagulation cascade
HP:0003256.definition: An abnormality of the coagulation cascade, which is comprised of the contact activation pathway (also known as the intrinsic pathway) and the tissue factor pathway (also known as the extrinsic pathway) as well as cofactors and regulators.
HP:0003256.definition_cn: 凝血级联反应异常，包括接触激活途径（也称为内源性途径）和组织因子途径（也称为外源性途径），以及辅因子和调节因子。

HP:0003259.name: Elevated circulating creatinine concentration
HP:0003259.definition: An increased amount of creatinine in the blood.

HP:0003260.name: Hydroxyprolinemia
HP:0003260.definition: An increased concentration of hydroxyproline in the blood.
HP:0003260.definition_cn: 血液中羟脯氨酸浓度升高。

HP:0003261.name: Increased circulating IgA concentration
HP:0003261.definition: An abnormally increased level of immunoglobulin A in blood.
HP:0003261.name_cn: 循环免疫球蛋白A（IgA）浓度升高
HP:0003261.definition_cn: 血清免疫球蛋白A水平异常升高

HP:0003262.name: Anti-smooth muscle antibody positivity
HP:0003262.definition: The presence in serum of antibodies against smooth muscle.
HP:0003262.definition_cn: 血清中存在抗平滑肌抗体。

HP:0003264.name: Deficiency of N-acetylglucosamine-1-phosphotransferase
HP:0003264.name_cn: N-乙酰葡糖胺-1-磷酸转移酶缺乏症

HP:0003265.name: Neonatal hyperbilirubinemia
HP:0003265.definition: A type of hyperbilirubinemia with neonatal onset.
HP:0003265.definition_cn: 一种新生儿期发病的高胆红素血症。

HP:0003267.name: Reduced orotidine 5-prime phosphate decarboxylase level
HP:0003267.definition: An abnormal decrease in orotidine 5'-phosphate decarboxylase level.
HP:0003267.name_cn: 5'-磷酸乳清酸脱羧酶水平降低
HP:0003267.definition_cn: 乳清酸核苷-5'-磷酸脱羧酶水平异常降低。

HP:0003268.name: Argininuria
HP:0003268.definition: A increased concentration of arginine in the urine.
HP:0003268.definition_cn: 尿液中精氨酸浓度升高。

HP:0003269.name: Sudanophilic leukodystrophy
HP:0003269.name_cn: 嗜苏丹性脑白质营养不良

HP:0003271.name: Visceromegaly
HP:0003271.definition: Abnormal increased size of the viscera of the abdomen.

HP:0003272.name: Abnormal hip bone morphology
HP:0003272.definition: An abnormality of the hip bone.

HP:0003273.name: Hip contracture
HP:0003273.definition: Lack of full passive range of motion (restrictions in flexion, extension, or other movements) of the hip joint resulting from structural changes of non-bony tissues, such as muscles, tendons, ligaments, joint capsules and/or skin.
HP:0003273.definition_cn: 由于非骨性组织（如肌肉、肌腱、韧带、关节囊和/或皮肤）的结构性改变导致的髋关节被动活动范围受限（屈曲、伸展或其他运动受限）。

HP:0003275.name: Narrow pelvis bone
HP:0003275.definition: Reduced side to side width of the pelvis.

HP:0003276.name: Pelvic bone exostoses
HP:0003276.definition: A benign growth the projects outward from the bone surface of the pelvis. Exostoses are capped by cartilage, and arise from a bone that develops from cartilage.
HP:0003276.definition_cn: 一种良性生长物，从骨盆骨表面向外突出。外生骨疣由软骨覆盖，起源于由软骨发育而成的骨骼。

HP:0003278.name: Square pelvis bone
HP:0003278.definition: An abnormally squared appearance of the bony pelvis, a normally rounded or basin-shaped structure.
HP:0003278.definition_cn: 骨性骨盆异常方形外观，通常为圆形或盆状结构。

HP:0003279.name: Coxa magna
HP:0003279.definition: Widening of the femoral head and neck.

HP:0003281.name: Increased circulating ferritin concentration
HP:0003281.definition: Increased concentration of ferritin in the blood circulation.

HP:0003282.name: Low alkaline phosphatase
HP:0003282.definition: Abnormally reduced serum levels of alkaline phosphatase.
HP:0003282.definition_cn: 血清碱性磷酸酶水平异常降低。

HP:0003286.name: Cystathioninemia
HP:0003286.definition: An increased concentration of cystathionine in the blood.
HP:0003286.definition_cn: 血液中胱硫醚浓度升高。

HP:0003288.name: Mitochondrial propionyl-CoA carboxylase defect
HP:0003288.name_cn: 线粒体丙酰辅酶A羧化酶缺陷

HP:0003292.name: Decreased serum leptin
HP:0003292.definition: A decreased concentration of leptin in the blood.

HP:0003295.name: obsolete Impaired FSH and LH secretion
HP:0003295.name_cn: 过时的促卵泡激素（FSH）和黄体生成素（LH）分泌受损

HP:0003296.name: Hyperthreoninuria
HP:0003296.definition: An increased concentration of threonine in the urine.
HP:0003296.definition_cn: 尿液中苏氨酸浓度升高。

HP:0003297.name: Hyperlysinuria
HP:0003297.definition: An increased concentration of lysine in the urine.
HP:0003297.definition_cn: 尿液中赖氨酸浓度升高。

HP:0003298.name: Spina bifida occulta
HP:0003298.definition: The closed form of spina bifida with incomplete closure of a vertebral body with intact overlying skin.
HP:0003298.definition_cn: 隐性脊柱裂伴椎体闭合不全且覆盖皮肤完整。

HP:0003300.name: Ovoid vertebral bodies
HP:0003300.definition: When viewed in lateral radiographs, vertebral bodies have a roughly rectangular configuration. This term applies if the vertebral body appears rounded or oval.
HP:0003300.definition_cn: 在侧位X线片中，椎体呈大致矩形结构。若椎体呈现圆形或椭圆形，则使用此术语描述。

HP:0003301.name: Irregular vertebral endplates
HP:0003301.definition: An irregular surface of the vertebral end plates, which are normally relatively smooth.
HP:0003301.definition_cn: 椎体终板表面不规则，通常相对光滑。

HP:0003302.name: Spondylolisthesis
HP:0003302.definition: Complete bilateral fractures of the pars interarticularis resulting in the anterior slippage of the vertebra.
HP:0003302.definition_cn: 双侧椎弓峡部完全性骨折导致椎体前滑脱。

HP:0003304.name: Spondylolysis
HP:0003304.definition: Spondylolysis is an osseous defect of the pars interarticularis, thought to be a developmental or acquired stress fracture secondary to chronic low-grade trauma.
HP:0003304.definition_cn: 脊椎滑脱症是关节突间部的骨性缺损，被认为是一种继发于慢性低度创伤的发育性或获得性应力性骨折。

HP:0003305.name: Block vertebrae
HP:0003305.definition: Congenital synostosis between two or more adjacent vertebrae (partial or complete fusion of adjacent vertabral bodies).
HP:0003305.definition_cn: 先天性相邻两个或多个椎体间的骨性连接（相邻椎体部分或完全融合）。

HP:0003306.name: Spinal rigidity
HP:0003306.definition: Reduced ability to move the vertebral column with a resulting limitation of neck and trunk flexion.
HP:0003306.definition_cn: 脊柱活动能力减退，导致颈部和躯干屈曲受限。

HP:0003307.name: Hyperlordosis
HP:0003307.definition: Abnormally increased curvature (anterior concavity) of the lumbar or cervical spine.
HP:0003307.definition_cn: 腰椎或颈椎异常增加的曲度（前凹）。

HP:0003308.name: Cervical subluxation
HP:0003308.definition: A partial dislocation of one or more intervertebral joints in the cervical vertebral column.

HP:0003310.name: Abnormal odontoid process morphology
HP:0003310.definition: Abnormal structure of the odontoid process, which is a part of the C2 or axis vertebra and forms pivot of the structures forming the craniovertebral junction. The odontoid process is also known as the dens of the axis.
HP:0003310.definition_cn: 齿状突结构异常，齿状突是C2椎体（即枢椎）的一部分，构成颅椎交界区的枢轴结构。齿状突亦称为枢椎齿突。

HP:0003311.name: Hypoplasia of the odontoid process
HP:0003311.definition: Developmental hypoplasia of the dens of the axis.

HP:0003312.name: Abnormal form of the vertebral bodies

HP:0003316.name: Butterfly vertebrae
HP:0003316.definition: A butterfly vertebra (sagittal cleft vertebra or anterior rachischisis) is a sagittal defect in the vertebral body caused by failure of fusion of the two lateral chondrification centers during embryogenesis. The name is based on the appearance of the two hemivertebrae emerging as butterfly wings from the central cleft on x-ray.
HP:0003316.definition_cn: 蝴蝶椎（矢状裂椎或前脊柱裂）是由于胚胎发育过程中两侧软骨化中心未能融合而在椎体内形成的矢状缺损。该名称基于X线影像中两个半椎体从中央裂处向外展开，形似蝴蝶翅膀的外观。

HP:0003319.name: Abnormality of the cervical spine
HP:0003319.definition: Any abnormality of the cervical vertebral column.

HP:0003320.name: C1-C2 subluxation
HP:0003320.definition: A partial dislocation of the atlantoaxial joints.

HP:0003324.name: Generalized muscle weakness
HP:0003324.definition: Generalized weakness or decreased strength of the muscles, affecting both distal and proximal musculature.
HP:0003324.definition_cn: 全身性肌无力或肌力减退，累及远端及近端肌群。

HP:0003325.name: Limb-girdle muscle weakness
HP:0003325.definition: Weakness of the limb-girdle muscles (also known as the pelvic and shoulder girdles), that is, lack of strength of the muscles around the shoulders and the pelvis.
HP:0003325.definition_cn: 肢带肌无力（亦称骨盆带和肩带肌无力），即肩部和骨盆周围肌肉力量不足。

HP:0003327.name: Axial muscle weakness
HP:0003327.definition: Reduced strength of the axial musculature (i.e., of the muscles of the head and neck, spine, and ribs).
HP:0003327.definition_cn: 轴性肌群（即头颈部、脊柱和肋骨的肌肉）肌力减弱。

HP:0003328.name: Abnormal hairshaft morphology
HP:0003328.definition: An abnormal structure of the hairshaft, i.e., of the nongrowing portion of a hair that protrudes from the skin.
HP:0003328.definition_cn: 毛干结构异常，即从皮肤表面突出的非生长部分毛发结构异常。

HP:0003329.name: Hair shafts flattened at irregular intervals and twisted through 180 degrees about their axes
HP:0003329.name_cn: 毛干不规则间隔处扁平化，并沿其轴旋转180度。

HP:0003330.name: Abnormal bone structure
HP:0003330.definition: Any anomaly in the composite material or the layered arrangement of the bony skeleton.
HP:0003330.definition_cn: 骨性骨架复合材料或层状排列中的任何异常。

HP:0003332.name: Absent primary metaphyseal spongiosa
HP:0003332.name_cn: 原发性干骺端松质骨缺失

HP:0003334.name: Elevated circulating catecholamine level
HP:0003334.definition: An abnormal increase in catecholamine concentration in the blood.
HP:0003334.name_cn: 循环儿茶酚胺水平升高
HP:0003334.definition_cn: 血液中儿茶酚胺浓度异常升高。

HP:0003335.name: obsolete Low gonadotropins (secondary hypogonadism)
HP:0003335.name_cn: 过时的低促性腺激素（继发性性腺功能减退症）

HP:0003336.name: Abnormal enchondral ossification
HP:0003336.definition: An abnormality of the process of endochondral ossification, which is a type of replacement ossification in which bone tissue replaces cartilage.
HP:0003336.definition_cn: 软骨内骨化过程异常，这是一种替代性骨化类型，其中骨组织取代软骨。

HP:0003337.name: Reduced prothrombin consumption
HP:0003337.definition: The prothrombin consumption test measures the formation of intrinsic thromboplastin by determining the residual serum prothrombin after blood clotting is complete. If there is a defect in the process, less prothrombin will be converted to thrombin than normal (less prothrombin is consumed). This test may be abnormal with conditions including deficiency of factors VIII or IX, with circulating anticoagulants, thrombocytopenia.
HP:0003337.definition_cn: 凝血酶原消耗试验通过测定血液凝固完成后血清中残留的凝血酶原，来评估内源性凝血活酶的形成情况。若该过程存在缺陷，凝血酶原转化为凝血酶的量将低于正常水平（即凝血酶原消耗减少）。该试验在以下情况下可能出现异常：因子VIII或IX缺乏、循环抗凝物质存在、血小板减少症等。

HP:0003338.name: Focal necrosis of right ventricular muscle cells
HP:0003338.name_cn: 右心室肌细胞局灶性坏死

HP:0003339.name: Pyrimidine-responsive megaloblastic anemia
HP:0003339.definition: A type of megaloblastic anemia that improves upon administration of pyrimidine supplements such as uridylic acid and cytidylic acid.
HP:0003339.name_cn: 嘧啶反应性巨幼细胞性贫血
HP:0003339.definition_cn: 一种巨幼细胞性贫血，在给予嘧啶类补充剂（如尿苷酸和胞苷酸）后症状改善。

HP:0003340.name: obsolete Abnormal dermatological laboratory findings
HP:0003340.name_cn: 过时的异常皮肤病学实验室检查结果

HP:0003341.name: Lamina lucida cleavage
HP:0003341.definition: The formation of bullae (blisters) with cleavage in the lamina lucida layer of the skin.
HP:0003341.definition_cn: 在皮肤透明层发生裂隙并形成大疱（水疱）。

HP:0003343.name: Reduced glutathione synthetase level
HP:0003343.definition: Reduced level of the enzyme glutathione synthetase, which catalyzes the last step in the synthesis of glutathione and a deficiency results in low levels of glutathione. Acidosis is due to reduced feedback inhibition of gamma-glutamyl cysteine synthetase in the gamma-glutamyl cycle, which ultimately leads to overproduction and accumulation of 5-oxoproline.
HP:0003343.name_cn: 谷胱甘肽合成酶水平降低
HP:0003343.definition_cn: 谷胱甘肽合成酶水平降低，该酶催化谷胱甘肽合成的最后一步，其缺乏导致谷胱甘肽水平降低。酸中毒是由于γ-谷氨酰循环中γ-谷氨酰半胱氨酸合成酶的反馈抑制减弱，最终导致5-氧代脯氨酸的过度生成和积累。

HP:0003344.name: 3-Methylglutaric aciduria
HP:0003344.definition: An abnormally increased level of 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaric acid in the urine.
HP:0003344.definition_cn: 尿液中3-羟基-3-甲基戊二酸水平异常升高。

HP:0003345.name: Elevated urinary norepinephrine level
HP:0003345.definition: The concentration of noradrenaline in the urine, normalized for urine concentration, is above the upper limit of normal.
HP:0003345.name_cn: 尿去甲肾上腺素水平升高
HP:0003345.definition_cn: 尿中去甲肾上腺素浓度，经尿液浓度校正后，高于正常值上限。

HP:0003347.name: Impaired lymphocyte transformation with phytohemagglutinin
HP:0003347.definition: Normal peripheral blood lymphocytes, when stimulated by phytohemagglutinin (PHA) are cytotoxic for homologous and heterologous cells but not for autologous cells in monolayer culture. The cytotoxic effect is thought to be indicative of the immunological competence of the lymphocytes.
HP:0003347.name_cn: 植物血凝素诱导的淋巴细胞转化受损
HP:0003347.definition_cn: 正常外周血淋巴细胞在植物血凝素（PHA）刺激下，对同种和异种细胞具有细胞毒性，但对单层培养中的自体细胞无细胞毒性。这种细胞毒性效应被认为是淋巴细胞免疫能力的指标。

HP:0003348.name: Hyperalaninemia
HP:0003348.definition: An increased concentration of alanine in the blood.

HP:0003349.name: Low cholesterol esterification rate
HP:0003349.definition: A reduction in the rate of cholesterol esterification.

HP:0003351.name: Decreased circulating renin concentration
HP:0003351.definition: An decreased level of renin in the blood.

HP:0003352.name: Endopolyploidy on chromosome studies of bone marrow
HP:0003352.definition: An increase in the number of chromosome sets per cell in bone marrow cells.
HP:0003352.name_cn: 骨髓染色体研究中的内多倍体现象
HP:0003352.definition_cn: 骨髓细胞中每细胞染色体组数目的增加。

HP:0003353.name: Propionyl-CoA carboxylase deficiency
HP:0003353.definition: An abnormality of amino acid metabolism characterized by a decreased level of propionyl-CoA carboxylase.
HP:0003353.name_cn: 丙酰辅酶A羧化酶缺乏症
HP:0003353.definition_cn: 一种氨基酸代谢异常，其特征为丙酰辅酶A羧化酶水平降低。

HP:0003354.name: Hyperthreoninemia
HP:0003354.definition: An increased concentration of threonine in the blood.
HP:0003354.definition_cn: 血液中苏氨酸浓度升高。

HP:0003355.name: Aminoaciduria
HP:0003355.definition: An increased concentration of an amino acid in the urine.
HP:0003355.definition_cn: 尿液中氨基酸浓度升高。

HP:0003357.name: Thymic hormone decreased
HP:0003357.definition: A reduction in the level of thymic horomone.

HP:0003358.name: Elevated intracellular cystine
HP:0003358.definition: An increased concentration of cystine within cells. This finding can be demonstrated on leukocytes, but is not specific to blood cells.
HP:0003358.definition_cn: 细胞内胱氨酸浓度升高。该现象可在白细胞中检测到，但并非血细胞特异性表现。

HP:0003359.name: Decreased urinary sulfate
HP:0003359.definition: Decreased concentration of sulfate in the urine.
HP:0003359.definition_cn: 尿液中硫酸盐浓度降低。

HP:0003361.name: Tryptophanuria
HP:0003361.definition: An increased concentration of tryptophan in the urine.
HP:0003361.definition_cn: 尿液中色氨酸浓度升高。

HP:0003362.name: Increased VLDL cholesterol concentration
HP:0003362.definition: An increase in the amount of very-low-density lipoprotein cholesterol in the blood.
HP:0003362.name_cn: 极低密度脂蛋白胆固醇浓度升高
HP:0003362.definition_cn: 血液中极低密度脂蛋白胆固醇水平升高。

HP:0003363.name: Abdominal situs inversus
HP:0003363.definition: A left-right reversal (or mirror reflection) of the anatomical location of the viscera of the abdomen.
HP:0003363.definition_cn: 腹部内脏解剖位置的左右反转（或镜像反射）。

HP:0003366.name: Abnormal femoral neck/head morphology
HP:0003366.name_cn: 股骨颈/股骨头形态异常

HP:0003367.name: Abnormal femoral neck morphology
HP:0003367.definition: An abnormality of the femoral neck (which is the process of bone, connecting the femoral head with the femoral shaft).
HP:0003367.definition_cn: 股骨颈异常（即连接股骨头与股骨干的骨性结构）。

HP:0003368.name: Abnormal femoral head morphology
HP:0003368.definition: An abnormality of the femoral head.

HP:0003370.name: Flat capital femoral epiphysis
HP:0003370.definition: An abnormal flattening of the proximal epiphysis of the femur.
HP:0003370.name_cn: 扁平型股骨头骨骺滑脱
HP:0003370.definition_cn: 股骨近端骨骺异常扁平化。

HP:0003371.name: Enlargement of the proximal femoral epiphysis
HP:0003371.definition: An abnormal enlargement of the proximal epiphysis of the femur.
HP:0003371.definition_cn: 股骨近端骨骺异常增大。

HP:0003375.name: Narrow greater sciatic notch
HP:0003375.definition: A narrowing of the sacrosciatic notch, i.e., the deep indentation in the posterior border of the hip bone at the point of union of the ilium and ischium.
HP:0003375.definition_cn: 骶坐切迹狭窄，即髂骨与坐骨结合处髋骨后缘的深凹陷。

HP:0003376.name: Steppage gait
HP:0003376.definition: An abnormal gait pattern that arises from weakness of the pretibial and peroneal muscles due to a lower motor neuron lesion. Affected patients have footdrop and are unable to dorsiflex and evert the foot. The leg is lifted high on walking so that the toes clear the ground, and there may be a slapping noise when the foot strikes the ground again.
HP:0003376.definition_cn: 由于下运动神经元病变导致胫前肌和腓骨肌无力引起的异常步态模式。受累患者出现足下垂，无法进行足背屈和外翻。行走时腿部抬高以使足趾离地，足部再次着地时可能发出拍击声。

HP:0003378.name: Axonal degeneration/regeneration
HP:0003378.definition: A pattern of simultaneous degeneration and regeneration of axons (see comment).
HP:0003378.definition_cn: 轴突同步退行与再生模式（参见注释）。

HP:0003380.name: Decreased number of peripheral myelinated nerve fibers
HP:0003380.definition: A loss of myelinated nerve fibers in the peripheral nervous system (in general, this finding can be observed on nerve biopsy).
HP:0003380.name_cn: 周围有髓神经纤维数量减少
HP:0003380.definition_cn: 周围神经系统中有髓神经纤维的丧失（通常，这一发现可在神经活检中观察到）。

HP:0003383.name: Onion bulb formation
HP:0003383.definition: Repeated episodes of segmental demyelination and remyelination lead to the accumulation of supernumerary Schwann cells around axons, which is referred to as onion bulb formation. This finding affects peripheral nerves.
HP:0003383.definition_cn: 反复发作的节段性脱髓鞘和髓鞘再生导致轴突周围多余施万细胞的积累，称为洋葱球形成。这一发现影响周围神经。

HP:0003384.name: Peripheral axonal atrophy
HP:0003384.definition: Atrophic changes of axons of the peripheral nervous system.
HP:0003384.definition_cn: 周围神经系统轴突萎缩性改变。

HP:0003387.name: Decreased number of large peripheral myelinated nerve fibers
HP:0003387.definition: A reduced number of large myelinated nerve fibers.
HP:0003387.name_cn: 大直径周围有髓神经纤维数量减少
HP:0003387.definition_cn: 有髓大神经纤维数量减少。

HP:0003390.name: Sensory axonal neuropathy
HP:0003390.definition: An axonal neuropathy of peripheral sensory nerves.
HP:0003390.definition_cn: 周围感觉神经的轴索性神经病变。

HP:0003391.name: Gowers sign
HP:0003391.definition: A phenomenon whereby patients are not able to stand up without the use of the hands owing to weakness of the proximal muscles of the lower limbs.
HP:0003391.definition_cn: 一种现象，患者由于下肢近端肌群无力，无法在不借助双手的情况下站立。

HP:0003393.name: Thenar muscle atrophy
HP:0003393.definition: Wasting of thenar muscles, which are located on palm of the hand at the base of the thumb.
HP:0003393.definition_cn: 鱼际肌萎缩，位于手掌拇指根部。

HP:0003394.name: Muscle spasm
HP:0003394.definition: Sudden and involuntary contractions of one or more muscles.
HP:0003394.definition_cn: 突发性不自主性肌肉收缩（Sudden and involuntary contractions of one or more muscles）。

HP:0003396.name: Syringomyelia
HP:0003396.definition: Dilated, glial-lined cavity in spinal cord. This cavity does not communicate with the central canal, and usually is between the dorsal columns unilaterally or bilaterally along the side of the cord.
HP:0003396.definition_cn: 脊髓内扩张的、胶质细胞衬里的腔隙。该腔隙不与中央管相通，通常位于脊髓一侧或双侧的背柱之间。

HP:0003397.name: Generalized hypotonia due to defect at the neuromuscular junction
HP:0003397.name_cn: 由于神经肌肉接头缺陷导致的全身性肌张力减退

HP:0003398.name: Abnormal synaptic transmission at the neuromuscular junction
HP:0003398.definition: Any abnormality of the neuromuscular junction, which is the synapse between the motor end plate of a motor neuron and the skeletal muscle fibers.
HP:0003398.name_cn: 神经肌肉接头处突触传递异常
HP:0003398.definition_cn: 神经肌肉接头异常，即运动神经元运动终板与骨骼肌纤维之间的突触异常。

HP:0003400.name: Basal lamina onion bulb formation
HP:0003400.definition: A type of onion bulb formation prominently affecting the area of the basal lamina.
HP:0003400.name_cn: 基底膜洋葱球样结构形成
HP:0003400.definition_cn: 一种显著影响基底膜区域的洋葱球样结构形成。

HP:0003401.name: Paresthesia
HP:0003401.definition: Abnormal sensations such as tingling, pricking, or numbness of the skin with no apparent physical cause.
HP:0003401.definition_cn: 感觉异常（Paresthesia），表现为皮肤出现无明显生理原因的刺痛感（Tingling）、针刺感（Pricking）或麻木感（Numbness）。

HP:0003402.name: Decreased miniature endplate potentials
HP:0003402.definition: An abnormal reduction in the amplitude of the miniature endplate potentials, i.e. the postsynaptic response to transmitter released from an individual vesicle at the neuromuscular junction.
HP:0003402.definition_cn: 微型终板电位振幅异常降低，即神经肌肉接头处单个囊泡释放的神经递质引起的突触后反应减弱。

HP:0003403.name: EMG
HP:0003403.definition: A compound muscle action potential (CMAP) is a type of electromyography (EMG). CMAP refers to a group of almost simultaneous action potentials from several muscle fibers in the same area evoked by stimulation of the supplying motor nerve and are recorded as one multipeaked summated action potential. This abnormality refers to a greater than normal decrease in the amplitude during the course of the investigation.
HP:0003403.definition_cn: 复合肌肉动作电位（Compound Muscle Action Potential, CMAP）是一种肌电图（Electromyography, EMG）类型。CMAP指的是通过刺激支配的运动神经在同一区域内诱发的多个肌纤维几乎同时产生的动作电位，这些动作电位被记录为一个多峰的综合动作电位。此异常是指在检查过程中振幅出现较正常情况更大的下降。

HP:0003409.name: Distal sensory impairment of all modalities
HP:0003409.definition: Reduced ability to sense pain, temperature, touch, vibration stimuli in the distal regions of the extremities.
HP:0003409.definition_cn: 远端肢体区域对疼痛、温度、触觉、振动刺激的感知能力减退。

HP:0003411.name: Proximal femoral metaphyseal irregularity
HP:0003411.definition: Irregularity of the normally smooth surface of the proximal metaphysis of the femur.
HP:0003411.name_cn: 股骨近端干骺端不规则
HP:0003411.definition_cn: 股骨近端干骺端正常光滑表面不规则。

HP:0003413.name: Atlantoaxial abnormality
HP:0003413.definition: An anomaly of the atlantoaxial joint, i.e., of the joint between the first (atlas) and second (axis) cervical vertebrae.
HP:0003413.definition_cn: 寰枢关节异常，即第一颈椎（寰椎）与第二颈椎（枢椎）之间的关节异常。

HP:0003414.name: Atlantoaxial dislocation
HP:0003414.definition: Partial dislocation of the atlantoaxial joint.

HP:0003416.name: Spinal canal stenosis
HP:0003416.definition: An abnormal narrowing of the spinal canal.

HP:0003417.name: Coronal cleft vertebrae
HP:0003417.definition: Frontal schisis (cleft or cleavage) of vertebral bodies.
HP:0003417.definition_cn: 椎体前部裂（裂隙或分裂）。

HP:0003418.name: Back pain
HP:0003418.definition: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the back.
HP:0003418.definition_cn: 一种以背部局部物理不适（如刺痛、搏动性疼痛或酸痛）为特征的不适感。

HP:0003419.name: Low back pain
HP:0003419.definition: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the lower back.
HP:0003419.definition_cn: 一种以身体不适为特征的不愉快感觉（如刺痛、搏动性疼痛或酸痛），局限于腰部区域。

HP:0003422.name: Vertebral segmentation defect
HP:0003422.definition: An abnormality related to a defect of vertebral separation during development.
HP:0003422.definition_cn: 与发育过程中椎体分离缺陷相关的异常。

HP:0003429.name: CNS hypomyelination
HP:0003429.definition: Reduced amount of myelin in the central nervous system resulting from defective myelinogenesis.
HP:0003429.name_cn: 中枢神经系统髓鞘形成不全
HP:0003429.definition_cn: 中枢神经系统髓鞘生成缺陷导致的髓鞘减少。

HP:0003431.name: Decreased motor nerve conduction velocity
HP:0003431.definition: A type of decreased nerve conduction velocity that affects the motor neuron.
HP:0003431.name_cn: 运动神经传导速度降低
HP:0003431.definition_cn: 一种影响运动神经元的神经传导速度降低类型。

HP:0003434.name: Sensory ataxic neuropathy
HP:0003434.name_cn: 感觉性共济失调性神经病

HP:0003436.name: Prolonged miniature endplate currents
HP:0003436.definition: An abnormal prolongation of the miniature endplate potentials, i.e. the postsynaptic response to transmitter released from an individual vesicle at the neuromuscular junction.
HP:0003436.definition_cn: 微型终板电位的异常延长，即神经肌肉接头处单个囊泡释放递质引起的突触后反应。

HP:0003438.name: Absent Achilles reflex
HP:0003438.definition: Absence of the Achilles reflex (also known as the ankle jerk reflex), which can normally be elicited by tapping the tendon is tapped while the foot is dorsiflexed.
HP:0003438.definition_cn: 跟腱反射（亦称踝反射）缺失，通常可通过在足背屈时叩击跟腱引出。

HP:0003443.name: Decreased size of nerve terminals
HP:0003443.definition: A reduction in the size of nerve terminals.

HP:0003444.name: EMG
HP:0003444.definition: Evidence of chronic denervation on electromyography.
HP:0003444.definition_cn: 肌电图显示慢性去神经支配的证据。

HP:0003445.name: EMG
HP:0003445.definition: The presence of characteristic findings of denervation on electromyography (fibrillations, positive sharp waves, and giant motor unit potentials).
HP:0003445.definition_cn: 肌电图上出现去神经支配的特征性表现（纤颤电位、正锐波和巨大运动单位电位）。

HP:0003447.name: Axonal loss
HP:0003447.definition: A reduction in the number of axons in the peripheral nervous system.
HP:0003447.definition_cn: 周围神经系统轴突数量减少。

HP:0003448.name: Decreased sensory nerve conduction velocity
HP:0003448.definition: Reduced speed of conduction of the action potential along a sensory nerve.
HP:0003448.name_cn: 感觉神经传导速度降低
HP:0003448.definition_cn: 感觉神经动作电位传导速度降低。

HP:0003449.name: Cold-induced muscle cramps
HP:0003449.definition: Sudden and involuntary contractions of one or more muscles brought on by exposure to cold temperatures.
HP:0003449.definition_cn: 由暴露于低温环境引起的一处或多处肌肉突发性不自主收缩。

HP:0003450.name: Axonal regeneration
HP:0003450.definition: The presence of axonal regeneration following a previous axonal lesion.
HP:0003450.definition_cn: 既往轴突损伤后轴突再生的存在。

HP:0003451.name: Increased rate of premature chromosome condensation
HP:0003451.definition: An increased rate of premature chromosome condensation.
HP:0003451.name_cn: 染色体早熟凝集速率增加
HP:0003451.definition_cn: 染色体过早凝聚速率增加。

HP:0003452.name: Increased circulating iron concentration
HP:0003452.definition: The concentration of iron in the blood circulation is above the upper limit of normal.
HP:0003452.definition_cn: 血清铁浓度高于正常值上限。

HP:0003453.name: Antineutrophil antibody positivity
HP:0003453.definition: The presence of autoantibodies in the serum that react against neutrophils.
HP:0003453.name_cn: 抗中性粒细胞抗体阳性
HP:0003453.definition_cn: 血清中存在与中性粒细胞反应的自体抗体。

HP:0003454.name: Platelet antibody positive
HP:0003454.definition: The presence in the serum of autoantibodies directed against thrombocytes.
HP:0003454.definition_cn: 血清中存在针对血小板的自体抗体。

HP:0003455.name: Elevated circulating long chain fatty acid concentration
HP:0003455.definition: Increased concentration of long-chain fatty acids in the blood circulation.
HP:0003455.name_cn: 循环长链脂肪酸浓度升高
HP:0003455.definition_cn: 血液中长链脂肪酸浓度升高。

HP:0003456.name: Low urinary cyclic AMP response to PTH administration
HP:0003456.name_cn: 低尿环磷酸腺苷对甲状旁腺激素给药的反应

HP:0003457.name: EMG abnormality
HP:0003457.definition: Abnormal results of investigations using electromyography (EMG).

HP:0003458.name: EMG
HP:0003458.definition: The presence of abnormal electromyographic patterns indicative of myopathy, such as small-short polyphasic motor unit potentials.
HP:0003458.definition_cn: 存在异常肌电图模式，提示肌病，例如短小多相运动单位电位。

HP:0003459.name: Polyclonal elevation of IgM
HP:0003459.definition: A heterogeneous increase in IgM immunoglobulins characterized by a diffuse band on serum electrophoresis.
HP:0003459.definition_cn: 血清电泳中表现为弥漫性条带的IgM免疫球蛋白异质性增高。

HP:0003460.name: Decreased circulating total IgA
HP:0003460.definition: Undetectable serum immunoglobulin A level at a value < 5 mg/dL (0.05 g/L).
HP:0003460.name_cn: 循环总免疫球蛋白A降低
HP:0003460.definition_cn: 血清免疫球蛋白A水平检测不到，数值<5 mg/dL（0.05 g/L）。

HP:0003461.name: Increased urinary O-linked sialopeptides
HP:0003461.definition: Excretion of peptides conjugated to sialic acid in the urine.
HP:0003461.name_cn: 尿液中O-连接唾液酸肽水平升高
HP:0003461.definition_cn: 尿液中唾液酸结合肽的排泄。

HP:0003463.name: Increased extraneuronal autofluorescent lipopigment
HP:0003463.definition: Lipofuscin, a generic term applied to autofluorescent lipopigment, is a mixture of protein and lipid that accumulates in most aging cells, particularly those involved in high lipid turnover (e.g., the adrenal medulla) or phagocytosis of other cell types (e g., the retinal pigment epithelium or RPE; macrophage). This term pertains if there is an increase in the extraneuronal accumulation of lipofuscin (also known as autofluorescent lipoprotein) more than expected for the age of the patient.
HP:0003463.name_cn: 神经元外自发性荧光脂褐素增加
HP:0003463.definition_cn: 脂褐素（Lipofuscin），一种泛指自荧光性脂色素的术语，是由蛋白质和脂质组成的混合物，主要积累于大多数衰老细胞中，尤其是那些涉及高脂质周转（如肾上腺髓质）或其他细胞类型吞噬作用（如视网膜色素上皮细胞或RPE；巨噬细胞）的细胞。该术语适用于当脂褐素（也称为自荧光性脂蛋白）在神经元外积累的增加超过患者年龄预期水平的情况。

HP:0003464.name: obsolete Abnormal cholesterol homeostasis
HP:0003464.name_cn: 过时的异常胆固醇稳态

HP:0003466.name: Paradoxical increased cortisol secretion on dexamethasone suppression test
HP:0003466.name_cn: 地塞米松抑制试验中皮质醇分泌反常性增加

HP:0003467.name: Atlantoaxial instability
HP:0003467.definition: Abnormally increased movement at the junction between the first cervical (atlas) and the second cervical (axis) vertebrae as a result of either a bony or ligamentous anomaly.
HP:0003467.definition_cn: 第一颈椎（寰椎）与第二颈椎（枢椎）之间的连接处因骨性或韧带异常导致的异常活动度增加。

HP:0003468.name: Abnormal vertebral morphology
HP:0003468.definition: An abnormality of one or more of the vertebrae.

HP:0003469.name: Peripheral dysmyelination
HP:0003469.definition: Defective structure and function of myelin sheaths. Dysmyelination is distinguished from demyleination where there is destruction or damage of previously normal myelination.
HP:0003469.definition_cn: 髓鞘结构和功能缺陷。脱髓鞘障碍（Dysmyelination）与脱髓鞘（Demyelination）不同，后者是指先前正常的髓鞘被破坏或损伤。

HP:0003470.name: Paralysis
HP:0003470.definition: Paralysis of voluntary muscles means loss of contraction due to interruption of one or more motor pathways from the brain to the muscle fibers. Although the word paralysis is often used interchangeably to mean either complete or partial loss of muscle strength, it is preferable to use paralysis or plegia for complete or severe loss of muscle strength, and paresis for partial or slight loss. Motor paralysis results from deficits of the upper motor neurons (corticospinal, corticobulbar, or subcorticospinal). Motor paralysis is often accompanied by an impairment in the facility of movement.
HP:0003470.definition_cn: 随意肌麻痹是指由于从大脑到肌纤维的一条或多条运动通路中断而导致的收缩丧失。尽管“麻痹”一词常被互换使用以表示肌力的完全或部分丧失，但更准确的做法是使用“麻痹”或“瘫痪”来表示肌力的完全或严重丧失，而使用“轻瘫”来表示肌力的部分或轻微丧失。运动麻痹由上运动神经元（皮质脊髓束、皮质延髓束或皮质下脊髓束）的缺损引起。运动麻痹常伴有运动功能的障碍。

HP:0003472.name: Hypocalcemic tetany
HP:0003472.definition: Hyperexcitability of the neuromuscular system related to abnormally low level of calcium in the blood, resulting in carpopedal or generalized spasms.
HP:0003472.definition_cn: 与血液中钙水平异常降低相关的神经肌肉系统过度兴奋，导致腕足或全身性痉挛。

HP:0003473.name: Fatigable weakness
HP:0003473.definition: A type of weakness that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.
HP:0003473.definition_cn: 一种在肌肉群使用后出现的无力症状，若该肌肉群得到适当休息，症状会减轻。即，随着重复性肌肉动作，肌力逐渐减弱。

HP:0003474.name: Somatic sensory dysfunction
HP:0003474.definition: An abnormality of the primary sensation that is mediated by peripheral nerves (pain, temperature, touch, vibration, joint position). The word hypoesthesia (or hypesthesia) refers to a reduction in cutaneous sensation to a specific type of testing.
HP:0003474.definition_cn: 由周围神经介导的初级感觉异常（疼痛、温度、触觉、振动、关节位置）。术语“感觉减退”（hypoesthesia或hypesthesia）指对特定类型测试的皮肤感觉减弱。

HP:0003477.name: Peripheral axonal neuropathy
HP:0003477.definition: An abnormality characterized by disruption of the normal functioning of peripheral axons.
HP:0003477.definition_cn: 一种以周围轴突正常功能破坏为特征的异常。

HP:0003481.name: Segmental peripheral demyelination/remyelination
HP:0003481.definition: A segmental pattern of demyelination and regeneration (remyelination) affecting peripheral nerves.
HP:0003481.name_cn: 节段性周围神经脱髓鞘/再髓鞘化
HP:0003481.definition_cn: 影响周围神经的节段性脱髓鞘和再生（再髓鞘化）模式。

HP:0003482.name: EMG
HP:0003482.definition: Electromyographic (EMG) findings characteristic of axonal neuropathy, with normal or slightly decreased nerve conduction velocities, normal or slightly prolonged distal latencies, but significantly reduced motor potentials and sensory amplitudes. There may be spontaneous activity upon needle EMG studies, such as increased insertional activity, positive sharp waves, and fibrillation potentials.
HP:0003482.definition_cn: 肌电图（EMG）检查结果显示轴索性神经病变的特征，表现为神经传导速度正常或轻度减慢，远端潜伏期正常或轻度延长，但运动电位和感觉波幅显著降低。针极肌电图检查中可能观察到自发电活动，如插入活动增加、正锐波和纤颤电位。

HP:0003484.name: Upper limb muscle weakness
HP:0003484.definition: Weakness of the muscles of the arms.

HP:0003487.name: Babinski sign
HP:0003487.definition: Upturning of the big toe (and sometimes fanning of the other toes) in response to stimulation of the sole of the foot. If the Babinski sign is present it can indicate damage to the corticospinal tract.
HP:0003487.definition_cn: 大脚趾上翘（有时伴随其他脚趾扇形展开）作为对足底刺激的反应。若巴宾斯基征阳性，可能提示皮质脊髓束受损。

HP:0003489.name: Acute episodes of neuropathic symptoms
HP:0003489.name_cn: 神经病理性症状急性发作

HP:0003490.name: obsolete Defective dehydrogenation of isovaleryl CoA and butyryl CoA
HP:0003490.name_cn: 异戊酰辅酶A和丁酰辅酶A的缺陷性脱氢作用

HP:0003491.name: Elevated urine pyrophosphate
HP:0003491.definition: An abnormally increased diphosphate(4-) concentration in the urine. Diphosphate(4-), as ester with two phosphate groups, is also known as pyrophosphate.
HP:0003491.definition_cn: 尿液中二磷酸盐（4-）浓度异常升高。二磷酸盐（4-）作为含有两个磷酸基团的酯，也被称为焦磷酸盐。

HP:0003492.name: High urinary gonadotropin level
HP:0003492.definition: An elevated concentration of a gonadotropin hormone (stimulating hormone or luteinizing hormone) in the urine, consistent with the diagnosis of primary hypogonadism.
HP:0003492.definition_cn: 尿液中促性腺激素（促卵泡激素或黄体生成素）浓度升高，符合原发性性腺功能减退症的诊断。

HP:0003493.name: Antinuclear antibody positivity
HP:0003493.definition: The presence of autoantibodies in the serum that react against nuclei or nuclear components.
HP:0003493.definition_cn: 血清中存在针对细胞核或核成分的自身抗体。

HP:0003494.name: obsolete Loss of heterozygosity, multiple chromosomes
HP:0003494.name_cn: 过时 杂合性缺失，多染色体

HP:0003495.name: GM2-ganglioside accumulation
HP:0003495.definition_cn: GM2神经节苷脂的细胞蓄积。

HP:0003496.name: Increased circulating IgM level
HP:0003496.definition: An abnormally increased level of immunoglobulin M in blood.
HP:0003496.definition_cn: 血液中免疫球蛋白M水平异常升高。

HP:0003498.name: Disproportionate short stature
HP:0003498.definition: A kind of short stature in which different regions of the body are shortened to differing extents.
HP:0003498.definition_cn: 一种身材矮小症，其中身体不同区域的缩短程度各异。

HP:0003502.name: Mild short stature
HP:0003502.definition: A mild degree of short stature, more than -2 SD but not more than -3 SD from mean corrected for age and sex.
HP:0003502.definition_cn: 轻度身材矮小，年龄和性别校正后的平均值超过-2个标准差但不超过-3个标准差。

HP:0003508.name: Proportionate short stature
HP:0003508.definition: A kind of short stature in which different regions of the body are shortened to a comparable extent.
HP:0003508.definition_cn: 一种身材矮小症，其中身体各部位均以相似程度缩短。

HP:0003510.name: Severe short stature
HP:0003510.definition: A severe degree of short stature, more than -4 SD from the mean corrected for age and sex.
HP:0003510.definition_cn: 严重程度的身材矮小，较年龄和性别校正后的平均值低超过4个标准差。

HP:0003513.name: Reduced ratio of renal calcium clearance to creatinine clearance
HP:0003513.definition: A reduction of the ratio of renal calcium clearance to creatinine clearance to below 0.01.
HP:0003513.name_cn: 肾钙清除率与肌酐清除率比值降低
HP:0003513.definition_cn: 肾钙清除率与肌酐清除率比值降低至0.01以下。

HP:0003514.name: Deficiency or absence of cytochrome b(-245)

HP:0003517.name: Birth length greater than 97th percentile
HP:0003517.name_cn: 出生身长大于第97百分位数

HP:0003521.name: Disproportionate short-trunk short stature
HP:0003521.definition: A type of disproportionate short stature characterized by a short trunk but a average-sized limbs.
HP:0003521.name_cn: 不成比例的短躯干型矮小症
HP:0003521.definition_cn: 一种以躯干短小但四肢长度正常为特征的比例失调性矮小症。

HP:0003524.name: Decreased methionine synthase activity
HP:0003524.definition: A reduction in methionine synthase activity.
HP:0003524.name_cn: 甲硫氨酸合酶活性降低
HP:0003524.definition_cn: 甲硫氨酸合酶活性降低。

HP:0003526.name: Orotic acid crystalluria
HP:0003526.definition: Formation of crystals owing to an increased concentration of orotic acid in the urine.
HP:0003526.definition_cn: 由于尿液中乳清酸浓度升高导致的晶体形成。

HP:0003527.name: Hyperprostaglandinuria
HP:0003527.definition: An increased concentration of prostaglandin in the urine.
HP:0003527.definition_cn: 尿液中前列腺素浓度升高。

HP:0003528.name: Elevated circulating calcitonin concentration
HP:0003528.definition: Concentration of calcitonin, a 32-amino acid polypeptide hormone that is produced primarily by the parafollicular cells of the thyroid, in the blood circulation above the upper limit of normal.
HP:0003528.definition_cn: 血液中降钙素浓度超过正常上限，降钙素是一种由32个氨基酸组成的多肽激素，主要由甲状腺滤泡旁细胞产生。

HP:0003529.name: Parathormone-independent increased renal tubular calcium reabsorption
HP:0003529.definition: An increase in the reabsorption of calcium by the renal tubulus that is not associated with increased parathormone levels.
HP:0003529.name_cn: 甲状旁腺激素非依赖性肾小管钙重吸收增加
HP:0003529.definition_cn: 与甲状旁腺激素水平升高无关的肾小管钙重吸收增加。

HP:0003530.name: Elevated circulating glutaric acid concentration
HP:0003530.definition: An increased concentration of glutaric acid in the blood.
HP:0003530.definition_cn: 血液中戊二酸浓度升高。

HP:0003532.name: Ornithinuria
HP:0003532.definition: Level of ornithine in the urine above the upper limit of normal.
HP:0003532.definition_cn: 尿中鸟氨酸水平高于正常上限。

HP:0003533.name: Reduced acetaldehyde dehydrogenase level
HP:0003533.definition: Decreased level of acetaldehyde dehydrogenase (ALDH). ALDH and alcohol dehydrogenase (ADH) are the primary enzymes involved in alcohol metabolism.
HP:0003533.definition_cn: 乙醛脱氢酶（ALDH）水平降低。乙醛脱氢酶（ALDH）和乙醇脱氢酶（ADH）是参与酒精代谢的主要酶类。

HP:0003534.name: Reduced xanthine dehydrogenase level
HP:0003534.definition: An abnormal reduction in xanthine dehydrogenase level.
HP:0003534.name_cn: 黄嘌呤脱氢酶水平降低
HP:0003534.definition_cn: 黄嘌呤脱氢酶水平异常降低。

HP:0003535.name: 3-Methylglutaconic aciduria
HP:0003535.definition: An increased amount of 3-methylglutaconic acid in the urine.
HP:0003535.definition_cn: 尿液中3-甲基戊烯二酸含量升高。

HP:0003536.name: Decreased fumarate hydratase activity
HP:0003536.definition: An abnormality of Krebs cycle metabolism that is characterized by a decreased rate of fumarate hydratase activity.
HP:0003536.name_cn: 延胡索酸水合酶活性降低
HP:0003536.definition_cn: 三羧酸循环代谢异常，其特征为延胡索酸水合酶活性降低。

HP:0003537.name: Hypouricemia
HP:0003537.definition: An abnormally low level of uric acid in the blood.

HP:0003538.name: Increased iduronate sulfatase level
HP:0003538.definition: An increased level of iduronate-2-sulfatase activity in the blood.
HP:0003538.name_cn: 艾杜糖醛酸硫酸酯酶水平升高
HP:0003538.definition_cn: 血液中艾杜糖醛酸-2-硫酸酯酶活性水平升高。

HP:0003540.name: Impaired platelet aggregation
HP:0003540.definition: An impairment in the rate and degree to which platelets aggregate after the addition of an agonist that stimulates platelet clumping. Platelet aggregation is measured using aggregometer to measure the optical density of platelet-rich plasma, whereby platelet aggregation causes the plasma to become more transparent.
HP:0003540.definition_cn: 在添加刺激血小板聚集的激动剂后，血小板聚集的速率和程度出现障碍。血小板聚集通过使用聚集仪测量富含血小板血浆的光密度来评估，其中血小板聚集导致血浆变得更加透明。

HP:0003541.name: Urinary glycosaminoglycan excretion
HP:0003541.definition: Excretion of glycosaminoglycan in the urine. Glycosaminoglycans are long unbranched polysaccharides consisting of a repeating disaccharide unit.
HP:0003541.definition_cn: 尿液中糖胺聚糖的排泄。糖胺聚糖是由重复二糖单元组成的长链无分支多糖。

HP:0003542.name: Increased circulating pyruvate concentration
HP:0003542.definition: The concentration of pyruvate in the blood circulation is above the upper limit of normal.
HP:0003542.name_cn: 循环中丙酮酸浓度升高
HP:0003542.definition_cn: 血液循环中丙酮酸浓度高于正常上限。

HP:0003546.name: Exercise intolerance
HP:0003546.definition: A functional motor deficit where individuals whose responses to the challenges of exercise fail to achieve levels considered normal for their age and gender.
HP:0003546.definition_cn: 运动功能障碍，表现为个体对运动挑战的反应未能达到其年龄和性别所认为的正常水平。

HP:0003547.name: Shoulder girdle muscle weakness
HP:0003547.definition: The shoulder, or pectoral, girdle is composed of the clavicles and the scapulae. Shoulder-girdle weakness refers to lack of strength of the muscles attaching to these bones, that is, lack of strength of the muscles around the shoulders.
HP:0003547.definition_cn: 肩带，或称胸带，由锁骨和肩胛骨组成。肩带无力指的是附着于这些骨骼的肌肉力量不足，即肩部周围肌肉的力量缺乏。

HP:0003548.name: Subsarcolemmal accumulations of abnormally shaped mitochondria
HP:0003548.definition: An abnormally increased number of mitochondria in the cytoplasma adjacent to the sarcolemma (muscle cell membrane), whereby the mitochondria also possess an abnormal morphology.
HP:0003548.name_cn: 肌膜下异常形态线粒体聚集
HP:0003548.definition_cn: 肌膜（肌细胞膜）邻近的细胞质中线粒体数量异常增多，且线粒体形态异常。

HP:0003549.name: Abnormality of connective tissue
HP:0003549.definition: Any abnormality of the soft tissues, including both connective tissue (tendons, ligaments, fascia, fibrous tissues, and fat).
HP:0003549.definition_cn: 软组织异常，包括结缔组织（肌腱、韧带、筋膜、纤维组织和脂肪）的任何异常。

HP:0003550.name: Predominantly lower limb lymphedema
HP:0003550.definition: Localized fluid retention and tissue swelling caused by a compromised lymphatic system, affecting mainly the legs.
HP:0003550.definition_cn: 局部淋巴水肿（Localized Lymphedema），由淋巴系统功能障碍引起的局部体液潴留和组织肿胀，主要累及下肢。

HP:0003552.name: Muscle stiffness
HP:0003552.definition: A condition in which muscles cannot be moved quickly without accompanying pain or spasm.
HP:0003552.definition_cn: 一种肌肉无法快速运动而不伴随疼痛或痉挛的病症。

HP:0003553.name: obsolete Cellulitis due to immunodeficiency
HP:0003553.name_cn: 免疫缺陷导致的陈旧性蜂窝织炎

HP:0003554.name: Type 2 muscle fiber atrophy
HP:0003554.definition: Atrophy (wasting) affecting primary type 2 muscle fibers. This feature in general can only be observed on muscle biopsy.
HP:0003554.definition_cn: 主要影响2型肌纤维的萎缩（消耗）。此特征通常仅能在肌肉活检中观察到。

HP:0003555.name: Muscle fiber splitting
HP:0003555.definition: Fiber splitting or branching is a common finding in human and rat skeletal muscle pathology. Fiber splitting refers to longitudinal halving of the complete fiber, while branching originates from a regenerating end of a necrotic fiber as invaginations of the sarcolemma. In fiber branching, one end of the fiber remains intact as a single entity, while the other end has several branches.
HP:0003555.definition_cn: 纤维分裂或分支是人类和大鼠骨骼肌病理学中的常见发现。纤维分裂指的是完整纤维的纵向分裂，而分支则起源于坏死纤维再生端的肌膜内陷。在纤维分支中，纤维的一端保持完整作为单一实体，而另一端则具有多个分支。

HP:0003557.name: Increased variability in muscle fiber diameter
HP:0003557.definition: An abnormally high degree of muscle fiber size variation. This phenotypic feature can be observed upon muscle biopsy.
HP:0003557.name_cn: 肌纤维直径变异性增加
HP:0003557.definition_cn: 肌纤维大小异常显著变异。此表型特征可通过肌肉活检观察到。

HP:0003558.name: Viral infection-induced rhabdomyolysis
HP:0003558.definition: Rhabdomyolysis induced by a viral infection.
HP:0003558.name_cn: 病毒感染诱发的横纹肌溶解症
HP:0003558.definition_cn: 病毒感染引起的横纹肌溶解症。

HP:0003560.name: Muscular dystrophy
HP:0003560.definition: The term dystrophy means abnormal growth. However, muscular dystrophy is used to describe primary myopathies with a genetic basis and a progressive course characterized by progressive skeletal muscle weakness and wasting, defects in muscle proteins, and histological features of muscle fiber degeneration (necrosis) and regeneration. If possible, it is preferred to use other HPO terms to describe the precise phenotypic abnormalities.
HP:0003560.definition_cn: 术语“dystrophy”意指异常生长。然而，肌营养不良症（muscular dystrophy）用于描述具有遗传基础的原发性肌病，其病程呈进行性，特征为进行性骨骼肌无力和萎缩、肌肉蛋白缺陷以及肌纤维变性（坏死）和再生的组织学特征。如有可能，建议使用其他HPO术语来描述精确的表型异常。

HP:0003561.name: Birth length less than 3rd percentile
HP:0003561.name_cn: 出生身长低于第3百分位数

HP:0003563.name: Decreased LDL cholesterol concentration
HP:0003563.definition: An decreased concentration of low-density lipoprotein cholesterol in the blood.
HP:0003563.name_cn: 低密度脂蛋白胆固醇浓度降低
HP:0003563.definition_cn: 血液中低密度脂蛋白胆固醇浓度降低。

HP:0003564.name: Folate-dependent fragile site at Xq28
HP:0003564.definition: The presence of a folate sensitive fragile site at chromosome Xq28.
HP:0003564.name_cn: Xq28 位点的叶酸依赖性脆性位点
HP:0003564.definition_cn: X染色体长臂28区存在叶酸敏感性脆性位点。

HP:0003565.name: Elevated erythrocyte sedimentation rate
HP:0003565.definition: An increased erythrocyte sedimentation rate (ESR). The ESR is a test that measures the distance that erythrocytes have fallen after one hour in a vertical column of anticoagulated blood under the influence of gravity. The ESR is a nonspecific finding. An elevation may indicate inflammation or may be caused by any condition that elevates fibrinogen.
HP:0003565.definition_cn: 红细胞沉降率（ESR）升高。红细胞沉降率（ESR）是一种检测方法，用于测量在重力作用下，抗凝血液垂直柱中红细胞在一小时内沉降的距离。ESR是一种非特异性指标。其升高可能提示炎症，也可能由任何导致纤维蛋白原升高的疾病引起。

HP:0003566.name: Increased serum prostaglandin E2
HP:0003566.definition: An increased concentration of prostaglandin E2 in the blood.
HP:0003566.name_cn: 血清前列腺素E2水平升高
HP:0003566.definition_cn: 血液中前列腺素E2浓度升高。

HP:0003568.name: Decreased glucosephosphate isomerase level
HP:0003568.definition: A decreased level of glucose-6-phosphate isomerase.
HP:0003568.name_cn: 葡萄糖磷酸异构酶水平降低
HP:0003568.definition_cn: 葡萄糖-6-磷酸异构酶水平降低。

HP:0003570.name: Molybdenum cofactor deficiency
HP:0003570.definition: Absence of molybdenum cofactor(2-), a cofactor for enzymes including sulfite oxidase, xanthine oxidoreductase, and aldehyde oxidase.
HP:0003570.definition_cn: 钼辅因子(2-)缺乏，该辅因子是亚硫酸盐氧化酶、黄嘌呤氧化还原酶和醛氧化酶等酶的辅因子。

HP:0003571.name: Propionic acidemia
HP:0003571.definition: Increased concentration of proprionic acid in the blood circulation.

HP:0003572.name: Low plasma citrulline
HP:0003572.definition: A decreased concentration of citrulline in the blood.
HP:0003572.definition_cn: 血液中瓜氨酸浓度降低。

HP:0003573.name: Increased total bilirubin
HP:0003573.definition: Increased concentration of total (conjugated and unconjugated) bilirubin in the blood.
HP:0003573.definition_cn: 血液中总胆红素（结合胆红素与非结合胆红素）浓度升高。

HP:0003574.name: Positive regitine blocking test
HP:0003574.definition: A positive response to the regitine blocking test consisting of a substantial reduction in blood pressure following administration of regitine, indicative of the presence of increased levels of epinephrine and norepinephrine in the circulation, which is seen in pheochromocytoma-associated hypertension.
HP:0003574.definition_cn: 瑞吉亭阻滞试验呈阳性反应，表现为瑞吉亭给药后血压显著降低，提示循环中肾上腺素和去甲肾上腺素水平升高，此现象见于嗜铬细胞瘤相关高血压。

HP:0003575.name: Increased intracellular sodium
HP:0003575.definition: An abnormally increased sodium concentration in the cytosol.
HP:0003575.name_cn: 细胞内钠离子浓度升高
HP:0003575.definition_cn: 细胞内钠离子浓度异常升高。

HP:0003577.name: Congenital onset
HP:0003577.definition: A phenotypic abnormality that is present at birth.

HP:0003581.name: Adult onset
HP:0003581.definition: Onset of disease manifestations in adulthood, defined here as at the age of 16 years or later.
HP:0003581.definition_cn: 成年期疾病表现的发生，此处定义为16岁或之后。

HP:0003584.name: Late onset
HP:0003584.definition: A type of adult onset with onset of symptoms after the age of 60 years.
HP:0003584.definition_cn: 一种成年发病类型，症状在60岁后出现。

HP:0003587.name: Insidious onset
HP:0003587.definition: Gradual, very slow onset of disease manifestations.
HP:0003587.definition_cn: 疾病表现的渐进性、非常缓慢的发病过程。

HP:0003593.name: Infantile onset
HP:0003593.definition: Onset of signs or symptoms of disease between 28 days to one year of life.
HP:0003593.definition_cn: 疾病体征或症状在出生后28天至1岁之间出现。

HP:0003596.name: Middle age onset
HP:0003596.definition: A type of adult onset with onset of symptoms at the age of 40 to 60 years.
HP:0003596.definition_cn: 一种成年发病型，症状在40至60岁之间出现。

HP:0003606.name: Absent urinary urothione
HP:0003606.definition: Lack of urothione (the urinary metabolite of molybdenum cofactor) in the urine.
HP:0003606.definition_cn: 尿液中缺乏尿硫酮（钼辅因子的尿代谢产物）。

HP:0003607.name: 4-hydroxyphenylacetic aciduria
HP:0003607.definition: Increased concentration of 4-hydroxyphenylacetic acid in the urine.
HP:0003607.definition_cn: 尿液中4-羟基苯乙酸浓度升高。

HP:0003609.name: Foam cells with lamellar inclusion bodies
HP:0003609.definition: The presence of foam cells that contain lamellar inclusion bodies.
HP:0003609.name_cn: 具有层状包涵体的泡沫细胞
HP:0003609.definition_cn: 含有层状包涵体的泡沫细胞的存在。

HP:0003610.name: Fibroblast metachromasia
HP:0003610.definition: Increased cytoplasmic staining of fibroblasts with toluidine blue.
HP:0003610.definition_cn: 甲苯胺蓝染色显示成纤维细胞胞质染色增强。

HP:0003612.name: Positive ferric chloride test
HP:0003612.definition: If positive, the ferric chloride test indicates an increased concentration of phenols in the urine or blood.
HP:0003612.definition_cn: 若为阳性，三氯化铁试验表明尿液或血液中酚类物质浓度升高。

HP:0003613.name: Antiphospholipid antibody positivity
HP:0003613.definition: The presence of circulating autoantibodies to phospholipids.
HP:0003613.definition_cn: 循环性抗磷脂自身抗体的存在。

HP:0003614.name: Trimethylaminuria
HP:0003614.definition: Increased concentration of trimethylamine in the urine.
HP:0003614.definition_cn: 尿液中三甲胺浓度升高。

HP:0003616.name: Premature separation of centromeric heterochromatin
HP:0003616.name_cn: 着丝粒异染色质过早分离

HP:0003621.name: Juvenile onset
HP:0003621.definition: Onset of signs or symptoms of disease between the age of 5 and 15 years.
HP:0003621.definition_cn: 疾病体征或症状的发病年龄在5至15岁之间。

HP:0003623.name: Neonatal onset
HP:0003623.definition: Onset of signs or symptoms of disease within the first 28 days of life.
HP:0003623.definition_cn: 新生儿期（出生后28天内）出现疾病体征或症状。

HP:0003634.name: Amyoplasia
HP:0003634.definition: Congenital lack of development of the muscles, which are then replaced by a mixture of dense fat and fibrous tissue.
HP:0003634.definition_cn: 先天性肌肉发育不全，随后被致密脂肪和纤维组织混合物所替代。

HP:0003635.name: Loss of subcutaneous adipose tissue in limbs
HP:0003635.definition: Loss (disappearance) of previously present subcutaneous fat tissue in arm or leg.
HP:0003635.name_cn: 四肢皮下脂肪组织丧失
HP:0003635.definition_cn: 上肢或下肢皮下脂肪组织萎缩（消失）。

HP:0003637.name: Reduced circulating 4-Hydroxyphenylpyruvate dioxygenase activity
HP:0003637.definition: Activity or concentration of 4-hydroxyphenylpyruvate dioxygenase in the blood circulation below the lower limit of normal.
HP:0003637.name_cn: 循环中4-羟基苯丙酮酸双加氧酶活性降低
HP:0003637.definition_cn: 血液循环中4-羟基苯丙酮酸双加氧酶活性或浓度低于正常下限。

HP:0003639.name: Elevated urinary epinephrine level
HP:0003639.definition: The concentration of epinephrine in the urine, normalized for urine concentration, is above the upper limit of normal.
HP:0003639.definition_cn: 尿液中肾上腺素浓度经尿液浓度校正后高于正常上限。

HP:0003640.name: CNS foam cells
HP:0003640.definition: The presence of foam cells, a type of macrophage that localizes to fatty deposits on blood vessel walls, in the central nervous system.
HP:0003640.name_cn: 中枢神经系统泡沫细胞
HP:0003640.definition_cn: 中枢神经系统中存在泡沫细胞，这是一种定位于血管壁脂肪沉积的巨噬细胞。

HP:0003641.name: Hemoglobinuria
HP:0003641.definition: The presence of free hemoglobin in the urine.

HP:0003642.name: Type I transferrin isoform profile
HP:0003642.definition: Abnormal transferrin isoform profile consistent with a type I congenital disorder of glycosylation. In the traditional nomenclature for congenital disorders of glycosylation, absence of entire glycans was designated type I, and loss of one or more monosaccharides as type II.
HP:0003642.definition_cn: 转铁蛋白异构体谱异常，符合I型先天性糖基化障碍。在先天性糖基化障碍的传统命名法中，整个聚糖的缺失被归类为I型，而一个或多个单糖的缺失则被归类为II型。

HP:0003643.name: Sulfite oxidase deficiency
HP:0003643.name_cn: 亚硫酸盐氧化酶缺乏症
HP:0003643.definition_cn: 亚硫酸盐氧化酶水平异常降低。

HP:0003645.name: Prolonged partial thromboplastin time
HP:0003645.definition: Increased time to coagulation in the partial thromboplastin time (PTT) test, a measure of the intrinsic and common coagulation pathways. Phospholipid, and activator, and calcium are mixed into an anticoagulated plasma sample, and the time is measured until a thrombus forms.
HP:0003645.name_cn: 延长部分凝血活酶时间
HP:0003645.definition_cn: 部分凝血活酶时间（PTT）测试中凝血时间延长，该测试用于评估内源性和共同凝血途径。将磷脂、激活剂和钙混合加入抗凝血浆样本中，并测量直至血栓形成的时间。

HP:0003646.name: Bicarbonaturia
HP:0003646.definition: Abnormally increased concentration of hydrogencarbonate in the urine.
HP:0003646.definition_cn: 尿液碳酸氢盐浓度异常升高。

HP:0003647.name: Electron transfer flavoprotein-ubiquinone oxidoreductase defect
HP:0003647.definition: A deficiency of the electron transfer flavoprotein-ubiquinone oxidoreductase.
HP:0003647.name_cn: 电子转移黄素蛋白-泛醌氧化还原酶缺陷
HP:0003647.definition_cn: 电子转移黄素蛋白-泛醌氧化还原酶缺乏症。

HP:0003648.name: Lacticaciduria
HP:0003648.definition: An increased concentration of lactic acid in the urine.

HP:0003649.name: Abnormal glycosidase enzyme activity
HP:0003649.definition: Abnormality of glycosidase enzyme activity. Glycoside hydrolases (GHs), including glycosidases and transglycosidases. These enzymes constitute 113 protein families that are responsible for the hydrolysis and/or transglycosylation of glycosidic bonds.
HP:0003649.definition_cn: 糖苷酶活性异常。糖苷水解酶（Glycoside Hydrolases, GHs），包括糖苷酶和转糖苷酶。这些酶构成了113个蛋白质家族，负责糖苷键的水解和/或转糖基化作用。

HP:0003651.name: Foam cells
HP:0003651.definition: The presence of foam cells, a type of macrophage that localizes to fatty deposits on blood vessel walls, where they ingest low-density lipoproteins and become laden with lipids, giving them a foamy appearance.
HP:0003651.definition_cn: 泡沫细胞的存在，这是一种定位于血管壁脂肪沉积处的巨噬细胞，它们摄取低密度脂蛋白并充满脂质，从而呈现出泡沫状外观。

HP:0003652.name: Recurrent myoglobinuria
HP:0003652.definition: Recurring episodes of myoglobinuria, i.e., of the presence of myoglobin in the urine. This is usually a consequence of rhabdomyolysis, i.e., of the destruction of muscle tissue.
HP:0003652.definition_cn: 反复发作的肌红蛋白尿症，即尿液中存在肌红蛋白。这通常是横纹肌溶解症的结果，即肌肉组织的破坏。

HP:0003653.name: Cellular metachromasia
HP:0003653.definition: Metachromasia (also known as metachromacy) is a characteristic color change which certain aniline dyes exhibit when bound to particular substances or when concentrated in solution. For example, the basic dye toluidine blue becomes distinctly pink when bound to cartilage matrix. In the sense used here, the metachromasia refers to a change in color not observed with normal tissues, anomalous staining with the cationic dyes toluidine blue O and Alcian blue resulting from excessive amounts of the polyanionic glycosaminoglycans.
HP:0003653.definition_cn: 异染性（也称为异染现象）是指某些苯胺染料在与特定物质结合或在溶液中浓缩时表现出的特征性颜色变化。例如，碱性染料甲苯胺蓝在与软骨基质结合时呈现明显的粉红色。在此语境下，异染性指的是与正常组织相比观察到的颜色变化，由于过量的聚阴离子糖胺聚糖导致阳离子染料甲苯胺蓝O和阿利新蓝的异常染色。

HP:0003654.name: Reduced dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase level
HP:0003654.definition: An abnormal reduction in dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase (NADP+) level.
HP:0003654.name_cn: 二氢嘧啶脱氢酶水平降低
HP:0003654.definition_cn: 二氢嘧啶脱氢酶（NADP+）水平异常降低。

HP:0003655.name: Reduced level of N-acetylglucosaminyltransferase II
HP:0003655.definition: An abnormality of glycoprotein metabolism related to a decreased level of alpha-1,6-mannosylglycoprotein 2-beta-N-acetylglucosaminyltransferase activity.
HP:0003655.name_cn: N-乙酰氨基葡萄糖转移酶II水平降低
HP:0003655.definition_cn: 与α-1,6-甘露糖基糖蛋白2-β-N-乙酰氨基葡萄糖转移酶活性降低相关的糖蛋白代谢异常。

HP:0003656.name: Decreased beta-glucocerebrosidase level
HP:0003656.definition: Reduced level of the enzyme beta-glucosidase, an enzyme that catalyzes the hydrolysis of glucosylceramide into ceramide and glucose.
HP:0003656.name_cn: β-葡萄糖脑苷脂酶水平降低
HP:0003656.definition_cn: β-葡萄糖苷酶水平降低，该酶催化葡萄糖神经酰胺水解为神经酰胺和葡萄糖。

HP:0003657.name: Vascular granular osmiophilic material deposition
HP:0003657.definition: Accumulation of granular osmiophilic material in blood vessel walls. Osmiophilic material becomes black upon staining with osmium tetroxide. Deposition of granular osmiophilic material (GOM) is the vascular pathological hallmark of CADASIL, which is the most prevalent hereditary small vessel disease and is caused by missense mutations in the NOTCH3 gene. GOM have been shown to contain NOTCH3 ectodomain (NOTCH3ECD) and extracellular matrix proteins, and can be visualized ultrastructurally in the tunica media of small arteries and capillaries. These electron dense GOM deposits are located in the basement membrane of mural cells, i.e. vascular smooth muscle cells and pericytes. In both manifest and pre-manifest CADASIL patients, GOM deposits are present not only in brain vessels, but also in vessels of other organs, such as the skin.
HP:0003657.name_cn: 血管颗粒状嗜锇物质沉积
HP:0003657.definition_cn: 血管壁内颗粒状嗜锇物质的积聚。嗜锇物质在四氧化锇染色后呈现黑色。颗粒状嗜锇物质（GOM）的沉积是CADASIL的血管病理标志，CADASIL是最常见的遗传性小血管疾病，由NOTCH3基因的错义突变引起。GOM已被证明含有NOTCH3胞外域（NOTCH3ECD）和细胞外基质蛋白，并可在超微结构上观察到位于小动脉和毛细血管的中膜中。这些电子致密的GOM沉积物位于壁细胞（即血管平滑肌细胞和周细胞）的基底膜中。在显性和前显性CADASIL患者中，GOM沉积不仅存在于脑血管中，还存在于其他器官（如皮肤）的血管中。

HP:0003658.name: Hypomethioninemia
HP:0003658.definition: A decreased concentration of methionine in the blood.
HP:0003658.definition_cn: 血液中甲硫氨酸浓度降低。

HP:0003665.name: Amyotrophy of the musculature of the pelvis
HP:0003665.definition: Muscular atrophy affecting the muscles of the pelvis.

HP:0003674.name: Onset
HP:0003674.definition: The age group in which disease manifestations appear.
HP:0003674.definition_cn: 疾病表现出现的年龄组。

HP:0003676.name: Progressive
HP:0003676.definition: Applies to a disease manifestation that increases in scope or severity over the course of time, i.e., that worsens with age.
HP:0003676.definition_cn: 适用于一种在病程中范围或严重程度逐渐增加的疾病表现，即随年龄增长而恶化。

HP:0003677.name: Slowly progressive
HP:0003677.definition: Applies to a disease manifestation that only slowly increases in scope or severity over the course of time.
HP:0003677.definition_cn: 适用于一种疾病表现，其范围或严重程度在病程中仅缓慢增加。

HP:0003678.name: Rapidly progressive
HP:0003678.definition: Applies to a disease manifestation that quickly increases in scope or severity over the course of time.
HP:0003678.definition_cn: 适用于在病程中范围或严重程度迅速增加的疾病表现。

HP:0003680.name: Nonprogressive
HP:0003680.definition: Applies to a disease manifestation that does not increase in scope or severity over the course of time, i.e., that does not worsen with age.
HP:0003680.definition_cn: 适用于一种疾病表现，其范围或严重程度在病程中不增加，即不随年龄增长而恶化。

HP:0003682.name: Variable progression rate
HP:0003682.definition: Applies to a disease manifestation that quickly increases in scope or severity with a rate that varies. For instance, progression may be slow in one time period and rapid in another.
HP:0003682.definition_cn: 适用于一种疾病表现，其范围或严重程度迅速增加，且增加速率可变。例如，某一时间段内进展可能缓慢，而在另一时间段内进展迅速。

HP:0003687.name: Centrally nucleated skeletal muscle fibers
HP:0003687.definition: An abnormality in which the nuclei of sarcomeres take on an abnormally central localization (or in which this feature is found in an increased proportion of muscle cells).
HP:0003687.definition_cn: 肌节核异常中心定位（或肌肉细胞中该特征比例增加）的异常现象。

HP:0003688.name: Cytochrome C oxidase-negative muscle fibers
HP:0003688.definition: An abnormally reduced activity of the enzyme cytochrome C oxidase in muscle tissue.
HP:0003688.name_cn: 细胞色素C氧化酶阴性肌纤维
HP:0003688.definition_cn: 肌肉组织中细胞色素C氧化酶活性异常降低。

HP:0003689.name: Multiple mitochondrial DNA deletions
HP:0003689.definition: The presence of multiple deletions of mitochondrial DNA (mtDNA).
HP:0003689.definition_cn: 线粒体DNA（mtDNA）多重缺失的存在。

HP:0003690.name: Limb muscle weakness
HP:0003690.definition: Reduced strength and weakness of the muscles of the arms and legs.
HP:0003690.definition_cn: 上肢和下肢肌力减退及肌无力。

HP:0003691.name: Scapular winging
HP:0003691.definition: Abnormal protrusion of the scapula away from the surface of the back.
HP:0003691.definition_cn: 肩胛骨异常突出于背部表面。

HP:0003693.name: Distal amyotrophy
HP:0003693.definition: Muscular atrophy affecting muscles in the distal portions of the extremities.

HP:0003694.name: Late-onset proximal muscle weakness
HP:0003694.definition: Lack of strength of the proximal musculature occurring late in the clinical course.
HP:0003694.definition_cn: 临床病程晚期出现的近端肌群肌力减退。

HP:0003696.name: Absent epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0003696.definition: Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger.
HP:0003696.name_cn: 第五指远节指骨骨骺缺失
HP:0003696.definition_cn: 第五指远节指骨近端骨骺缺如。

HP:0003697.name: Scapuloperoneal amyotrophy
HP:0003697.definition: Muscular atrophy in the distribution of shoulder girdle and peroneal muscles.
HP:0003697.definition_cn: 肩带肌群和腓骨肌群分布区的肌肉萎缩。

HP:0003700.name: Generalized amyotrophy
HP:0003700.definition: Generalized (diffuse, unlocalized) amyotrophy (muscle atrophy) affecting multiple muscles.
HP:0003700.definition_cn: 多发性（弥漫性、非局限性）肌萎缩（肌肉萎缩）累及多块肌肉。

HP:0003701.name: Proximal muscle weakness
HP:0003701.definition: A lack of strength of the proximal muscles.

HP:0003707.name: Calf muscle pseudohypertrophy
HP:0003707.definition: Enlargement of the muscles of the calf due to their replacement by connective tissue or fat.
HP:0003707.definition_cn: 腓肠肌肥大，由于肌肉被结缔组织或脂肪替代所致。

HP:0003710.name: Exercise-induced muscle cramps
HP:0003710.definition: Sudden and involuntary contractions of one or more muscles brought on by physical exertion.
HP:0003710.definition_cn: 运动诱发的单块或多块肌肉突发性不自主收缩。

HP:0003712.name: Skeletal muscle hypertrophy
HP:0003712.definition: Abnormal increase in muscle size and mass not due to training.
HP:0003712.definition_cn: 肌肉肥大（Hypertrophy）非训练性异常增大。

HP:0003713.name: Muscle fiber necrosis
HP:0003713.definition: Abnormal cell death involving muscle fibers usually associated with break in, or absence of, muscle surface fiber membrane and resulting in irreversible damage to muscle fibers.
HP:0003713.definition_cn: 肌纤维异常细胞死亡，通常与肌纤维表面膜破裂或缺如相关，导致肌纤维不可逆性损伤。

HP:0003715.name: Myofibrillar myopathy
HP:0003715.definition: Myofibrillar structural changes characterized by abnormal intracellular accumulation of the intermediate filament desmin and other proteins.
HP:0003715.definition_cn: 以中间丝蛋白结蛋白及其他蛋白质异常细胞内积聚为特征的肌原纤维结构改变。

HP:0003716.name: Generalized muscular appearance from birth
HP:0003716.name_cn: 先天性全身性肌张力低下

HP:0003719.name: Muscle mounding
HP:0003719.definition: Percussion-induced, local prolonged contractions (mounding) in muscle persisting for several seconds.
HP:0003719.definition_cn: 叩击诱发的局部持续性肌肉收缩（隆起），持续数秒。

HP:0003720.name: Generalized muscle hypertrophy
HP:0003720.definition: Hypertrophy (increase in size) of muscle tissue in a generalized (not localized) distribution.
HP:0003720.definition_cn: 全身性（非局限性）分布的肌肉组织肥大（体积增大）。

HP:0003722.name: Neck flexor weakness
HP:0003722.definition: Weakness of the muscles involved in neck flexion (sternocleidomastoid, longus capitus, longus colli, and scalenus anterior).
HP:0003722.definition_cn: 颈部屈肌群肌力减弱（胸锁乳突肌、头长肌、颈长肌及前斜角肌）。

HP:0003724.name: Shoulder girdle muscle atrophy
HP:0003724.definition: Amyotrophy affecting the muscles of the shoulder girdle.

HP:0003729.name: Enteroviral dermatomyositis syndrome
HP:0003729.name_cn: 肠道病毒性皮肌炎综合征

HP:0003730.name: EMG
HP:0003730.definition: Spontaneous, repetitive electrical activity demonstrated by electromyography (EMG).
HP:0003730.definition_cn: 自发性、重复性电活动通过肌电图（EMG）显示。

HP:0003731.name: Quadriceps muscle weakness
HP:0003731.definition: Weakness of the quadriceps muscle (that is, of the muscle fasciculus of quadriceps femoris).
HP:0003731.definition_cn: 股四头肌肌力减弱（即股四头肌肌束肌力减弱）。

HP:0003736.name: Autophagic vacuoles
HP:0003736.definition: The lysosomal-vacuolar pathway has a role in the controlled intracellular digestion of macromolecules such as protein complexes and organelles. This feature refers to the presence of an abnormally increased number of autophagic vacuoles in muscle tissue.
HP:0003736.definition_cn: 溶酶体-液泡途径在大分子物质（如蛋白质复合物和细胞器）的受控细胞内消化过程中发挥作用。此特征指肌肉组织中自噬液泡数量异常增多。

HP:0003737.name: Mitochondrial myopathy
HP:0003737.definition: A type of myopathy associated with mitochondrial disease and characterized by findings on biopsy such as ragged red muscle fibers.
HP:0003737.definition_cn: 一种与线粒体疾病相关的肌病，其特征为活检时发现的破碎红纤维（Ragged Red Fibers, RRF）。

HP:0003738.name: Exercise-induced myalgia
HP:0003738.definition: The occurrence of an unusually high amount of muscle pain following exercise.
HP:0003738.definition_cn: 运动后异常高发的肌肉疼痛。

HP:0003740.name: Myotonia with warm-up phenomenon
HP:0003740.definition: Myotonia that occurs after a period of rest and decreases with continuing exercise.
HP:0003740.definition_cn: 休息后出现的肌强直，随着持续运动而减轻。

HP:0003741.name: obsolete Congenital muscular dystrophy
HP:0003741.name_cn: 过时的先天性肌营养不良症

HP:0003743.name: Genetic anticipation
HP:0003743.definition: A type of autosomal dominant inheritance involving a gene that exhibits anticipation, the increase in severity and/or an earlier age of onset in subsequent generations.
HP:0003743.definition_cn: 一种常染色体显性遗传类型，涉及一个表现出遗传早现现象的基因，即在后续世代中病情严重程度增加和/或发病年龄提前。

HP:0003744.name: Genetic anticipation with paternal anticipation bias
HP:0003744.definition: A type of genetic anticipation observed predominantly upon transmission from affected males.
HP:0003744.name_cn: 遗传早现现象伴父系早现偏倚
HP:0003744.definition_cn: 一种主要在受影响的男性传递过程中观察到的遗传早现现象。

HP:0003745.name: Sporadic
HP:0003745.definition: Cases of the disease in question occur without a previous family history, i.e., as isolated cases without being transmitted from a parent and without other siblings being affected.
HP:0003745.definition_cn: 该疾病病例的发生无家族史，即作为散发病例，无父母遗传且无其他兄弟姐妹受累。

HP:0003749.name: Pelvic girdle muscle weakness
HP:0003749.definition: Weakness of the muscles of the pelvic girdle (also known as the hip girdle), that is, lack of strength of the muscles around the pelvis.
HP:0003749.definition_cn: 骨盆带肌群无力（亦称髋带肌群无力），即骨盆周围肌群肌力减退。

HP:0003750.name: Increased muscle fatiguability
HP:0003750.definition: An abnormal, increased fatiguability of the musculature.
HP:0003750.definition_cn: 肌肉异常性疲劳性增加。

HP:0003752.name: Episodic flaccid weakness
HP:0003752.definition: Recurrent episodes of muscle flaccidity, a type of paralysis in which a muscle becomes soft and yields to passive stretching.
HP:0003752.definition_cn: 复发性肌张力减退发作，一种肌肉松弛性瘫痪，表现为肌肉变软并易于被动拉伸。

HP:0003755.name: Type 1 fibers relatively smaller than type 2 fibers
HP:0003755.definition: The presence of abnormal muscle fiber size such that type 1 fibers are smaller than type 2 fibers.
HP:0003755.name_cn: 1型肌纤维相对小于2型肌纤维
HP:0003755.definition_cn: 存在肌纤维大小异常，即Ⅰ型肌纤维小于Ⅱ型肌纤维。

HP:0003758.name: Reduced subcutaneous adipose tissue
HP:0003758.definition: A reduced amount of fat tissue in the lowest layer of the integument. This feature can be appreciated by a reduced skinfold thickness.
HP:0003758.definition_cn: 真皮层下方脂肪组织减少。该特征可通过皮肤皱褶厚度降低来评估。

HP:0003759.name: Hypoplasia of lymphatic vessels
HP:0003759.definition_cn: 先天性淋巴管发育不全。

HP:0003760.name: Percussion-induced rapid rolling muscle contractions
HP:0003760.definition: Mechanical percussion (i.e., striking a muscle with a reflex hammer) leads to spreading waves of muscle contractions that begin proximally and spread laterally across the muscle.
HP:0003760.name_cn: 叩击诱发的快速滚动性肌肉收缩
HP:0003760.definition_cn: 机械叩击（即使用反射锤敲击肌肉）会导致肌肉收缩的扩散波，这些收缩波从近端开始，并向肌肉外侧扩散。

HP:0003761.name: Calcinosis
HP:0003761.definition: Formation of calcium deposits in any soft tissue.

HP:0003762.name: Uterus didelphys
HP:0003762.definition: A malformation of the uterus in which the uterus is present as a paired organ as a result of the failure of fusion of the mullerian ducts during embryogenesis.
HP:0003762.definition_cn: 子宫畸形，由于胚胎发育过程中苗勒管融合失败，导致子宫呈现为成对器官。

HP:0003763.name: Bruxism
HP:0003763.definition: Bruxism is characterized by the grinding of the teeth including the clenching of the jaw and typically occur during sleep, but also can occur while the affected individual is awake.
HP:0003763.definition_cn: 磨牙症的特征包括牙齿的研磨以及下颌的紧咬，通常发生在睡眠期间，但也可能在患者清醒时发生。

HP:0003764.name: Nevus
HP:0003764.definition: A nevus is a type of hamartoma that is a circumscribed stable malformation of the skin.
HP:0003764.definition_cn: 痣是一种错构瘤，属于皮肤的局限性稳定畸形。

HP:0003765.name: Psoriasiform dermatitis
HP:0003765.definition: A skin abnormality characterized by redness and irritation, with thick, red skin that displays flaky, silver-white patches (scales).
HP:0003765.definition_cn: 一种皮肤异常，其特征为红斑和刺激，伴有增厚的红色皮肤，并出现片状银白色斑块（鳞屑）。

HP:0003771.name: Pulp calcification
HP:0003771.definition: Pulp calcifications may appear as punctate calcifications, irregular, roughly spherical mineralized masses in any part of the pulp. It may occur isolated or associated to calcifications elsewhere such as the carotid arteries and kidneys. The diagnosis pulp calcifications can be established using radiological studies.
HP:0003771.definition_cn: 牙髓钙化可表现为点状钙化、不规则或大致球形的矿化团块，可出现在牙髓的任何部位。它可能单独发生，也可能与其他部位的钙化（如颈动脉和肾脏）相关。牙髓钙化的诊断可通过放射学检查确立。

HP:0003774.name: Stage 5 chronic kidney disease
HP:0003774.definition: A degree of kidney failure severe enough to require dialysis or kidney transplantation for survival characterized by a severe reduction in glomerular filtration rate (less than 15 ml/min/1.73 m2) and other manifestations including increased serum creatinine.
HP:0003774.definition_cn: 肾功能衰竭程度严重到需要透析或肾移植以维持生命，其特征为肾小球滤过率严重降低（小于15毫升/分钟/1.73平方米）以及其他表现，包括血清肌酐升高。

HP:0003777.name: Pili torti
HP:0003777.definition: Pili (from Latin pilus, hair) torti (from Latin tortus, twisted) refers to short and brittle hairs that appear flattened and twisted when viewed through a microscope.
HP:0003777.definition_cn: 毛发扭曲症（源自拉丁语pilus，意为毛发；tortus，意为扭曲）是指显微镜下观察到的短而脆弱的毛发，呈现扁平且扭曲的外观。

HP:0003782.name: Eunuchoid habitus
HP:0003782.definition: A body habitus that is tall, slim and underweight, with long legs and long arms (i.e., arm span exceeds height by 5 cm or more).
HP:0003782.definition_cn: 身材高挑、瘦削且体重不足，伴有长腿和长臂（即臂展超过身高5厘米或以上）的体型。

HP:0003785.name: Decreased CSF homovanillic acid concentration
HP:0003785.definition: Decreased concentration of homovanillic acid (HVA) in the cerebrospinal fluid. HVA is a metabolite of dopamine.
HP:0003785.name_cn: 脑脊液高香草酸浓度降低
HP:0003785.definition_cn: 脑脊液中高香草酸（HVA）浓度降低。高香草酸是多巴胺的代谢产物。

HP:0003787.name: Type 1 and type 2 muscle fiber minicore regions
HP:0003787.definition: Multiple small zones of sarcomeric disorganization and lack of oxidative activity (known as minicores) in type 1 and type 2 muscle fibers.
HP:0003787.definition_cn: 在1型和2型肌纤维中，存在多个小区域的肌节结构紊乱和氧化活性缺失（称为微核心）。

HP:0003789.name: Minicore myopathy
HP:0003789.definition: Multiple small zones of sarcomeric disorganization and lack of oxidative activity (known as minicores) in muscle fibers.
HP:0003789.definition_cn: 肌纤维内存在多个小区域的肌节结构紊乱及氧化活性缺失（称为微核心）。

HP:0003791.name: Deposits immunoreactive to beta-amyloid protein
HP:0003791.name_cn: β-淀粉样蛋白免疫反应性沉积物

HP:0003795.name: Short middle phalanx of toe
HP:0003795.definition: Developmental hypoplasia (shortening) of middle phalanx of toe.
HP:0003795.definition_cn: 趾中节指骨发育不全（短缩）。

HP:0003796.name: Irregular iliac crest
HP:0003796.definition: Irregularity of the iliac crest, which is the superior border of the wing of the ilium.
HP:0003796.definition_cn: 髂嵴不规则，即髂骨翼的上缘。

HP:0003797.name: Limb-girdle muscle atrophy
HP:0003797.definition: Muscular atrophy affecting the muscles of the limb girdle.

HP:0003798.name: Nemaline bodies
HP:0003798.definition: Nemaline rods are abnormal bodies that can occur in skeletal muscle fibers. The rods can be observed on histological analysis of muscle biopsy tissue or upon electron microscopy, where they appear either as extensions of sarcomeric Z-lines, in random array without obvious attachment to Z-lines (often in areas devoid of sarcomeres) or in large clusters localized at the sarcolemma or intermyofibrillar spaces.
HP:0003798.definition_cn: 线状体（Nemaline rods）是骨骼肌纤维中可能出现的异常结构。这些线状体可通过肌肉活检组织的组织学分析或电子显微镜观察发现，其形态表现为肌节Z线的延伸、无规律排列且无明显附着于Z线（常见于缺乏肌节的区域）或大量聚集于肌膜或肌原纤维间间隙。

HP:0003800.name: Muscle abnormality related to mitochondrial dysfunction
HP:0003800.name_cn: 线粒体功能障碍相关的肌肉异常

HP:0003803.name: Type 1 muscle fiber predominance
HP:0003803.definition: An abnormal predominance of type I muscle fibers (in general, this feature can only be observed on muscle biopsy).
HP:0003803.definition_cn: I型肌纤维异常优势（通常，此特征仅能在肌肉活检中观察到）。

HP:0003805.name: Rimmed vacuoles
HP:0003805.definition: Presence of abnormal vacuoles (membrane-bound organelles) in the sarcolemma. On histological staining with hematoxylin and eosin, rimmed vacuoles are popcorn-like clear vacuoles with a densely blue rim. The vacuoles are often associated with cytoplasmic and occasionally intranuclear eosinophilic inclusions.
HP:0003805.definition_cn: 肌膜中存在异常空泡（膜结合细胞器）。在苏木精和伊红组织学染色中，边缘空泡呈现为爆米花样透明空泡，边缘呈深蓝色。这些空泡常与细胞质中的嗜酸性包涵体相关，偶尔也与核内嗜酸性包涵体相关。

HP:0003809.name: Reduced intrathoracic adipose tissue
HP:0003809.definition: An abnormally reduced amount of adipose tissue in the thoracic cavity.
HP:0003809.definition_cn: 胸腔内脂肪组织异常减少。

HP:0003811.name: Neonatal death
HP:0003811.definition: Death within the first 28 days of life.

HP:0003819.name: Death in childhood
HP:0003819.definition: Death in during childhood, defined here as between the ages of 2 and 10 years.
HP:0003819.definition_cn: 儿童期死亡，此处定义为2至10岁之间的死亡。

HP:0003826.name: Stillbirth
HP:0003826.definition: Death of the fetus in utero after at least 22 weeks of gestation.
HP:0003826.definition_cn: 宫内胎儿死亡（Intrauterine Fetal Death, IUFD）发生于妊娠至少22周后。

HP:0003828.name: Variable expressivity
HP:0003828.definition: A variable severity of phenotypic features.
HP:0003828.definition_cn: 表型特征的可变严重程度。

HP:0003829.name: Typified by incomplete penetrance
HP:0003829.definition: Description of conditions in which not all individuals with a given genotype exhibit the disease. Penetrance is the proportion that develop disease given a lifespan of 80 years.
HP:0003829.definition_cn: 描述在特定基因型下并非所有个体均表现出疾病的情况。外显率是指在80年寿命内发展为疾病的个体比例。

HP:0003831.name: Typified by age-related disease onset
HP:0003831.definition: Description of conditions in which age of onset is typically later in life and in which penetrance is dependent on the age of the subject.
HP:0003831.name_cn: 以年龄相关性疾病发病为特征
HP:0003831.definition_cn: 描述发病年龄通常较晚且外显率取决于受试者年龄的疾病状况。

HP:0003834.name: Shoulder dislocation
HP:0003834.definition: A displacement or misalignment of the humerus with respect to the other bones of the should joint. Note that a subluxation is a partial dislocation.
HP:0003834.definition_cn: 肱骨相对于肩关节其他骨骼的移位或错位。注意，半脱位是指部分脱位。

HP:0003835.name: Shoulder subluxation
HP:0003835.definition: A partial dislocation of the shoulder joint.

HP:0003837.name: Soft-tissue ossification around the shoulders
HP:0003837.definition: Formation of calcified tissue in the soft tissues surrounding the shoulder.
HP:0003837.definition_cn: 肩关节周围软组织钙化组织形成。

HP:0003840.name: Delayed upper limb epiphyseal ossification
HP:0003840.definition: A delay in the process of formation and maturation of the epiphysis of one or more long bones of the upper limbs.
HP:0003840.definition_cn: 上肢一或多处长骨骨骺形成与成熟过程延迟。

HP:0003841.name: Fragmented epiphyses of the upper limbs

HP:0003842.name: Irregular epiphyses of the upper limbs

HP:0003843.name: Round epiphyses of the upper limbs

HP:0003844.name: Small epiphyses of the upper limbs

HP:0003846.name: Wide epiphyseal plates of the upper limbs

HP:0003848.name: Cupped metaphyses of the upper limbs

HP:0003849.name: Flared upper limb metaphysis
HP:0003849.definition: The presence of a splayed (i.e.,flared) metaphyseal segment of one or more long bones of the arm.
HP:0003849.definition_cn: 上肢一或多根长骨干骺端呈扇形（即外展）改变。

HP:0003851.name: Lytic defects in metaphyses of the upper limbs
HP:0003851.name_cn: 上肢干骺端溶解性缺损

HP:0003852.name: Normal density transverse bands in metaphyses of the upper limbs
HP:0003852.name_cn: 上肢干骺端正常密度横带

HP:0003853.name: Sclerosis with transverse striations in metaphyses of the upper limbs
HP:0003853.name_cn: 上肢干骺端横纹状硬化

HP:0003854.name: Sclerosis of metaphyses of the upper limbs

HP:0003855.name: Spurred metaphyses of the upper limbs

HP:0003856.name: Upper limb metaphyseal widening
HP:0003856.definition: Increased width (breadth) of metaphyses of the arms.

HP:0003858.name: Cortical diaphyseal irregularity of the upper limbs

HP:0003859.name: Cortical diaphyseal thickening of the upper limbs
