HP:0003860.name: Diaphyseal sclerosis of the upper limbs
HP:0003860.definition: An elevation in bone density in one or more diaphyses of the arms. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.
HP:0003860.definition_cn: 上肢一或多个骨干骨密度增高。硬化通常在X线片上表现为局部密度增加区域。

HP:0003861.name: Broad diaphyses of the upper limbs

HP:0003862.name: Absent humerus
HP:0003862.definition: Missing humerus bone associated with congenital failure of development.
HP:0003862.definition_cn: 肱骨缺失伴先天性发育不全。

HP:0003865.name: Bowed humerus
HP:0003865.definition: A bending or abnormal curvature of the humerus.

HP:0003872.name: Humeral exostoses
HP:0003872.definition: Presence of more than one exostosis originating in one or both humerus bones. An exostosis is a benign growth the projects outward from the bone surface. It is capped by cartilage, and arises from a bone that develops from cartilage.
HP:0003872.definition_cn: 单侧或双侧肱骨上存在多个外生骨疣。外生骨疣是一种从骨表面向外突出的良性增生。其顶部由软骨覆盖，起源于由软骨发育而成的骨骼。

HP:0003875.name: Humeral lytic defects
HP:0003875.definition: Destruction of an area of humerus bone due to a disease process, such as cancer.
HP:0003875.definition_cn: 肱骨局部骨质破坏，继发于疾病进程，如恶性肿瘤。

HP:0003882.name: Slender humerus
HP:0003882.definition: Reduction in diameter of the humerus.

HP:0003891.name: Abnormal humeral epiphysis morphology
HP:0003891.definition: An anomaly of the humeral epiphysis.

HP:0003892.name: Absent humeral epiphyseal ossification
HP:0003892.definition: Lack of formation of bone in the epiphysis of the humerus.

HP:0003893.name: Advanced ossification of the humeral epiphysis
HP:0003893.definition: Ossification of the humeral epiphysis at an earlier age than normal.
HP:0003893.definition_cn: 肱骨骨骺骨化早于正常年龄。

HP:0003894.name: Delayed humeral epiphyseal ossification
HP:0003894.definition: A delay in the process of formation and maturation of the humeral epiphysis.
HP:0003894.definition_cn: 肱骨骨骺形成与成熟过程延迟。

HP:0003897.name: Irregular ossification of the humeral epiphyses

HP:0003901.name: Stippled calcification of the humeral epiphyses

HP:0003902.name: Epiphyseal stippling of the humerus
HP:0003902.definition: The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the humeral epiphysis.
HP:0003902.definition_cn: 肱骨骨骺内存在异常点状（斑点状、点状）钙化灶。

HP:0003903.name: Broad humeral epiphyses
HP:0003903.definition: Increased width of the humeral epiphysis.

HP:0003904.name: Wide epiphyses of the upper limbs

HP:0003905.name: Abnormality of the humeral epiphyseal plate

HP:0003906.name: Broad humeral epiphyseal plate
HP:0003906.definition: Increased width of the humeral epiphyseal growth plate.

HP:0003908.name: Corner fracture of metaphysis
HP:0003908.definition: Fracture or fragmentation at the lateral portion of the metaphysis of a long bone. The radiographic appearance is that of a small corner of metaphysis separated from the metaphyseal edge by thin linear radiolucency. This feature can be observed in child abuse but fragmented appearance of the metaphysis or facture-like lesions can also be detected in the setting of certain skeletal dysplasias.
HP:0003908.definition_cn: 长骨干骺端外侧部分骨折或碎裂。影像学表现为干骺端边缘一小角通过细线状透亮区与干骺端分离。此特征可见于儿童虐待，但在某些骨骼发育不良的情况下也可检测到干骺端碎裂或类似骨折的病变。

HP:0003909.name: Cortical subperiosteal resorption of humeral metaphyses
HP:0003909.name_cn: 肱骨干骺端皮质骨膜下吸收

HP:0003911.name: Flared humeral metaphysis
HP:0003911.definition: Flaring (increase of width with a splayed appearance) of the humeral metaphysis.
HP:0003911.definition_cn: 肱骨干骺端增宽（呈扇形外观）。

HP:0003914.name: Irregular ossification of humeral metaphyses
HP:0003914.name_cn: 肱骨干骺端不规则骨化

HP:0003915.name: Lytic defects of the humeral metaphysis
HP:0003915.name_cn: 肱骨干骺端溶解性缺损

HP:0003919.name: Sclerotic humeral metaphysis with longitudinal striations
HP:0003919.name_cn: 肱骨干骺端硬化伴纵行条纹

HP:0003926.name: Abnormal humeral diaphysis morphology
HP:0003926.definition: An anomaly of the humeral diaphysis.

HP:0003927.name: Cortical irregularity of humeral diaphysis
HP:0003927.definition: An abnormal irregularity of the cortical surface of the diaphysis (shaft) of the humerus.
HP:0003927.definition_cn: 肱骨骨干皮质表面异常不规则。

HP:0003929.name: Ground glass opacity of humeral diaphysis
HP:0003929.name_cn: 肱骨干磨玻璃样密度影

HP:0003931.name: Periosteal new bone of humeral diaphysis

HP:0003935.name: Wide humeral diaphysis
HP:0003935.definition: Increased width of the humeral diaphysis.

HP:0003939.name: Humeroulnar synostosis
HP:0003939.definition: An abnormal osseous union (fusion) between the ulna and the humerus.
HP:0003939.definition_cn: 尺骨与肱骨之间的异常骨性连接（融合）。

HP:0003943.name: Abnormality of the joint spaces of the elbow

HP:0003944.name: Narrow joint spaces of the elbow

HP:0003945.name: Irregular articular surfaces of the elbow joints

HP:0003946.name: Abnormality of the epiphyses of the elbow

HP:0003947.name: Delayed elbow epiphyseal ossification
HP:0003947.definition: A delay in the process of formation and maturation of the epiphysis of one or more long bones that are part of the elbow.
HP:0003947.definition_cn: 一个或多个构成肘部的长骨骨骺形成和成熟过程的延迟。

HP:0003951.name: Distal humeral metaphyseal irregularity
HP:0003951.definition: Irregularity of the normally smooth surface of the metaphysis at the distal end of the humerus (at the elbow).
HP:0003951.name_cn: 肱骨远端干骺端不规则
HP:0003951.definition_cn: 肱骨远端（肘部）干骺端正常光滑表面不规则。

HP:0003952.name: Sclerotic foci of metaphyses of the elbow

HP:0003953.name: Absent forearm bone
HP:0003953.definition: Absence of one or more forearm bones associated with congenital failure of development.
HP:0003953.definition_cn: 先天性发育不全导致的前臂骨缺失。

HP:0003955.name: Bone-in-a-bone appearance of forearm
HP:0003955.definition: A descriptive term for a forearm bone that appears to have an additional bone within it on radiography.
HP:0003955.definition_cn: 放射影像学中描述前臂骨内出现额外骨质的术语。

HP:0003956.name: Bowed forearm bones
HP:0003956.definition: A bending or abnormal curvature affecting either the radius, the ulna, or both.
HP:0003956.definition_cn: 桡骨、尺骨或两者同时出现的弯曲或异常曲度。

HP:0003957.name: Cortical thickening of the forearm bones

HP:0003961.name: Fractured forearm bone
HP:0003961.definition: Bone fracture in the radius, ulna, or wrist.

HP:0003963.name: Lytic defects of the forearm bones

HP:0003971.name: Broad forearm bones
HP:0003971.definition: Abnormally wide bone of the skeleton of forearm.

HP:0003974.name: Absent radius
HP:0003974.definition: Missing radius bone associated with congenital failure of development.
HP:0003974.definition_cn: 桡骨缺失伴先天性发育不全。

HP:0003975.name: obsolete Chevron-shaped/cone-shaped radius
HP:0003975.name_cn: 过时的雪佛龙形/锥形桡骨

HP:0003982.name: Aplasia of the ulna
HP:0003982.definition: Missing ulna bone associated with congenital failure of development.
HP:0003982.definition_cn: 尺骨缺失伴先天性发育不全。

HP:0003991.name: Osteosclerosis of the ulna
HP:0003991.definition: Osteosclerosis (increased density related to increased bone mass) of the ulna.
HP:0003991.definition_cn: 尺骨骨硬化（与骨量增加相关的密度增高）。

HP:0003992.name: Slender ulna
HP:0003992.definition: Reduction in diameter of the ulna.

HP:0003994.name: Dislocated wrist
HP:0003994.definition: An injury of the wrist with displacement of any of the eight carpal bones.
HP:0003994.definition_cn: 腕部损伤伴八块腕骨中任意一块的移位。

HP:0004000.name: Cone-shaped distal radial epiphysis
HP:0004000.definition: The distal epiphysis (rounded portion of bone at the far end of the radius distal to the growth plate) has an abnormal cone-shaped appearance.
HP:0004000.definition_cn: 远端骨骺（位于生长板远端桡骨末端的圆形骨部分）呈现异常的锥形外观。

HP:0004012.name: Premature fusion of the radial epiphyseal plates
HP:0004012.definition: A premature fusion of the epiphyseal plates of the radius. Epiphyseal plates are located at the distal and proximal ends of the long bones, in this case of the radius and premature fusion will have an effect on the growh of the radial bone, inhibiting or at least disturbing the normal growth and development of the bone.
HP:0004012.definition_cn: 桡骨骨骺板过早融合。骨骺板位于长骨的远端和近端，在此情况下，桡骨骨骺板的过早融合将对桡骨的生长产生影响，抑制或至少干扰骨骼的正常生长发育。

HP:0004013.name: Medially fused radial epiphyseal plates
HP:0004013.name_cn: 内侧融合的桡骨骨骺板

HP:0004014.name: Broad radial epiphyseal plate
HP:0004014.definition: Abnormal increase in width of the epiphyseal growth plate of the radius.
HP:0004014.definition_cn: 桡骨骨骺生长板宽度异常增宽。

HP:0004018.name: Flared radial metaphysis
HP:0004018.definition: The presence of a splayed (i.e.,flared) metaphyseal segment of the radius.
HP:0004018.definition_cn: 桡骨干骺端呈外展（即，外翻）形态。

HP:0004019.name: Radial metaphyseal irregularity
HP:0004019.definition: Irregularity of the normally smooth surface of the metaphysis of the radius.
HP:0004019.definition_cn: 桡骨干骺端正常光滑表面不规则。

HP:0004020.name: Irregular ossification of the radial metaphysis
HP:0004020.name_cn: 桡骨干骺端不规则骨化

HP:0004021.name: Lytic defects of radial metaphysis
HP:0004021.name_cn: 桡骨干骺端溶解性缺损

HP:0004022.name: Sclerotic radial metaphysis with longitudinal striations
HP:0004022.name_cn: 硬化性桡骨干骺端伴纵向条纹

HP:0004024.name: Medially sloping radial metaphysis
HP:0004024.name_cn: 内侧倾斜的桡骨干骺端

HP:0004026.name: Broad radial metaphysis
HP:0004026.definition: Increase in width (breadth) of the radial metaphysis.

HP:0004027.name: Abnormality of radial diaphysis
HP:0004027.definition: An anomaly of the radial diaphysis.

HP:0004031.name: Broad radial diaphysis
HP:0004031.definition: Increase in width of the diaphysis of radius.

HP:0004032.name: Abnormal olecranon morphology
HP:0004032.definition: Any structural abnormality of the olecranon, a bony eminence of the proximal ulna.
HP:0004032.definition_cn: 尺骨近端鹰嘴的任何结构异常。

HP:0004038.name: obsolete Bony spicule of ulnar epiphyseal plate
HP:0004038.name_cn: 尺骨骨骺板陈旧性骨小梁

HP:0004039.name: Abnormal ulnar metaphysis morphology
HP:0004039.definition: Any structural abnormality of the portion of the ulna between the epiphysis and the diaphysis.
HP:0004039.definition_cn: 尺骨骨骺与骨干之间部分的结构异常。

HP:0004040.name: Corner fragments of ulnar metaphysis
HP:0004040.name_cn: 尺骨干骺端角部骨折碎片

HP:0004042.name: Ulnar metaphyseal irregularity
HP:0004042.definition: Irregularity of the normally smooth surface of the metaphysis of the ulna.
HP:0004042.definition_cn: 尺骨干骺端正常光滑表面不规则。

HP:0004043.name: Lytic defects of ulnar metaphysis
HP:0004043.name_cn: 尺骨干骺端溶解性缺损

HP:0004045.name: Sloping ulnar metaphysis
HP:0004045.definition: A sloped configuration of the metaphysis (shaft) of the ulna.

HP:0004047.name: Wide ulnar metaphysis
HP:0004047.definition: Increase in width (breadth) of the ulnar metaphysis.

HP:0004050.name: Absent hand
HP:0004050.definition: The total absence of the hand, with no bony elements distal to the radius or ulna.
HP:0004050.definition_cn: 完全性手缺失，桡骨或尺骨远端无骨性结构。

HP:0004051.name: Advanced ossification of the hand bones
HP:0004051.definition: Ossification of hand bones at an earlier age than normal.
HP:0004051.definition_cn: 手骨过早骨化（Premature Ossification of Hand Bones）

HP:0004052.name: Delayed ossification of the hand bones
HP:0004052.definition: Ossification of hand bones is less advanced than would be expected according to age-adjusted norms.
HP:0004052.definition_cn: 手骨骨化程度低于年龄校正标准预期水平。

HP:0004053.name: Dysharmonic maturation of the hand bones
HP:0004053.definition: Pattern of hand-wrist development does not fit the normal sequence of ossification of the individual bones of the hand.
HP:0004053.definition_cn: 手-腕发育模式不符合手部各骨正常骨化序列。

HP:0004054.name: Sclerosis of hand bone
HP:0004054.definition: Osteosclerosis affecting one or more bones of the hand.
HP:0004054.name_cn: 手骨硬化症（Osteosclerosis of the hand bones）
HP:0004054.definition_cn: 手部单骨或多骨骨硬化症。

HP:0004057.name: Mitten deformity
HP:0004057.definition: Fusion of the hands and feet by a thin membrane of skin (scarring) seen in forms of dystrophic epidermolysis bullosa and leading to a \\
HP:0004057.definition_cn: 手足融合由一层薄薄的皮肤膜（瘢痕）引起，见于营养不良性大疱性表皮松解症，并导致

HP:0004059.name: Radial club hand
HP:0004059.definition: Wrist is bent inward toward the thumb because of a congenital defect associated with shortening or absence of the radius.
HP:0004059.definition_cn: 由于先天性桡骨短缩或缺如，手腕向拇指侧内屈。

HP:0004060.name: Trident hand
HP:0004060.definition: A hand in which the fingers are of nearly equal length and deflected at the first interphalangeal joint, so as to give a forklike shape consisting of separation of the first and second as well as the third and fourth digits.
HP:0004060.definition_cn: 手指长度几乎相等且在第一节指间关节处偏斜的手，使得第一和第二指以及第三和第四指分离，形成叉状形态。

HP:0004066.name: obsolete Laterally deviated thumb phalanges
HP:0004066.name_cn: 废弃的侧向偏斜拇指指骨

HP:0004083.name: obsolete Laterally deviated terminal thumb phalanx
HP:0004083.name_cn: 废弃的侧向偏斜的拇指末节指骨

HP:0004090.name: obsolete Advanced maturation/advanced ossification of terminal thumb phalanx epiphysis
HP:0004090.name_cn: 拇指末节指骨骨骺过早成熟/过早骨化

HP:0004097.name: Deviation of finger
HP:0004097.definition: Deviated fingers is a term that should be used if one or more fingers of the hand are deviated from their normal position, either to the radial or ulnar side. A deviation of a finger can be caused by an abnormal form of one or more of the phalanges of the affected finger, or by a deviation or displacement of one or more phalanges.
HP:0004097.definition_cn: 手指偏斜是指一个或多个手指从其正常位置向桡侧或尺侧偏移的术语。手指偏斜可由受影响手指的一个或多个指骨形态异常引起，或由一个或多个指骨的偏移或移位导致。

HP:0004099.name: Macrodactyly
HP:0004099.definition: Significant increase in the length and girth of most or all of a digit compared to its contralateral digit (if unaffected) or compared to what would be expected for age/body build. The increased girth is accompanied by an increase in the dorso-ventral dimension AND the lateral dimension of the digit.
HP:0004099.definition_cn: 与对侧指（如未受影响）或与年龄/体型预期相比，大多数或全部指的长度和周长显著增加。周长的增加伴随着指背腹侧和侧向维度的增加。

HP:0004100.name: Abnormal 2nd finger morphology
HP:0004100.definition: An anomaly of the second finger, also known as the index finger.

HP:0004110.name: obsolete Radially deviated index finger phalanges
HP:0004110.name_cn: 过时的桡侧偏斜食指指骨

HP:0004112.name: Midline nasal groove
HP:0004112.definition: An abnormal groove on the midline of the nose that may extend to the nasal tip.
HP:0004112.definition_cn: 鼻中线异常沟槽，可能延伸至鼻尖。

HP:0004121.name: obsolete Radially displaced proximal index finger phalanx
HP:0004121.name_cn: 陈旧性近节指骨桡侧移位

HP:0004122.name: Midline defect of the nose
HP:0004122.definition: This term groups together three conditions that presumably represent different degrees of severity of a midline defect of the nose or nasal tip.
HP:0004122.definition_cn: 该术语将三种病症归为一类，这些病症可能代表鼻中线或鼻尖缺陷的不同严重程度。

HP:0004132.name: Dimple on nasal tip
HP:0004132.definition: An abnormal indentation of the skin in the region of the nasal tip.
HP:0004132.definition_cn: 鼻尖区域皮肤异常凹陷。

HP:0004138.name: obsolete Metaphyseal abnormality of middle phalanx of the 2nd finger
HP:0004138.name_cn: 第二指中节指骨干骺端异常（陈旧性）

HP:0004139.name: obsolete Flared metaphysis of middle phalanx of index finger
HP:0004139.name_cn: 中指中节指骨扩张的干骺端陈旧性病变

HP:0004143.name: obsolete Radially deviated terminal index finger phalanx
HP:0004143.name_cn: 陈旧性桡侧偏斜的末节指骨

HP:0004144.name: obsolete Duplication of terminal index finger phalanx
HP:0004144.name_cn: 废弃的末节指骨重复畸形

HP:0004150.name: Abnormal 3rd finger morphology
HP:0004150.definition: An anomaly of the third finger.

HP:0004161.name: obsolete Periosteal new bone of middle finger phalanges
HP:0004161.name_cn: 中指指骨陈旧性骨膜新生骨

HP:0004162.name: obsolete Radially pointed middle finger phalanges
HP:0004162.name_cn: 废弃的径向指向中指指骨

HP:0004168.name: obsolete Radially pointed proximal middle-finger phalanx
HP:0004168.name_cn: 废弃的桡侧指向近节中指指骨

HP:0004172.name: Abnormality of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger

HP:0004174.name: obsolete Accessory middle phalanx of middle finger
HP:0004174.name_cn: 中指中节指骨附属结构退化

HP:0004175.name: obsolete Periosteal new bone of middle phalanx of middle-finger
HP:0004175.name_cn: 中指中节指骨陈旧性骨膜新生骨

HP:0004180.name: Short distal phalanx of the 3rd finger
HP:0004180.definition: Hypoplasia (congenital reduction in size) of the distal phalanx of the third finger.
HP:0004180.definition_cn: 第三指远节指骨发育不全（先天性体积减小）。

HP:0004183.name: obsolete Abnormality of the epiphyses of the terminal phalanx of the middle finger

HP:0004184.name: obsolete Cone-shaped epiphysis of terminal phalanx of the middle finger
HP:0004184.name_cn: 中指末节指骨锥形骨骺陈旧性病变

HP:0004185.name: obsolete Fused epiphysis of terminal phalanx of the middle finger
HP:0004185.name_cn: 中指末节指骨骨骺融合陈旧性改变

HP:0004186.name: obsolete Large epiphysis of terminal phalanx of the middle finger
HP:0004186.name_cn: 中指末节指骨骨骺肥大

HP:0004187.name: obsolete Prematurely fused epiphysis of terminal phalanx of the middle finger
HP:0004187.name_cn: 中指末节指骨骨骺过早闭合

HP:0004192.name: obsolete Bracket epiphyses of the 4th finger
HP:0004192.name_cn: 第四指陈旧性骨骺支架

HP:0004193.name: obsolete Expanded phalanges of the ring finger

HP:0004194.name: obsolete Hypoplastic phalanges of the ring finger
HP:0004194.name_cn: 废弃术语：环指指骨发育不全

HP:0004195.name: Osteolytic defects of the phalanges of the 4th finger
HP:0004195.definition: Osteolytic defects of the phalanges of the 4th (ring) finger.
HP:0004195.name_cn: 第四指指骨溶骨性缺损
HP:0004195.definition_cn: 第四指（环指）指骨的溶骨性缺损。

HP:0004196.name: obsolete Short phalanges of the ring finger

HP:0004197.name: Symphalangism of the 4th finger
HP:0004197.definition: Fusion of two or more bones of the 4th finger.
HP:0004197.name_cn: 第四指指间关节融合症

HP:0004198.name: obsolete Wide/broad phalanges of the ring finger
HP:0004198.name_cn: 废弃术语：无名指宽/粗指骨

HP:0004201.name: obsolete Expanded proximal phalanx of the ring finger
HP:0004201.name_cn: 废弃的环指近节指骨扩张

HP:0004202.name: obsolete Lytic defects of the proximal phalanx of the ring finger
HP:0004202.name_cn: 环指近节指骨溶解性病变

HP:0004203.name: obsolete Short proximal phalanx of the ring finger
HP:0004203.name_cn: 废弃的环指近节指骨短缩

HP:0004207.name: Abnormal 5th finger morphology
HP:0004207.definition: An abnormality affecting one or both 5th fingers.
HP:0004207.definition_cn: 影响单侧或双侧第五指（小指）的畸形。

HP:0004209.name: Clinodactyly of the 5th finger
HP:0004209.definition: Clinodactyly refers to a bending or curvature of the fifth finger in the radial direction (i.e., towards the 4th finger).
HP:0004209.definition_cn: Clinodactyly refers to a radial deviation or curvature of the fifth digit (i.e., towards the fourth digit).

HP:0004213.name: Abnormal 5th finger phalanx morphology
HP:0004213.definition: Abnormality of the phalanges of the 5th (little) finger.

HP:0004216.name: Osteolytic defects of the phalanges of the 5th finger
HP:0004216.definition: Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the phalanges of the 5th finger.
HP:0004216.name_cn: 第五指指骨溶骨性缺损
HP:0004216.definition_cn: 第五指指骨骨组织溶解或退行性变。

HP:0004218.name: Symphalangism of the 5th finger
HP:0004218.definition: Fusion of two or more bones of the 5th finger.
HP:0004218.name_cn: 第五指指间关节融合症
HP:0004218.definition_cn: 第五指两节或多节指骨的骨性融合。

HP:0004219.name: Abnormality of the middle phalanx of the 5th finger

HP:0004220.name: Short middle phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0004220.definition: Hypoplastic/small middle phalanx of the fifth finger.
HP:0004220.definition_cn: 第五指中节指骨发育不全/短小。

HP:0004222.name: Cone-shaped epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0004222.definition: A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the little finger of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.
HP:0004222.name_cn: 第五指远节指骨锥形骨骺
HP:0004222.definition_cn: 小指远节指骨骨骺呈锥形外观，形成“球窝”状表现。该骨骺位于指骨近端，通常近乎平坦。相关实体“天使形”骨骺指的是显著的锥形骨骺合并指骨远端的假骨骺。

HP:0004223.name: Ivory epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0004223.definition: Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the little finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.
HP:0004223.name_cn: 第五指远节指骨象牙样骨骺
HP:0004223.definition_cn: 小指远节指骨骨骺硬化，导致X线检查中放射密度增加（呈现白色或象牙色外观）。

HP:0004224.name: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0004224.definition: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the fifth finger. This epiphysis is located on the proximal end of the phalanx.
HP:0004224.name_cn: 第五指中节指骨骺异常
HP:0004224.definition_cn: 第五指中节指骨骨骺异常。该骨骺位于指骨近端。

HP:0004225.name: Abnormality of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0004225.definition: Abnormality of the distal phalanx of the 5th (little) finger.
HP:0004225.definition_cn: 第五指（小指）远端指骨异常。

HP:0004226.name: Curved distal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0004226.definition: Curved appearance of the distal phalanx of the 5th (little) finger.
HP:0004226.definition_cn: 第五指（小指）远节指骨的弯曲外观。

HP:0004227.name: Short distal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0004227.definition: Hypoplastic/small distal phalanx of the fifth finger.
HP:0004227.definition_cn: 第五指远端指骨发育不全/短小。

HP:0004230.name: Subluxation of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the little finger
HP:0004230.definition: A partial dislocation of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the little finger.
HP:0004230.name_cn: 小指近端指间关节半脱位
HP:0004230.definition_cn: 小指近端指间关节部分脱位。

HP:0004231.name: Carpal bone aplasia
HP:0004231.definition: Congenital absence of a carpal bone.

HP:0004232.name: Accessory carpal bones
HP:0004232.definition: The presence of more than the normal number of carpal bones.

HP:0004233.name: Advanced ossification of carpal bones
HP:0004233.definition: Ossification of carpal bones at an abnormally early age.

HP:0004234.name: Bone-in-a-bone appearance of carpal bones
HP:0004234.definition: The bone-in-bone sign is a radiographic finding produced by increased sclerosis (abnormally dense bone) occurring intermittently with zones of relatively normal bone density. This term should be used to describe such a finding in the carpal bones.
HP:0004234.definition_cn: 骨中骨征（bone-in-bone sign）是一种影像学表现，其特征为骨硬化（异常致密的骨质）与相对正常骨密度区域交替出现。该术语应用于描述腕骨中的此类影像学表现。

HP:0004236.name: Irregular carpal bones
HP:0004236.definition: Carpal bones with irregular or fragmented margins.
HP:0004236.definition_cn: 腕骨边缘不规则或碎裂。

HP:0004241.name: Stippled calcification in carpal bones
HP:0004241.definition: Point-shaped (punctate) calcifications affecting the carpal bones.
HP:0004241.definition_cn: 点状（点状）钙化累及腕骨。

HP:0004246.name: Delayed ossification of the scaphoid
HP:0004246.definition: Formation of bone tissue of scaphoid is less than expected for age.
HP:0004246.definition_cn: 舟骨骨组织形成低于年龄预期水平。

HP:0004251.name: Lunate-triquetral fusion
HP:0004251.definition: Osseous fusion of the lunate and triquetrum.
HP:0004251.definition_cn: 月骨与三角骨的骨性融合。

HP:0004254.name: Delayed ossification of the trapezium
HP:0004254.definition: Formation of bone tissue of trapezium is less than expected for age.
HP:0004254.definition_cn: 钩骨骨组织形成低于年龄预期水平。

HP:0004257.name: Delayed ossification of the trapezoid bone
HP:0004257.definition: Formation of bone tissue of trapezoid is less than expected for age.
HP:0004257.definition_cn: 梯形骨骨组织形成低于年龄预期水平。

HP:0004267.name: Narrow small joints of the hand

HP:0004268.name: Osteoarthritis of the small joints of the hand

HP:0004269.name: Subluxation of the small joints of the hand
HP:0004269.definition: A partial dislocation of some or all of the small joints of the hand.
HP:0004269.definition_cn: 手部部分或全部小关节的半脱位。

HP:0004276.name: Exostoses of hand bones
HP:0004276.definition: Abnormal formation of new bone on the surface of a bone of the hand.
HP:0004276.definition_cn: 手骨表面新骨异常形成。

HP:0004278.name: Synostosis involving bones of the hand
HP:0004278.definition: An abnormal union between bones or parts of bones of the hand.
HP:0004278.definition_cn: 手部骨骼或骨骼部分之间的异常连接。

HP:0004283.name: Narrow palm
HP:0004283.definition: For children from birth to 4 years of age, the palm width is more than 2 SD below the mean; for children from 4 to 16 years of age the palm width is below the 5th centile; or, the width of the palm appears disproportionately narrow for its length.
HP:0004283.definition_cn: 对于出生至4岁的儿童，手掌宽度低于平均值2个标准差以上；对于4至16岁的儿童，手掌宽度低于第5百分位数；或者，手掌宽度相对于其长度显得不成比例地狭窄。

HP:0004290.name: Sclerosis of hand bones with transverse striations

HP:0004293.name: Synostosis of second metacarpal-trapezoid
HP:0004293.name_cn: 第二掌骨-小多角骨骨性连接
HP:0004293.definition_cn: 第二掌骨-小多角骨融合术。

HP:0004294.name: Subluxation of metacarpal phalangeal joints
HP:0004294.definition: A partial dislocation affecting some or all of the metacarpophalangeal joints.
HP:0004294.definition_cn: 部分脱位累及部分或全部掌指关节。

HP:0004295.name: Abnormal gastric mucosa morphology
HP:0004295.definition: An abnormality of the gastric mucous membrane.

HP:0004297.name: Abnormality of the biliary system
HP:0004297.definition: An abnormality of the biliary system.

HP:0004298.name: Abnormality of the abdominal wall
HP:0004298.definition: The presence of any abnormality affecting the abdominal wall.

HP:0004299.name: Hernia of the abdominal wall
HP:0004299.definition: The presence of a hernia in the abdominal wall.

HP:0004303.name: Abnormal muscle fiber morphology
HP:0004303.definition: Any abnormality of the skeletal muscle cell. Muscle fibers are subdivided into two types. Type I fibers are fatigue-resistant and rich in oxidative enzymes (they stain light with the myosin ATPase reaction), and type II fibers are fast-contracting, fatigue-prone, and rich in glycolytic enzymes (these fibers stain darkly). Normal muscle tissue has a random distribution of type I and type II fibers.
HP:0004303.definition_cn: 骨骼肌细胞的任何异常。肌纤维分为两种类型。I型纤维具有抗疲劳性，富含氧化酶（在肌球蛋白ATP酶反应中呈浅色染色），而II型纤维收缩迅速，易疲劳，富含糖酵解酶（这些纤维呈深色染色）。正常肌肉组织中I型和II型纤维呈随机分布。

HP:0004305.name: Involuntary movements
HP:0004305.definition: Involuntary contractions of muscle leading to involuntary movements of extremities, neck, trunk, or face.
HP:0004305.definition_cn: 不自主肌肉收缩导致四肢、颈部、躯干或面部的不自主运动。

HP:0004307.name: Abnormal anatomic location of the heart
HP:0004307.definition: Developmental defect characterized by an anomalous anatomic location of the heart.
HP:0004307.definition_cn: 发育缺陷，其特征为心脏解剖位置异常。

HP:0004309.name: Ventricular preexcitation
HP:0004309.definition: An abnormality in which the cardiac ventricles depolarize too early as a result of an abnormality of cardiac conduction pathways such as an accessory pathway.
HP:0004309.definition_cn: 一种异常情况，即由于心脏传导通路（如旁路）异常导致心室的去极化过早发生。

HP:0004312.name: Abnormal reticulocyte morphology
HP:0004312.name_cn: 异常网织红细胞形态学

HP:0004313.name: Decreased circulating antibody concentration
HP:0004313.definition: An abnormally decreased level of immunoglobulin in blood.

HP:0004315.name: Decreased circulating IgG concentration
HP:0004315.definition: An abnormally decreased level of immunoglobulin G (IgG) in blood.
HP:0004315.definition_cn: 血液中免疫球蛋白G（IgG）水平异常降低。

HP:0004320.name: Vaginal fistula
HP:0004320.definition: The presence of a fistula of the vagina.

HP:0004321.name: Bladder fistula
HP:0004321.definition: The presence of a fistula connecting the urinary bladder to another organ or the skin. The fistula can involve the bowel, the vagina, or rarely, the skin.
HP:0004321.definition_cn: 膀胱与另一器官或皮肤之间存在瘘管。该瘘管可累及肠道、阴道，或罕见情况下累及皮肤。

HP:0004322.name: Short stature
HP:0004322.definition: A height below that which is expected according to age and gender norms. Although there is no universally accepted definition of short stature, many refer to \\
HP:0004322.definition_cn: 身高低于根据年龄和性别标准预期的水平。尽管尚无普遍接受的矮小身材定义，但许多情况下指的是身高低于同年龄和性别群体平均值的两个标准差或低于第三百分位数。

HP:0004323.name: Abnormality of body weight
HP:0004323.definition: An abnormal increase or decrease of weight or an abnormal distribution of mass in the body.
HP:0004323.definition_cn: 体重异常增加或减少或体内质量分布异常。

HP:0004324.name: Increased body weight
HP:0004324.definition_cn: 体重异常增加（Abnormally increased body weight）。

HP:0004326.name: Cachexia
HP:0004326.definition: Severe weight loss, wasting of muscle, loss of appetite, and general debility related to a chronic disease.
HP:0004326.definition_cn: 严重体重减轻、肌肉消耗、食欲减退及与慢性疾病相关的全身虚弱。

HP:0004327.name: Abnormal vitreous humor morphology
HP:0004327.definition: Any structural anomaly of the vitreous body.

HP:0004328.name: Abnormal anterior eye segment morphology
HP:0004328.definition: An abnormality of the anterior segment of the eyeball (which comprises the structures in front of the vitreous humor: the cornea, iris, ciliary body, and lens).
HP:0004328.definition_cn: 眼球前节异常（包括玻璃体前部的结构：角膜、虹膜、睫状体和晶状体）。

HP:0004330.name: Increased skull ossification
HP:0004330.definition: An increase in the magnitude or amount of ossification of the skull.
HP:0004330.definition_cn: 颅骨骨化程度或骨化量的增加。

HP:0004331.name: Decreased skull ossification
HP:0004331.definition: A reduction in the magnitude or amount of ossification of the skull.
HP:0004331.definition_cn: 颅骨骨化程度或量的减少。

HP:0004333.name: Bone-marrow foam cells
HP:0004333.definition: The presence of foam cells in the bone marrow, generally demonstrated by bone-marrow aspiration or biopsy. Foam cells have a vacuolated appearance due to the presence of complex lipid deposits, giving them a foamy or soap-suds appearance.
HP:0004333.definition_cn: 骨髓中存在泡沫细胞，通常通过骨髓穿刺或骨髓活检进行证实。泡沫细胞由于复杂的脂质沉积而呈现空泡状外观，使其具有泡沫状或肥皂泡状的外观。

HP:0004334.name: Dermal atrophy
HP:0004334.definition: Partial or complete wasting (atrophy) of the skin.
HP:0004334.definition_cn: 皮肤部分或完全性萎缩（Atrophy）。

HP:0004336.name: Myelin outfoldings
HP:0004336.definition: The presence of excessive redundant myelin in the peripheral nerve sheath.
HP:0004336.definition_cn: 周围神经鞘内存在过量的冗余髓鞘。

HP:0004337.name: Abnormality of amino acid metabolism
HP:0004337.definition: Abnormality of an amino acid metabolic process.

HP:0004338.name: Abnormal circulating aromatic amino acid concentration
HP:0004338.definition: Any deviation from the normal concentration of a aromatic amino acid in the blood circulation.
HP:0004338.name_cn: 异常循环芳香族氨基酸浓度
HP:0004338.definition_cn: 血液循环中芳香族氨基酸正常浓度的任何偏离。

HP:0004339.name: Abnormal circulating sulfur amino acid concentration
HP:0004339.definition: Any deviation from the normal concentration of a sulfur amino acid in the blood circulation.
HP:0004339.name_cn: 异常循环硫氨基酸浓度
HP:0004339.definition_cn: 血液循环中硫氨基酸浓度的任何异常。

HP:0004342.name: Abnormal galactosidase enyzme activity
HP:0004342.definition: Abnormality of galactoside metabolism. A galactoside is a glycoside (a sugar moiety bound to some other moiety) containing galactose.
HP:0004342.definition_cn: 半乳糖苷代谢异常。半乳糖苷是一种含有半乳糖的糖苷（一种糖基与其他基团结合的化合物）。

HP:0004345.name: Ganglioside accumulation
HP:0004345.definition: Defects in the lysosomal glycosidases or specific co-activators, result in accumulation of the substrates, such as glycosphingolipids, including gangliosides in GM1 gangliosidosis (Tay-Sachs disease) and GM2 gangliosidosis (Sandhoff disease).
HP:0004345.definition_cn: 溶酶体糖苷酶或特定辅激活因子的缺陷导致底物积累，例如糖鞘脂，包括GM1神经节苷脂贮积症（泰-萨克斯病）和GM2神经节苷脂贮积症（桑德霍夫病）中的神经节苷脂。

HP:0004347.name: Weakness of muscles of respiration
HP:0004347.definition: Reduced function of the muscles required to generate subatmospheric pressure in the thoracic cavity during breathing: the diaphragm, the external intercostal and the interchondral part of the internal intercostal muscles.
HP:0004347.definition_cn: 呼吸过程中产生胸腔负压所需的肌肉功能减退：膈肌、肋间外肌以及肋间内肌的软骨间部分。

HP:0004348.name: Abnormality of bone mineral density
HP:0004348.definition: This term applies to all changes in bone mineral density which (depending on severity) can be seen on x-rays as a change in density and or structure of the bone. Changes may affect all bones of the organism, just certain bones or only parts of bones and include decreased mineralisation as may be seen in osteoporosis or increased mineralisation and or ossification as in osteopetrosis, exostoses or any kind of atopic calicfications of different origin and distribution. The overall amount of mineralization of the bone-organ can be measured as the amount of matter per cubic centimeter of bones, usually measured by densitometry of the lumbar spine or hip. The measurements are usually reported as g/cm3 or as a Z-score (the number of standard deviations above or below the mean for the patient's age and sex). Note that measurement with this method does not reflect local changes in other bones, and as such might not be correct with regard the hole bone-organ.
HP:0004348.definition_cn: 该术语适用于所有骨矿物质密度的变化，这些变化（取决于严重程度）可在X射线上表现为骨密度和/或结构的改变。这些变化可能影响机体的所有骨骼、特定骨骼或仅部分骨骼，包括矿物质减少（如骨质疏松症中所见）或矿物质增加和/或骨化（如骨硬化症、外生骨疣或任何类型的异位钙化，其起源和分布各异）。骨器官的整体矿化量可通过每立方厘米骨骼中的物质含量来测量，通常通过腰椎或髋部的骨密度测定法进行测量。测量结果通常以g/cm³或Z值（即患者年龄和性别均值的标准差数）报告。需要注意的是，该方法测量结果不反映其他骨骼的局部变化，因此可能无法准确反映整个骨器官的情况。

HP:0004349.name: Reduced bone mineral density
HP:0004349.definition: A reduction of bone mineral density, that is, of the amount of matter per cubic centimeter of bones.
HP:0004349.definition_cn: 骨矿物质密度降低，即每立方厘米骨骼中物质含量的减少。

HP:0004352.name: Abnormal circulating purine concentration
HP:0004352.definition: Any deviation from the normal concentration of a purine in the blood circulation.
HP:0004352.definition_cn: 血液循环中嘌呤浓度偏离正常值的任何异常。

HP:0004353.name: Abnormal circulating pyrimidine concentration
HP:0004353.definition: Any deviation from the normal concentration of a pyrimidine in the blood circulation.
HP:0004353.definition_cn: 血液循环中嘧啶浓度偏离正常值的任何异常。

HP:0004354.name: Abnormal circulating carboxylic acid concentration
HP:0004354.definition: Any deviation from the normal concentration of a carboxylic acid in the blood circulation.

HP:0004355.name: obsolete Abnormality of proteoglycan metabolism
HP:0004355.name_cn: 过时的 蛋白聚糖代谢异常

HP:0004357.name: Abnormal circulating leucine concentration
HP:0004357.definition: Any deviation from the normal circulation of leucine in the blood circulation.
HP:0004357.definition_cn: 血液中亮氨酸循环的任何异常。

HP:0004359.name: Abnormal circulating fatty-acid concentration
HP:0004359.definition: A deviation from the normal concentration of a fatty acid in the blood circulation.
HP:0004359.definition_cn: 血液循环中脂肪酸浓度的异常偏离。

HP:0004360.name: Abnormality of acid-base homeostasis
HP:0004360.definition: An abnormality of the balance or maintenance of the balance of acids and bases in bodily fluids, resulting in an abnormal pH.

HP:0004361.name: Abnormal circulating leptin concentration
HP:0004361.definition: An abnormal concentration of leptin in the blood.

HP:0004362.name: Abnormal enteric ganglion morphology
HP:0004362.definition: An abnormality of the enteric nervous system, which comprises two types of ganglia, the myenteric (Auerbach's) and submucosal (Meissner's) plexuses. The enteric nervous system functions to control gut movement, fluid exchange between the gut and its lumen, and local blood flow.
HP:0004362.definition_cn: 肠神经系统异常，该系统包括两种类型的神经节：肌间神经丛（奥尔巴赫神经丛）和黏膜下神经丛（迈斯纳神经丛）。肠神经系统的主要功能是控制肠道运动、肠道与其管腔之间的液体交换以及局部血流。

HP:0004363.name: Abnormal circulating calcium concentration
HP:0004363.definition: Any deviation from the normal concentration of calcium in the blood circulation.
HP:0004363.definition_cn: 任何偏离血液循环中正常钙浓度的异常情况。

HP:0004364.name: Abnormal circulating nitrogen compound concentration
HP:0004364.definition: Any deviation from the normal concentration of a nitrogen compound in the blood circulation.
HP:0004364.name_cn: 异常循环氮化合物浓度
HP:0004364.definition_cn: 血液中氮化合物浓度的任何异常。

HP:0004365.name: Abnormal circulating tryptophan concentration
HP:0004365.definition: Any deviation from the normal concentration of tryptophan in the blood circulation.
HP:0004365.definition_cn: 血液循环中色氨酸浓度的任何异常。

HP:0004368.name: Increased circulating purine concentration
HP:0004368.definition: Abnormally elevated concentration of a purine compound. Purine compounds are aromatic heterocyclic compounds containing a purine moiety, which is formed a pyrimidine-ring ring fused to an imidazole ring.
HP:0004368.definition_cn: 嘌呤化合物浓度异常升高。嘌呤化合物是含有嘌呤基团的芳香杂环化合物，嘌呤基团由嘧啶环与咪唑环融合而成。

HP:0004369.name: Decreased circulating purine concentration
HP:0004369.definition: Abnormally reduced concentration of a purine compound. Purine compounds are aromatic heterocyclic compounds containing a purine moiety, which is formed a pyrimidine-ring ring fused to an imidazole ring.
HP:0004369.definition_cn: 嘌呤化合物浓度异常降低。嘌呤化合物是含有嘌呤基团的芳香杂环化合物，嘌呤基团由嘧啶环与咪唑环稠合而成。

HP:0004372.name: Reduced consciousness
HP:0004372.definition: Abnormally diminished level of attention, responsiveness, or wakefulness.
HP:0004372.definition_cn: 意识水平降低（Decreased Level of Consciousness, LOC）

HP:0004373.name: Focal dystonia
HP:0004373.definition: A type of dystonia that is localized to a specific part of the body.

HP:0004374.name: Hemiplegia/hemiparesis
HP:0004374.definition: Loss of strength in the arm, leg, and sometimes face on one side of the body. Hemiplegia refers to a severe or complete loss of strength, whereas hemiparesis refers to a relatively mild loss of strength.
HP:0004374.definition_cn: 单侧上肢、下肢及有时面部肌力减退。偏瘫（Hemiplegia）指严重或完全的肌力丧失，而轻偏瘫（Hemiparesis）则指相对较轻的肌力减退。

HP:0004375.name: Neoplasm of the nervous system
HP:0004375.definition: A tumor (abnormal growth of tissue) of the nervous system.
HP:0004375.definition_cn: 神经系统肿瘤（神经组织异常增生）。

HP:0004376.name: Neuroblastic tumor
HP:0004376.definition: A family of tumors arising in the embryonal remnants of the sympathetic nervous system, which includes neuroblastoma, ganglioneuroblastoma, and ganglioneuroma.
HP:0004376.definition_cn: 一组起源于交感神经系统胚胎残余的肿瘤家族，包括神经母细胞瘤、节细胞神经母细胞瘤和节细胞神经瘤。

HP:0004377.name: Hematological neoplasm
HP:0004377.definition: Neoplasms located in the blood and blood-forming tissue (the bone marrow and lymphatic tissue).
HP:0004377.definition_cn: 造血和淋巴组织肿瘤（位于血液和造血组织中的肿瘤，包括骨髓和淋巴组织）。

HP:0004379.name: Abnormality of alkaline phosphatase level
HP:0004379.definition: An abnormality of alkaline phosphatase level.

HP:0004380.name: Aortic valve calcification
HP:0004380.definition: Deposition of calcium salts in the aortic valve.

HP:0004381.name: Supravalvular aortic stenosis
HP:0004381.definition: A pathological narrowing in the region above the aortic valve associated with restricted left ventricular outflow.
HP:0004381.definition_cn: 主动脉瓣上区域病理性狭窄伴左心室流出道受限。

HP:0004382.name: Mitral valve calcification
HP:0004382.definition: Abnormal calcification of the mitral valve.

HP:0004383.name: Hypoplastic left heart
HP:0004383.definition: Underdevelopment of the left side of the heart. May include atresia of the aortic or mitral orifice and hypoplasia of the ascending aorta.
HP:0004383.definition_cn: 左心发育不全。可能包括主动脉瓣或二尖瓣闭锁以及升主动脉发育不全。

HP:0004384.name: Type I truncus arteriosus
HP:0004384.definition: Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) with a short pulmonary trunk arises from the truncus arteriosus, giving rise to both pulmonary arteries.
HP:0004384.definition_cn: 动脉干（单一的大动脉从心脏底部发出，分出冠状动脉、肺动脉和体循环动脉）伴短肺动脉干，该肺动脉干从动脉干发出，并分出左右肺动脉。

HP:0004386.name: Gastrointestinal inflammation
HP:0004386.definition: Inflammation of the alimentary part of the gastrointestinal system.
HP:0004386.definition_cn: 胃肠道消化部分的炎症。

HP:0004387.name: Enterocolitis
HP:0004387.definition: An inflammation of the colon and small intestine. However, most conditions are either categorized as Enteritis (inflammation of the small intestine) or Colitis (inflammation of the large intestine).
HP:0004387.definition_cn: 结肠和小肠的炎症。然而，大多数情况被归类为肠炎（小肠的炎症）或结肠炎（大肠的炎症）。

HP:0004388.name: Microcolon
HP:0004388.definition: A colon of abnormally small caliber.

HP:0004389.name: Intestinal pseudo-obstruction
HP:0004389.definition: A functional rather than mechanical obstruction of the intestines, associated with manifestations that resemble those caused by an intestinal obstruction, including distension, abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, constipation or diarrhea, in an individual in whom a mechanical blockage has been excluded.
HP:0004389.definition_cn: 功能性而非机械性肠梗阻，其表现类似于由机械性肠梗阻引起的症状，包括腹胀、腹痛、恶心、呕吐、便秘或腹泻，且已排除机械性阻塞的个体。

HP:0004390.name: Hamartomatous polyposis
HP:0004390.definition: Polyp-like protrusions which are histologically hamartomas. These can occur throughout the gastrointestinal tract. Hamartomatous polyps are composed of the normal cellular elements of the gastrointestinal tract, but have a markedly distorted architecture.
HP:0004390.definition_cn: 组织学上为错构瘤的息肉样突起。这些病变可发生于整个胃肠道。错构瘤性息肉由胃肠道的正常细胞成分构成，但其结构明显紊乱。

HP:0004392.name: Prune belly
HP:0004392.definition: A kind of congenital defect of the anterior abdominal wall in which the intestines are evident through the thin, lax, and protruding abdominal wall in affected infants.
HP:0004392.definition_cn: 一种先天性腹壁前部缺陷，表现为受累婴儿的肠管通过薄而松弛且突出的腹壁明显可见。

HP:0004395.name: Malnutrition
HP:0004395.definition: A deficiency in the intake of energy and nutrients.
HP:0004395.definition_cn: 能量和营养素摄入不足

HP:0004397.name: Ectopic anus
HP:0004397.definition: Abnormal displacement or malposition of the anus.

HP:0004398.name: Peptic ulcer
HP:0004398.definition: The term peptic ulcer refers to acid peptic injury of the digestive tract, resulting in mucosal break reaching the submucosa. Peptic ulcers are usually located in the stomach or proximal duodenum, but they can also be found in the esophagus or Meckel's diverticulum. Infection with Helicobacter pylori and the use of non steroidal antiinflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) or aspirin are the main risk factors of both gastric and duodenal peptic ulcers.
HP:0004398.definition_cn: 消化性溃疡（Peptic Ulcer）是指消化道因酸性消化液损伤，导致黏膜破损深达黏膜下层。消化性溃疡通常位于胃或十二指肠近端，但也可见于食管或梅克尔憩室（Meckel's Diverticulum）。幽门螺杆菌（Helicobacter pylori）感染以及非甾体抗炎药（NSAIDs）或阿司匹林的使用是胃和十二指肠消化性溃疡的主要危险因素。

HP:0004401.name: Meconium ileus
HP:0004401.definition: Obstruction of the intestine due to abnormally thick meconium.
HP:0004401.definition_cn: 由于异常粘稠的胎粪导致的肠梗阻。

HP:0004408.name: Abnormality of the sense of smell
HP:0004408.definition: An anomaly in the ability to perceive and distinguish scents (odors).
HP:0004408.definition_cn: 嗅觉感知和辨别能力异常（嗅觉障碍）。

HP:0004409.name: Hyposmia
HP:0004409.definition: A decreased sensitivity to odorants (that is, a decreased ability to perceive odors).
HP:0004409.definition_cn: 嗅觉减退（即对气味的感知能力下降）。

HP:0004411.name: Deviated nasal septum
HP:0004411.definition: Positioning of the nasal septum to the right or left in contrast to the normal midline position of the nasal septum.

HP:0004414.name: Abnormality of the pulmonary artery
HP:0004414.definition: An abnormality of the pulmonary artery.

HP:0004415.name: Pulmonary artery stenosis
HP:0004415.definition: An abnormal narrowing or constriction of the pulmonary artery, in the main pulmonary artery and/or in the left or right pulmonary artery branches.
HP:0004415.definition_cn: 肺动脉异常狭窄或缩窄，主要发生在主肺动脉和/或左、右肺动脉分支。

HP:0004417.name: Intermittent claudication
HP:0004417.definition: Intermittent claudication is a symptom of peripheral arterial occlusive disease. After having walked over a distance which is individually characteristic, the patients experience pain or cramps in the calves, feet or thighs which typically subsides on standing still.
HP:0004417.definition_cn: 间歇性跛行是外周动脉闭塞性疾病的一种症状。患者在行走一段个体特征性的距离后，会出现小腿、足部或大腿的疼痛或痉挛，通常在静止站立时症状缓解。

HP:0004418.name: Thrombophlebitis
HP:0004418.definition: Inflammation of a vein associated with venous thrombosis (blood clot formation within the vein).
HP:0004418.definition_cn: 静脉炎伴静脉血栓形成（静脉内血栓形成）。

HP:0004419.name: Recurrent thrombophlebitis
HP:0004419.definition: Repeated episodes of inflammation of a vein associated with venous thrombosis (blood clot formation within the vein).
HP:0004419.definition_cn: 复发性静脉炎伴静脉血栓形成（静脉内血栓形成）。

HP:0004420.name: Arterial thrombosis
HP:0004420.definition: The formation of a blood clot inside an artery.

HP:0004421.name: Elevated systolic blood pressure
HP:0004421.definition: Abnormal increase in systolic blood pressure.

HP:0004422.name: Biparietal narrowing
HP:0004422.definition: A narrowing of the biparietal diameter (i.e., of the transverse distance between the protuberances of the two parietal bones of the skull).
HP:0004422.definition_cn: 双顶径狭窄（即颅骨两侧顶骨隆突之间的横向距离缩小）。

HP:0004423.name: Cranium bifidum occultum
HP:0004423.definition: Cranium bifidum occultum, also known as Catlin mark, is a congenital midline skull defect presenting as an enlarged posterior fontanelle in the upper posterior angle of the parietal bone close to the intersection of the sagittal and lambdoid sutures. Cranium bifidum occultum occurs due to a defect in intramembranous ossification, a process through which skull bones (frontal, parietal, squamous temporal and occipital bones superior to the mendosal suture) ossify under a vascularized membrane toward the midline to cover the brain. Unlike cranium bifidum cysticum, cranium bifidum occultum does not have herniation of intracranial contents. As the skull grows, the midline cranium bifidum occultum defect is separated into bilateral enlarged parietal foramina (EPF) by a midline osseous bridge.
HP:0004423.definition_cn: 隐性颅裂，又称Catlin标记，是一种先天性中线颅骨缺损，表现为靠近矢状缝和人字缝交界的顶骨上后角处的后囟门扩大。隐性颅裂是由于膜内骨化过程中的缺陷所致，该过程使颅骨（额骨、顶骨、鳞状颞骨和门多萨缝以上的枕骨）在血管化膜下向中线骨化以覆盖大脑。与囊性颅裂不同，隐性颅裂没有颅内内容物的疝出。随着颅骨的生长，隐性颅裂的中线缺损被中线骨桥分隔为双侧顶骨孔扩大（EPF）。

HP:0004426.name: Abnormal cheek morphology
HP:0004426.definition: An abnormality of the cheek- one of two bilateral soft tissue facial structures in the region of the face inferior to the eyes and between the nose and the ear. \\
HP:0004426.definition_cn: 颊部异常——位于面部下方、眼睛下方、鼻子和耳朵之间的双侧软组织面部结构之一。

HP:0004428.name: Elfin facies
HP:0004428.definition: This is a description previously used to describe a facial form characterized by a short, upturned nose, wide mouth, widely spaced eyes, and full cheeks. Because of the imprecision in this definition it is preferable to describe these features precisely. This term is retained because it was often used in the past, but it should not be used for new annotations.
HP:0004428.definition_cn: 这是一种先前用于描述面部形态的术语，其特征包括短而上翘的鼻部、宽阔的口部、眼距增宽以及丰满的面颊。由于该定义的不精确性，建议精确描述这些特征。该术语因其过去频繁使用而保留，但不应在新的注释中使用。

HP:0004429.name: Recurrent viral infections
HP:0004429.definition: Increased susceptibility to viral infections, as manifested by recurrent episodes of viral infection.
HP:0004429.definition_cn: 对病毒感染的易感性增加，表现为反复发作的病毒感染。

HP:0004430.name: Severe combined immunodeficiency
HP:0004430.definition: A type of primary immune deficiency that is characterized by a more severe defect in both the T- and B-lymphocyte systems.
HP:0004430.definition_cn: 一种原发性免疫缺陷病，其特征为T淋巴细胞和B淋巴细胞系统均存在更为严重的缺陷。

HP:0004431.name: Reduced circulating complement concentration
HP:0004431.definition: An immunodeficiency defined by the absent or suboptimal functioning of one of the complement system proteins.
HP:0004431.definition_cn: 一种免疫缺陷，其特征为补体系统蛋白之一的功能缺失或功能低下。

HP:0004432.name: Agammaglobulinemia
HP:0004432.definition: A lasting absence of total IgG and total IgA and total IgM in the blood circulation, whereby at most trace quantities can be measured.
HP:0004432.definition_cn: 血液中持续缺乏总免疫球蛋白G（IgG）、总免疫球蛋白A（IgA）和总免疫球蛋白M（IgM），最多仅能检测到微量水平。

HP:0004433.name: Secretory IgA deficiency
HP:0004433.definition: Deficiency of secretory IgA (polymers of 2-4 IgA monomers are linked by two additional chains) and is the primary antibody response at the mucosal level, where it forms immune complexes with pathogens and allergens.
HP:0004433.name_cn: 分泌型免疫球蛋白A缺乏症
HP:0004433.definition_cn: 分泌型IgA缺乏症（由2-4个IgA单体通过两条额外链连接形成的聚合物）是黏膜层面的主要抗体反应，其与病原体和过敏原形成免疫复合物。

HP:0004434.name: Decreased circulating complement C8 concentration
HP:0004434.definition: Concentration of the complement component C8 in the blood circulation below the lower limit of normal.
HP:0004434.definition_cn: 血液循环中补体成分C8浓度低于正常值下限。

HP:0004437.name: Cranial hyperostosis
HP:0004437.definition: Excessive growth of the bones of cranium, i.e., of the skull.
HP:0004437.definition_cn: 颅骨过度增生，即颅骨的骨质过度生长。

HP:0004438.name: Hyperostosis frontalis interna
HP:0004438.definition: Bony overgrowth of the internal (endosteal) surface of the frontal bone.
HP:0004438.definition_cn: 额骨内（骨内膜）表面骨质增生。

HP:0004439.name: Craniofacial dysostosis
HP:0004439.definition: A characteristic appearance resulting from defective ossification of craniofacial bones.
HP:0004439.definition_cn: 颅面骨骨化不全所致的特征性外观。

HP:0004440.name: Coronal craniosynostosis
HP:0004440.definition: Premature closure of the coronal suture of skull.

HP:0004442.name: Sagittal craniosynostosis
HP:0004442.definition: A kind of craniosynostosis affecting the sagittal suture.
HP:0004442.definition_cn: 一种影响矢状缝的颅缝早闭症。

HP:0004443.name: Lambdoidal craniosynostosis
HP:0004443.definition: A kind of craniosynostosis affecting the lambdoidal suture.
HP:0004443.definition_cn: 一种影响人字缝的颅缝早闭症。

HP:0004444.name: Spherocytosis
HP:0004444.definition: The presence of erythrocytes that are sphere-shaped.

HP:0004445.name: Elliptocytosis
HP:0004445.definition: The presence of elliptical, cigar-shaped erythrocytes on peripheral blood smear.
HP:0004445.definition_cn: 外周血涂片可见椭圆形、雪茄形红细胞。

HP:0004446.name: Stomatocytosis
HP:0004446.definition: The presence of erythrocytes with a mouth-shaped (stoma) area of central pallor on peripheral blood smear.
HP:0004446.definition_cn: 外周血涂片中出现具有口形（裂口）中央淡染区的红细胞。

HP:0004447.name: Poikilocytosis
HP:0004447.definition: The presence of abnormally shaped erythrocytes.

HP:0004448.name: Fulminant hepatic failure
HP:0004448.definition: Hepatic failure refers to the inability of the liver to perform its normal synthetic and metabolic functions, which can result in coagulopathy and alteration in the mental status of a previously healthy individual. Hepatic failure is defined as fulminant if there is onset of encephalopathy within 4 weeks of the onset of symptoms in a patient with a previously healthy liver.
HP:0004448.definition_cn: 肝衰竭是指肝脏无法执行其正常的合成和代谢功能，可能导致凝血功能障碍和既往健康个体的精神状态改变。如果既往健康肝脏的患者在症状出现后4周内发生脑病，则定义为暴发性肝衰竭。

HP:0004450.name: Preauricular skin furrow
HP:0004450.definition: A groove of the skin immediately in front of the ear.

HP:0004451.name: Postauricular skin tag
HP:0004451.definition: A rudimentary tag of ear tissue often containing a core of cartilage and located just in back of the auricle (outer part of the ear).
HP:0004451.definition_cn: 位于耳廓（外耳部分）后方的一种原始耳组织赘生物，通常包含软骨核心。

HP:0004452.name: Abnormality of the middle ear ossicles
HP:0004452.definition: An abnormality of the middle-ear ossicles (three small bones called malleus, incus, and stapes) that are contained within the middle ear and serve to transmit sounds from the air to the fluid-filled labyrinth (cochlea).
HP:0004452.definition_cn: 中耳听小骨（包括锤骨、砧骨和镫骨这三块小骨）异常，这些听小骨位于中耳内，负责将声音从空气传导至充满液体的迷路（耳蜗）。

HP:0004453.name: Overfolding of the superior helices
HP:0004453.definition: A condition in which the superior portion of the helix is folded over to a greater degree than normal.
HP:0004453.definition_cn: 耳轮上部过度折叠畸形。

HP:0004458.name: Dilatated internal auditory canal
HP:0004458.definition: The presence of a dilated inner part of external acoustic meatus.

HP:0004459.name: Exostosis of the external auditory canal
HP:0004459.definition: A benign bony growth projecting outward from a bone surface within the external auditory canal.
HP:0004459.definition_cn: 外耳道内骨表面向外突出的良性骨性增生。

HP:0004461.name: Congenital earlobe sinuses
HP:0004461.definition: Pits in the earlobes at the location where ears are typically pierced for earrings.

HP:0004463.name: Absent brainstem auditory responses
HP:0004463.definition: Lack of measurable response to stimulation of auditory evoked potentials.
HP:0004463.definition_cn: 听觉诱发电位刺激无反应性。

HP:0004464.name: Postauricular pit
HP:0004464.definition: Benign congenital lesion of the postauricular soft tissue consisting of a blind-ending narrow tube or pit.
HP:0004464.definition_cn: 耳后软组织的良性先天性病变，由盲端狭窄管或凹陷组成。

HP:0004466.name: Delayed brainstem auditory evoked response conduction time
HP:0004466.definition: An abnormal increase (delay) in the conduction time of the brainstem auditory-evoked response.
HP:0004466.name_cn: 脑干听觉诱发电位传导时间延迟
HP:0004466.definition_cn: 脑干听觉诱发电位传导时间异常延长（延迟）。

HP:0004467.name: Preauricular pit
HP:0004467.definition: Small indentation anterior to the insertion of the ear.
HP:0004467.definition_cn: 耳廓附着处前方的小凹陷。

HP:0004468.name: Anomalous tracheal cartilage
HP:0004468.definition: An abnormality of the C-shaped rings of hyaline cartilage, normally 16 to 20 in number, that occupy the anterior two-thirds of the circumference of the trachea (the posterior portion of the ring is completed by fibrous and smooth muscle tissue).
HP:0004468.definition_cn: 一种异常情况，涉及通常数量为16至20个的C形透明软骨环，这些软骨环占据气管周长的前三分之二（环的后部由纤维组织和平滑肌组织完成）。

HP:0004470.name: Atretic occipital cephalocele
HP:0004470.definition: A congenital defect in the occipital region of the skull, covered by skin of the scalp and containing meninges or remnants of glial or neural tissues.
HP:0004470.definition_cn: 枕骨区先天性缺损，被头皮皮肤覆盖，内含脑膜或胶质或神经组织残余。

HP:0004471.name: Aplasia cutis congenita over the scalp vertex
HP:0004471.definition: A developmental defect resulting in the congenital absence of skin on the scalp vertex, often just lateral to the midline.
HP:0004471.name_cn: 先天性头皮顶点皮肤发育不全
HP:0004471.definition_cn: 一种发育缺陷，导致先天性头皮顶点皮肤缺失，通常位于中线外侧。

HP:0004472.name: Mandibular hyperostosis
HP:0004472.definition_cn: 下颌骨骨质增生（骨过度生长）。

HP:0004474.name: Persistent open anterior fontanelle
HP:0004474.definition: The anterior fontanelle generally ossifies by around the 18th month of life. A persistent open anterior fontanelle is diagnosed if closure is delayed beyond this age.
HP:0004474.definition_cn: 前囟通常在出生后约18个月骨化。若超过此年龄仍未闭合，则诊断为持续性前囟未闭。

HP:0004476.name: Aplasia cutis congenita over parietal area
HP:0004476.definition: A developmental defect resulting in the congenital absence of skin on the scalp in the parietal area.
HP:0004476.name_cn: 顶骨区先天性皮肤发育不全
HP:0004476.definition_cn: 顶骨区头皮先天性皮肤缺失的发育缺陷。

HP:0004481.name: Progressive macrocephaly
HP:0004481.definition: The progressive development of an abnormally large skull.
HP:0004481.definition_cn: 颅骨异常增大的进行性发展。

HP:0004482.name: Relative macrocephaly
HP:0004482.definition: A relatively mild degree of macrocephaly in which the head circumference is not above two standard deviations from the mean, but appears dysproportionately large when other factors such as body stature are taken into account.
HP:0004482.definition_cn: 相对轻度的巨颅症，其头围未超过平均值两个标准差，但在考虑其他因素（如身材）时，头部显得不成比例地大。

HP:0004484.name: Craniofacial asymmetry
HP:0004484.definition: Asymmetry of the bones of the skull and the face.
HP:0004484.definition_cn: 颅骨与面部骨骼不对称。

HP:0004485.name: Cessation of head growth
HP:0004485.definition: Stagnation of head growth seen as flattening of the head circumference curve.
HP:0004485.definition_cn: 头围生长停滞表现为头围曲线平坦化。

HP:0004487.name: Acrobrachycephaly
HP:0004487.definition: An abnormality of head shape characterized by the presence of a short, wide head as well as a pointy or conical form of the top of the head owing to premature closure of the coronal and lambdoid sutures.
HP:0004487.definition_cn: 一种头颅形态异常，其特征为头颅短而宽，且由于冠状缝和人字缝过早闭合导致头顶呈尖形或圆锥形。

HP:0004488.name: Macrocephaly at birth
HP:0004488.definition: The presence of an abnormally large skull with onset at birth.

HP:0004491.name: Large posterior fontanelle
HP:0004491.definition: An enlargement of the posterior fontanelle relative to age-dependent norms.
HP:0004491.definition_cn: 相对于年龄相关标准的后囟门扩大。

HP:0004492.name: Widely patent fontanelles and sutures
HP:0004492.definition: An abnormally increased width of the cranial fontanelles and sutures.
HP:0004492.definition_cn: 颅骨囟门和颅缝异常增宽。

HP:0004493.name: Craniofacial hyperostosis
HP:0004493.definition: Excessive growth of the craniofacial bones.

HP:0004499.name: Chronic rhinitis due to narrow nasal airway
HP:0004499.name_cn: 慢性鼻炎因鼻气道狭窄

HP:0004502.name: Bilateral choanal atresia
HP:0004502.definition: Bilateral absence (atresia) of the posterior nasal aperture (choana).
HP:0004502.definition_cn: 双侧后鼻孔闭锁（后鼻孔缺失）。

HP:0004510.name: Pancreatic islet-cell hyperplasia
HP:0004510.definition: Hyperplasia of the islets of Langerhans, i.e., of the regions of the pancreas that contain its endocrine cells.
HP:0004510.definition_cn: 胰岛增生，即胰腺内分泌细胞所在区域的增生。

HP:0004523.name: Long eyebrows
HP:0004523.definition: Increased length of the hairs of the eyebrows.
HP:0004523.name_cn: 眉毛过长（Hypertrichosis of the eyebrows）

HP:0004524.name: Temporal hypotrichosis
HP:0004524.definition: Reduced or lacking hair growth in the temporal region (i.e., around the temples on the side of the skull).
HP:0004524.definition_cn: 颞区毛发减少或缺失（即颅骨侧面太阳穴周围）。

HP:0004527.name: Large clumps of pigment irregularly distributed along hair shaft
HP:0004527.name_cn: 沿毛干不规则分布的大块色素团块

HP:0004528.name: Generalized hypotrichosis
HP:0004528.definition: Reduced or lacking hair growth in a generalized distribution.
HP:0004528.definition_cn: 全身性毛发减少或缺失。

HP:0004532.name: Sacral hypertrichosis
HP:0004532.definition: Excessive, increased hair growth located in the sacral region.
HP:0004532.definition_cn: 骶区毛发过度增生（Hypertrichosis sacralis）。

HP:0004535.name: Anterior cervical hypertrichosis
HP:0004535.definition: Anterior cervical hypertrichosis (ACH) or 'hairy throat' refers to the presence of a tuft of terminal hair on the anterior neck, just above the laryngeal prominence.
HP:0004535.definition_cn: 颈前多毛症（Anterior Cervical Hypertrichosis, ACH）或“喉部多毛”是指在前颈部、喉结上方出现一簇终毛的现象。

HP:0004540.name: Congenital, generalized hypertrichosis
HP:0004540.definition: A confluent, generalized overgrowth of silvery blonde to gray lanugo hair at birth.
HP:0004540.definition_cn: 出生时出现融合性、广泛性银白色至灰色胎毛过度生长。

HP:0004558.name: Cervical platyspondyly
HP:0004558.definition: A flattened vertebral body shape with reduced distance between the vertebral endplates affecting the cervical spine.
HP:0004558.definition_cn: 颈椎椎体扁平化，伴椎体终板间距减小。

HP:0004563.name: Increased spinal bone density
HP:0004563.definition: Increased bone density affecting the bones of the spine (vertebral column).

HP:0004566.name: Pear-shaped vertebrae
HP:0004566.definition: Bulbous appearance of the anterior vertebral bodies, such that the vertebral bodies have the greatest vertical height anteriorly as well as bulbous anterior superior-inferior contours.
HP:0004566.definition_cn: 椎体前部呈球状外观，表现为椎体前部垂直高度最大，且前上-前下轮廓呈球状膨隆。

HP:0004568.name: Beaking of vertebral bodies
HP:0004568.definition: Anterior tongue-like protrusions of the vertebral bodies.

HP:0004570.name: Increased vertebral height
HP:0004570.definition: Increased top to bottom height of vertebral bodies.

HP:0004573.name: Anterior wedging of T11
HP:0004573.definition: An abnormality of the shape of the thoracic vertebra T11 such that it is wedge-shaped (narrow towards the front).
HP:0004573.definition_cn: 胸椎T11形态异常，呈楔形（前部狭窄）。

HP:0004576.name: Sclerotic vertebral endplates
HP:0004576.definition: Sclerosis (increased density) affecting vertebral end plates.
HP:0004576.definition_cn: 椎体终板硬化（密度增加）。

HP:0004580.name: Anterior scalloping of vertebral bodies
HP:0004580.definition: An excessive concavity of the anterior surface of one or more vertebral bodies.
HP:0004580.definition_cn: 一个或多个椎体前表面过度凹陷。

HP:0004586.name: Biconcave vertebral bodies
HP:0004586.definition: Exaggerated concavity of the anterior or posterior surface of the vertebral body, i.e., the upper and lower vertebral endplates are hollowed inward.
HP:0004586.definition_cn: 椎体前缘或后缘过度凹陷，即上下椎体终板向内凹陷。

HP:0004590.name: Hypoplastic sacrum
HP:0004590.definition: A developmental defect characterized by undergrowth of the sacrum, which is a large, triangular bone at the base of the spine that forms by the fusing of the sacral vertebrae (S1-S5).
HP:0004590.definition_cn: 骶骨发育不全，表现为骶骨生长不足。骶骨是位于脊柱基底部的一块大型三角形骨，由骶椎（S1-S5）融合而成。

HP:0004592.name: Thoracic platyspondyly
HP:0004592.definition: A flattened vertebral body shape with reduced distance between the vertebral endplates affecting the thoracic spine.
HP:0004592.definition_cn: 胸椎椎体扁平伴椎体终板间距减小。

HP:0004594.name: Hump-shaped mound of bone in central and posterior portions of vertebral endplate
HP:0004594.name_cn: 椎体终板中央及后部骨性隆起呈驼峰状

HP:0004598.name: Supernumerary vertebral ossification centers
HP:0004598.definition: Three ossification sites are present in typical vertebral bodies (C3-L5): a single ossification center in the vertebral body, and one each in the two neural arches. This term applies if there are additional vertebral ossification centers present during the development and maturation of the spine.
HP:0004598.definition_cn: 典型椎体（C3-L5）中存在三个骨化中心：椎体中央一个骨化中心，两侧椎弓各一个骨化中心。若在脊柱发育和成熟过程中存在额外的椎体骨化中心，则适用此术语。

HP:0004599.name: Absent or minimally ossified vertebral bodies

HP:0004601.name: Spina bifida occulta at L5
HP:0004601.definition: The closed form of spina bifida with incomplete closure of the vertebra L5 with intact overlying skin.
HP:0004601.definition_cn: 隐性脊柱裂伴L5椎体闭合不全，表面皮肤完整。

HP:0004602.name: Cervical C2/C3 vertebral fusion
HP:0004602.definition: Fusion of cervical vertebrae at C2 and C3, caused by a failure in the normal segmentation or division of the cervical vertebrae during the early weeks of fetal development, leading to a short neck with a low hairline at the back of the head, and restricted mobility of the upper spine.
HP:0004602.definition_cn: C2与C3颈椎融合，由胎儿发育早期颈椎正常分节或分割失败所致，导致短颈伴后发际线低，以及上段脊柱活动受限。

HP:0004605.name: Absent vertebral body mineralization
HP:0004605.definition: A lack of bone mineralization of the vertebral bodies.

HP:0004606.name: Unossified vertebral bodies
HP:0004606.definition: A lack of ossification of the vertebral bodies.

HP:0004607.name: Anterior beaking of lower thoracic vertebrae
HP:0004607.definition: Anterior tongue-like protrusions of the lower thoracic vertebral bodies.

HP:0004608.name: Anteriorly placed odontoid process
HP:0004608.definition: Anterior mislocalization of the dens of the axis.

HP:0004610.name: Lumbar spinal canal stenosis
HP:0004610.definition: An abnormal narrowing of the lumbar spinal canal.
HP:0004610.definition_cn: 腰椎管狭窄症（Lumbar Spinal Stenosis）

HP:0004614.name: Spina bifida occulta at S1
HP:0004614.definition: The closed form of spina bifida with incomplete closure of S1 with intact overlying skin.
HP:0004614.definition_cn: 隐性脊柱裂伴S1节段闭合不全，表面皮肤完整。

HP:0004616.name: Cleft vertebral arch
HP:0004616.definition: A discontinuity of the vertebral arch, i.e., of the posterior part of a vertebra.
HP:0004616.definition_cn: 椎弓不连续，即椎骨后部的不连续。

HP:0004617.name: Butterfly vertebral arch
HP:0004617.definition: Butterfly vertebrae have a cleft through the body of the vertebrae and a funnel shape at the ends.
HP:0004617.definition_cn: 蝶形椎体（Butterfly vertebrae）在椎体中央存在裂隙，并在两端呈现漏斗状形态。

HP:0004621.name: Enlarged vertebral pedicles
HP:0004621.definition: Increased size of the vertebral pedicle.

HP:0004622.name: Progressive intervertebral space narrowing
HP:0004622.definition: A progressive form of decreased height of the intervertebral disk.
HP:0004622.definition_cn: 椎间盘高度进行性降低。

HP:0004625.name: Biconvex vertebral bodies
HP:0004625.definition: Presence of abnormal convexity of the upper and lower end plates of the vertebrae, i.e., an exaggerated bulging out of the upper and lower vertebral end plates.
HP:0004625.definition_cn: 椎体上下终板异常凸出，即椎体上下终板过度膨隆。

HP:0004630.name: Anterior beaking of thoracic vertebrae
HP:0004630.definition: Anterior tongue-like protrusions of thoracic vertebral bodies.

HP:0004631.name: Decreased cervical spine flexion due to contractures of posterior cervical muscles
HP:0004631.name_cn: 由于后颈部肌肉挛缩导致的颈椎屈曲活动度降低

HP:0004632.name: Cervical segmentation defect
HP:0004632.definition: An abnormality related to a defect of vertebral separation of cervical vertebrae during development.
HP:0004632.definition_cn: 发育过程中颈椎椎体分离缺陷相关的异常。

HP:0004633.name: Lower thoracic kyphosis
HP:0004633.definition: Over curvature of the lower thoracic region, leading to a round back or if sever to a hump.
HP:0004633.definition_cn: 下胸椎区域过度弯曲，导致圆背，严重时形成驼背。

HP:0004635.name: Cervical C5/C6 vertebrae fusion
HP:0004635.definition: Fusion of the C5 and C6 cervical vertebrae.

HP:0004639.name: Elevated amniotic fluid alpha-fetoprotein
HP:0004639.definition: An elevation of alpha-feto protein measured in the amniotic fluid.
HP:0004639.definition_cn: 羊水中甲胎蛋白水平升高。

HP:0004660.name: Hypoplasia of facial musculature
HP:0004660.definition: Underdevelopment of one or more muscles innervated by the facial nerve (the seventh cranial nerve).
HP:0004660.definition_cn: 面神经（第七对脑神经）支配的一处或多处肌肉发育不全。

HP:0004661.name: Frontalis muscle weakness
HP:0004661.definition: Reduced strength of the frontalis muscle (which is located on the forehead).
HP:0004661.definition_cn: 额肌肌力减退（位于前额）。

HP:0004664.name: Facial midline hemangioma
HP:0004664.definition: Hemangioma, a benign tumor of the vascular endothelial cells, occurring in the midline region of the face.
HP:0004664.definition_cn: 血管瘤，一种血管内皮细胞的良性肿瘤，发生于面部中线区域。

HP:0004673.name: Decreased facial expression
HP:0004673.definition: A reduced degree of voluntary and involuntary facial movements involved in responded to others or expressing emotions.
HP:0004673.definition_cn: 面部自主和非自主运动减少，影响对他人反应或情感表达。

HP:0004681.name: Deep longitudinal plantar crease
HP:0004681.definition: Narrow, paramedian longitudinal depressions in the plantar skin of the forefoot.
HP:0004681.definition_cn: 前足跖侧皮肤出现狭窄、旁正中纵向凹陷。

HP:0004684.name: Talipes valgus
HP:0004684.definition: Outward turning of the heel, resulting in clubfoot with the person walking on the inner part of the foot.
HP:0004684.definition_cn: 足跟外翻，导致马蹄内翻足，患者行走时足部内侧着地。

HP:0004686.name: Short third metatarsal
HP:0004686.definition: Underdevelopment of the Third metatarsal bone leading to a short (hypoplastic) third metatarsal bone.
HP:0004686.definition_cn: 第三跖骨发育不全导致第三跖骨短小（发育不全）。

HP:0004690.name: Thickened Achilles tendon
HP:0004690.definition: An abnormal thickening of the Achilles tendon.

HP:0004691.name: 2-3 toe syndactyly
HP:0004691.definition: Syndactyly with fusion of toes two and three.
HP:0004691.definition_cn: 并趾畸形，第二和第三趾融合。

HP:0004692.name: 4-5 toe syndactyly
HP:0004692.definition: Syndactyly with fusion of toes four and five.
HP:0004692.name_cn: 第四至第五趾并趾畸形
HP:0004692.definition_cn: 第四和第五趾并趾畸形。

HP:0004695.name: Calcaneal epiphyseal stippling
HP:0004695.definition: The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphysis of the calcaneus.
HP:0004695.definition_cn: 跟骨骨骺内存在异常点状（斑点状、点状）钙化灶。

HP:0004699.name: Osteoporotic metatarsal
HP:0004699.definition: Decrease in mass and density of the metatarsal bones.

HP:0004704.name: Short fifth metatarsal
HP:0004704.definition_cn: 第五跖骨短小（发育不全）。

HP:0004712.name: Renal malrotation
HP:0004712.definition: An abnormality of the normal developmental rotation of the kidney leading to an abnormal orientation of the kidney.
HP:0004712.definition_cn: 肾脏正常发育旋转异常导致肾脏方向异常。

HP:0004713.name: Reversible renal failure
HP:0004713.definition: Acute renal failure with resolution of manifestations.
HP:0004713.definition_cn: 急性肾功能衰竭伴症状缓解。

HP:0004717.name: Axial malrotation of the kidney
HP:0004717.definition: An abnormality of the normal developmental rotation of the kidney leading to an abnormal axial orientation of the kidney.
HP:0004717.definition_cn: 肾脏正常发育旋转异常导致肾脏轴向定位异常。

HP:0004719.name: Hyperechogenic kidneys
HP:0004719.definition: An increase in amplitude of waves returned in ultrasonography of the kidney, which is generally displayed as increased brightness of the signal.
HP:0004719.definition_cn: 肾脏超声检查中回声波幅增强，通常表现为信号亮度增加。

HP:0004722.name: Thickened glomerular basement membrane
HP:0004722.definition: Prominent glomerular basement membrane (GBM), reflecting an increase in thickness (subjective estimate) of the basal lamina of the glomerulus of the kidney.
HP:0004722.definition_cn: 显著的肾小球基底膜（GBM），反映肾小球基底膜厚度增加（主观评估）。

HP:0004724.name: Calcium nephrolithiasis
HP:0004724.definition: The presence of calcium-containing calculi (stones) in the kidneys.

HP:0004727.name: Impaired renal concentrating ability
HP:0004727.definition: A defect in the ability to concentrate the urine.

HP:0004729.name: Acute tubulointerstitial nephritis
HP:0004729.definition: Acute inflammation of the kidney affecting the interstitium of the kidneys surrounding the tubules.
HP:0004729.name_cn: 急性肾小管间质性肾炎
HP:0004729.definition_cn: 急性间质性肾炎（Acute Interstitial Nephritis, AIN）

HP:0004732.name: Impaired renal uric acid clearance
HP:0004732.definition: A reduction in the ability of the kidneys to remove uric acid from the serum.
HP:0004732.name_cn: 肾功能尿酸清除率受损
HP:0004732.definition_cn: 肾脏清除血清中尿酸的能力下降。

HP:0004734.name: Renal cortical microcysts
HP:0004734.definition: Cysts of microscopic size confined to the cortex of the kidney.
HP:0004734.definition_cn: 局限于肾脏皮质的显微镜下可见的囊肿。

HP:0004736.name: Crossed fused renal ectopia
HP:0004736.definition: A developmental anomaly in which the kidneys are fused and localized on the same side of the midline. This anomaly is thought to result from disruption of the normal embryologic migration of the kidneys.
HP:0004736.definition_cn: 一种发育异常，表现为肾脏融合并定位于中线的同一侧。该异常被认为是由肾脏正常胚胎迁移过程中受到干扰所致。

HP:0004737.name: Global glomerulosclerosis
HP:0004737.definition: Obliteration of the glomerular capillary lumen by increased collagenous matrix, with or without hyalinosis or foam cells. Sclerosis involves 100% of the glomerular tuft. Relative to other patent glomeruli in the sample, glomerular size is preserved, or increased/decreased by no more than 50%.
HP:0004737.definition_cn: 肾小球毛细血管腔因胶原基质增加而闭塞，伴或不伴玻璃样变或泡沫细胞。硬化累及100%的肾小球簇。相对于样本中其他开放的肾小球，肾小球大小保持正常，或增加/减少不超过50%。

HP:0004742.name: Abnormal renal collecting system morphology
HP:0004742.definition: An abnormality of the renal collecting system.

HP:0004743.name: Chronic tubulointerstitial nephritis
HP:0004743.definition: Chronic inflammation of the kidney affecting the interstitium of the kidneys surrounding the tubules.
HP:0004743.name_cn: 慢性肾小管间质性肾炎
HP:0004743.definition_cn: 肾小管周围间质性肾炎。

HP:0004746.name: Glomerular subendothelial electron-dense deposits
HP:0004746.definition: Electron dense deposits at the glomerular basement membrane,
HP:0004746.name_cn: 肾小球内皮下电子致密沉积物
HP:0004746.definition_cn: 肾小球基底膜电子致密沉积物，

HP:0004749.name: Atrial flutter
HP:0004749.definition: A type of atrial arrhythmia characterized by atrial rates of between 240 and 400 beats per minute and some degree of atrioventricular node conduction block. Typically, the ventricular rate is half the atrial rate. In the EKG; atrial flutter waves are observed as sawtooth-like atrial activity. Pathophysiologically, atrial flutter is a form of atrial reentry in which there is a premature electrical impulse creates a self-propagating circuit.
HP:0004749.definition_cn: 一种心房性心律失常，其特征为心房率在每分钟240至400次之间，并伴有一定程度的房室结传导阻滞。通常，心室率为心房率的一半。在心电图中，心房扑动波表现为锯齿状的心房活动。从病理生理学角度来看，心房扑动是一种心房折返性心律失常，其中提前的电冲动形成一个自我传播的回路。

HP:0004751.name: Paroxysmal ventricular tachycardia
HP:0004751.definition: Episodes of ventricular tachycardia that have a sudden onset and ending.
HP:0004751.definition_cn: 阵发性室性心动过速（Paroxysmal Ventricular Tachycardia）

HP:0004752.name: Congenital atrioventricular dissociation
HP:0004752.definition: A form of atrioventricular (AV) dissociation (i.e., the atria and the ventricles are under the control of two separate pacemakers) with congenital onset.
HP:0004752.definition_cn: 一种先天性发病的房室分离（即心房和心室分别由两个独立的起搏器控制）形式。

HP:0004754.name: Permanent atrial fibrillation
HP:0004754.definition: Atrial fibrillation (AF) that cannot be successfully terminated by cardioversion, and longstanding (more than 1 year) AF, where cardioversion is not indicated or has not been attempted, is termed permanent.
HP:0004754.definition_cn: 无法通过心脏复律成功终止的心房颤动（AF），以及持续时间较长（超过1年）且心脏复律不适用或未尝试的心房颤动，称为永久性心房颤动。

HP:0004755.name: Supraventricular tachycardia
HP:0004755.definition: Supraventricular tachycardia (SVT) is an abnormally increased heart rate (over 100 beats per minute at rest) with origin above the level of the ventricles.
HP:0004755.definition_cn: 室上性心动过速（Supraventricular Tachycardia, SVT）是一种起源于心室以上水平的异常增快的心率（静息状态下超过每分钟100次）。

HP:0004756.name: Ventricular tachycardia
HP:0004756.definition: A tachycardia originating in the ventricles characterized by rapid heart rate (over 100 beats per minute) and broad QRS complexes (over 120 ms).
HP:0004756.definition_cn: 一种起源于心室的心动过速，其特征为心率增快（超过每分钟100次）和宽QRS波群（超过120毫秒）。

HP:0004757.name: Paroxysmal atrial fibrillation
HP:0004757.definition: Episodes of atrial fibrillation that typically last for several hours up to one day and terminate spontaneously.
HP:0004757.definition_cn: 阵发性心房颤动，通常持续数小时至一天，并自发终止。
